33a5(mdo sde): gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ ma'i mngal du skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag btsa' ba dang / chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub
33a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams kyi ched du sdug bsngal rnams yang dang / yang myong ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang
33a7(mdo sde): dag sems can rnams kyi ched du dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro zhing / nyis brgya'am/ sum brgya'am/ bzhi brgya'am/ lnga brgya'am/ dpag tshad stong ngam/ de las lhag
33b1(mdo sde): par yang 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams kyi ched du ji ltar byas na/ sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
33b2(mdo sde): pa dang / yang na gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba dang / yang na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig 'dzin par 'gyur pa'am/ yang na
33b3(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ yang na sems can 'ga' yang byang chub la gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag par 'dzin du
33b4(mdo sde): 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu 'gro bar yang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag
33b5(mdo sde): gi nang du rab tu byung nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi thos mi mthong ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi thos shing mi mthong bas bskal pa
33b6(mdo sde): 'bum dag tu 'khyam zhing 'khor te/ yun ring pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'
33b7(mdo sde): rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ston pa'ang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams tshol na'ang mi rnyed pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang
34a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams tshol zhing de dag gis rnyed pa'ang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang
34a2(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa chos ston pa dag kyang
34a3(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ched du/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por byang chub tu sems
34a4(mdo sde): skyed du 'jug par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / gang dag byang chub tu
34a5(mdo sde): sems skyed du 'jug par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongs su smin par mdzad pa
34a6(mdo sde): dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu gshegs nas/ sems can rnams kyi ched du chos ston
34a7(mdo sde): pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang / dge slong gi dge
34b1(mdo sde): 'dun gyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag kyang mthong / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de
34b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang mthong / lho phyogs dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng du'ang de
34b3(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar kho ra khor yug tu phyogs bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag
34b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen
34b5(mdo sde): po dang ldan te/ ji lta zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs ma mchis pa dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
34b6(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis pa dag mthong ba dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa dag tu byang
34b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag mthong ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
35a1(mdo sde): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
35a2(mdo sde): chos rgya chen po dang ldan te/ gang dag gis rgya chen po'i gnas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
35a3(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems rgya chen po bskyed par
35a4(mdo sde): bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mir 'gyur bar 'tshal bas ni/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bgyi'o/ /lhar 'gyur bar 'tshal bas ni/ dper na/ lha
35a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ltar bgyi'o/ /tshe ring ba yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal bas ni/ dper na/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams
35a6(mdo sde): ltar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba 'tshal ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'bel ba'i chos
35a7(mdo sde): kyi gtam bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas 'tshal bas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
35b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ thams
35b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
35b3(mdo sde): 'das/ dang po sems bskyed pa 'di las gud na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa ches bzang ba'am/ chos rgya che ba 'ga' lta mchis lags
35b4(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongs su 'dri bar sems
35b5(mdo sde): pa legs so/ /legs so/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ dgra bcom pa'i zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i sems kyis rang gi rgyud dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs
35b6(mdo sde): bar zad kyi/ sems de sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du bskyed pa ma yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi sems ni sems can dpag tu med pa'i ched du bskyed
35b7(mdo sde): pa yin gyi/ nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang rang gi rgyud dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog par zad kyi/
36a1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems ni sems can dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog pa yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ yang byang chub kyi sems ni bsten cing bsgoms
36a2(mdo sde): la mang du byas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob na/ de nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
36a3(mdo sde): rab tu phye'o/ /gang dag 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ 'di lta ste/ rang byang chub sems shing sgom na/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams khyed ni rang sangs rgyas
36a4(mdo sde): su 'gyur te/ bskal pa 'di snyed cig na lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi nang du mtshams sbyar te 'khod nas/ rang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi/ shA radwa ti'i
36a5(mdo sde): bu| rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro
36a6(mdo sde): zhes lung mi ston to/ /nyan thos rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la lung mi ston to/ /gal te nyan thos lung ston na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa las thos nas lung ston to/ /
36a7(mdo sde): shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod kyang / des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang byang
36b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyi 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ 'di ltar des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA
36b2(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos las ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub byung ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub byung
36b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug
36b4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar
36b5(mdo sde): rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
36b6(mdo sde): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems las byang chub kyi sems khyad par du 'phags
36b7(mdo sde): par bshad pa 'di'i don ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par gzung bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
37a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti
37a2(mdo sde): mug dang bcas pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
37a3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin nam /
37a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags te/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba| zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba lags so/ /bcom ldan
37a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la byams pa dang / snying rjes khyab
37a6(mdo sde): par byas kyang / de'i tshe sems can de dag bde bas tshim par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar dgra bcom pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ma mchis na/ sems
37a7(mdo sde): can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la byams pas ji ltar khyab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar ji srid du mnyam par gzhag pa de srid kyi bar der byams pa des kha
37b1(mdo sde): cig ni bde bar 'gyur/ kha cig ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig
37b2(mdo sde): la| byams pa la gnas shing byams pa mngon par sgrub pa ma lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas ma mchis pa nan gyis dper bgyis te bshad par bgyi na/ bcom ldan
37b3(mdo sde): 'das/ gal te dzam+bu gling 'dir bdag dang 'dra ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa sha stag gis gang bar gyur la/ de dag kyang byams pa la snyoms par zhugs sam/ gal
37b4(mdo sde): te snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal na'ang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'os ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang zag pa med pa'i
37b5(mdo sde): sems las byang chub sems dpa' sems mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang / gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa
37b6(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag tu gyur la/ dgra bcom pa re res kyang bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med 'khrugs med snyed mngon par sprul na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam
37b7(mdo sde): du sems/ 'khrugs med de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
38a1(mdo sde): pa| shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa de dag dang / dpung de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems de
38a2(mdo sde): bzlog par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems de gnyis
38a3(mdo sde): kyi nang na gang mthu che/ sems can thams cad zag pa zad par gyur pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa mthu che'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems
38a4(mdo sde): mthu che/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems ches mthu che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
38a5(mdo sde): dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ches mthu che ba yin te/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ zag pa med pa'i sems kyis bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med dpag tu med pa rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par sprul
38a6(mdo sde): na'ang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems yongs su gtugs par mi nus so/ /
38a7(mdo sde): shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems 'di dag gi nang na sems gang mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
38b1(mdo sde): 'das/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas/ gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar zag pa ma
38b2(mdo sde): mchis pa'i sems kyis gtugs par bgyir rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang / khyod nyid la yongs su dri bar bya yi/ /khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan
38b3(mdo sde): thob cig/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te mching bu'i nor bu dag gi nang du/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya bzhag na/ ci mching bu'i nor bu de dag gis nor bu rin po
38b4(mdo sde): che bai DUR+ya la gsal ba dang / rin thang gis thub bam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /mching bu'i nor bu dag gi phung po chen pos nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya
38b5(mdo sde): gcig kyang zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ci'i phyir/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mching bu'i nor bu de dag ni
38b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'ang ma lags/ kha dog bzang ba'ang ma lags/ rin thang yang chung la/ brjod par yang nus pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ mching bu'i nor bu ni gnas rgya
38b7(mdo sde): chen po nas byung ba'ang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ni rigs kyis 'phags pa lags te/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rgya mtsho
39a1(mdo sde): chen po'i nang nas byung ba lags te/ de ni mching bu'i nor bu mang pos zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
39a2(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni nyan thos thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon par 'dug ste/ de bzhin
39a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog nyid du bzhag pa nas/ gong
39a4(mdo sde): na med pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa yin no/ /nyan thos dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang byams pa dang ldan pa dan/ snying rje dang ldan pa'ang
39a5(mdo sde): zad par byed mi nus so/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig rten gyi khams
39a6(mdo sde): gzhan du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'phang bar nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byed mi nus so/ /shA radwa ti'i bub/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad
39a7(mdo sde): pa| mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang / rgya mtsho chen po kha'i dbugs kyis skam par nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
39b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa'am/ zad par byed mi nus so/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang / 'jig
39b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg pa'i me'i phung po chen po de'ang kha'i dbugs kyis gsad par nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
39b3(mdo sde): po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa'am/ zad par byed mi nus so/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs 'dis na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
39b4(mdo sde): mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / phul dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / bla na med pa nas gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
39b5(mdo sde): shA radwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du phyi mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rgya che zhing
39b6(mdo sde): zad par bgyid pa'am/ bzlog par mi nus pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/
39b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyis su mi gsung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gnyis su med par gsung zhing / de bzhin kho na ste gzhan du ma yin no/ /shA radwa
40a1(mdo sde): ti'i bu/ gal te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur la/ sa'i khams
40a2(mdo sde): ji snyed pa dang / chu'i khams ji snyed pa dang / me'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rlung gi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam
40a3(mdo sde): du sems/ sems can de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
40a4(mdo sde): pa| shA radwa ti'i bu/ sems can de dag kyang mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par gyur te/ re re zhing 'di ltar maud+gal gyi bu chen po lta bur rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur la/ rdzu
40a5(mdo sde): 'phrul can de dag gis 'di ltar sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud sdig can mngon par sprul te/ sdig can re re la'ang sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi glang
40a6(mdo sde): po che'i tshogs yod pa dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs yod par gyur te/ bgrang ba 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis/ dgra bcom pa rdzod 'phrul can
40a7(mdo sde): de dag re re sprul pa byed pa'i sprul pa de dag re res kyang de bzhin du sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag bgrang ba la 'jug par nus
40b1(mdo sde): sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gang na
40b2(mdo sde): gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsreg par mngon par sprul pa byed na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam
40b3(mdo sde): par ston pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan zhing / 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa lags
40b4(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ gal te de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par gnas la/ de ltar
40b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa drag po kun nas stong kyang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems cad par bya ba'am/ zil gyis mnan pa'am/ zil gyis mnan pa'am/ bzlog nus
40b6(mdo sde): pa'i skal pa med do/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can dpag tu med pa de dag dang / bdud sdig can de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i
40b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/ gang ches mthu dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'di dag gi nang na/ phyir mi
41a1(mdo sde): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems 'di ni chos mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
41a2(mdo sde): pa| shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta bu ji rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang lda pa gang yin pa de mchog byed pa'am/ mchog tu 'byung bar 'os pa yin nam/ gsol
41a3(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ rnam grangs 'dis na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i
41a4(mdo sde): sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par bgyir rngo mi thogs
41a5(mdo sde): pa'i slad du lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ phyir mi
41a6(mdo sde): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byar mi nus so/ /sbyin pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa las/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de
41a7(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang bos tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs gang gis na/ phyir mi ldog
41b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems zad par byar mi nus/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gang
41b2(mdo sde): dang / gang byin pa na de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin par byed de/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par bya ba'am/ zil
41b3(mdo sde): gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ skyes bu tshong pa zhig zong 'bum phrag mang po spyod cing de tshong byed la/ tshong pa des tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon gang yang
41b4(mdo sde): rung ba las lo 'bum phrag mang po zhig nas skyin po blangs pa las/ de'i tshong ma rung bar gyur nas/ des rgyal po la bskor te rgyal po'i gan du song ngo / /de rgyal po'i dpung des na rgyal
41b5(mdo sde): pos yongs su bzung ba'i mi de la tshong dpon de dang / ded dpon des tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i phyogs
41b6(mdo sde): dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la brten pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang / phyir
41b7(mdo sde): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs la brten to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i
42a1(mdo sde): phyogs de la brten pas na/ de nyan thos thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ skyes bu rgyal po la brten pa ni longs
42a2(mdo sde): spyod zad par gyur kyang / 'on kyang tshugs par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs la brten pa'ang / 'di ltar
42a3(mdo sde): nyan thos thams cad dang / bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos thams cad kyis tshugs par
42a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gal te nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa sgrogs shing 'chad pa na/ de'i sems bskyed cing bdag kyang de ltar gyur cig ces
42a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed na/ nyan thos rnams kyis tshugs pa yin no/ /gang de'i gtam gyi ro myong bar byed pa dang / de la yang dga' bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul bzhin ma
42a6(mdo sde): yin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa des na tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ci'i phyir na/ de dag la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya/
42a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed pa yin te/ 'di dag skyed par byed pa ma yin la/ 'di dag ni
42b1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/ de bas na 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ rnal
42b2(mdo sde): 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya bar 'dod cing / yang dag pa la nges par 'jug par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun tu
42b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/ de dag de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
42b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
42b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams gegs byed pa yin te/ yid la byed pa de dag bskyed na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis
42b6(mdo sde): non pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin te/ gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs
42b7(mdo sde): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa skyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid la byed pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs
43a1(mdo sde): su mi chud pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod na sbyin gnas su mi 'gyur te/ gal te gang
43a2(mdo sde): gis de'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i shes pa thob na/ des de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de ltar na
43a3(mdo sde): shes pa yongs su shes pa dang / spong ba la 'dris pas de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang ldan
43a4(mdo sde): pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems kun tu spyod cing skye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams pa'i sems
43a5(mdo sde): dang sems las byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag skye bas/ 'di lta ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems
43a6(mdo sde): la gnas na tshugs par mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon ni gnas na 'dug kyang rung / 'gro'ang rung / dgra rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin
43a7(mdo sde): te| gzhan gyi mda' yang gcod cing bdag kyang srung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'ang tshugs
43b1(mdo sde): par dka'o/ /nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thos na'ang 'di ltar bdag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
43b2(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da ltar nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa
43b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ bdag kyang nyan thos rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang
43b4(mdo sde): chub kyi sems la gnas pa la tshugs par mi nus te/ nyan thos kyi gtam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam thos na'ang / chos kyi gtam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa las
43b5(mdo sde): byung ngo zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dran par byed de/ nyan thos rnams la chags pa mi skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
43b6(mdo sde): sems la gnas pa ni thub par dka' ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ dper na/ rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa thob cing / ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa'i
43b7(mdo sde): phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dmigs pa de la rab tu goms pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems
44a1(mdo sde): la gnas pa'ang thub par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
44a2(mdo sde): gang po/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' bar rig par bya na/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa rnams
44a3(mdo sde): dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang dag yin pa thams cad dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thub par dka' ba yin
44a4(mdo sde): no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dam bcas pa las bskyod mi nus te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi sems
44a5(mdo sde): la gnas pa de dag ni thams cad kyang thub par dka' ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
44a6(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bzhugs shing gzhas pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang thams cad
44a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
44b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tha ma'i sems thob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa rnams
44b2(mdo sde): kyis mnyam mo/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'di dag ji ltar khyad par med/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi sems la ni khyad par med de/ 'on kyang mgyogs
44b3(mdo sde): bul gyis ni khyad par yod do/ /sems de gnyis ka ni mnyam ste/ gang zhe na/ byang chub tu mngon par sgrub pa gang dag yin pa rnams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
44b4(mdo sde): dpa'i sems la gnas pa ni phyir mi ldog go/ dgra bcom pa gang dgra bcom pa nyid las ldog la/ zag pa med pa'i sems las kyang ldog na/ de dgra bcom pa nyid du rig par bya
44b5(mdo sde): 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de ni ma yin no/ /de ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
44b6(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sems las phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub tu khas 'che bar zad de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
44b7(mdo sde): sun 'byin pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rig par bya ba ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/
45a1(mdo sde): dper na/ mi zhig pho mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa las/ phyis de'i pho mtshan med par gyur la/ pho mtshan gyi bya ba byed mi
45a2(mdo sde): nus na/ de ni ma ning zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems rmugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su
45a3(mdo sde): mi 'gro'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad par bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams
45a4(mdo sde): ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par
45a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yid la byed pa ji lta bu bskyed par bya/ smras pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
45a6(mdo sde): byed pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la gnas pa yin no/ /de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin
45a7(mdo sde): pa gang dang / gang sbyin pa de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
45b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin to/ /gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo bar mi byed na/ de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'
45b2(mdo sde): gang sbyin pa byin pa na rnam par rtog ste/ bdag gis cung zad ni yongs su btang la/ cung zad ni yongs sum btang ngo zhes rnam par rtog par byed cing 'di ni bdag gis sbyin par
45b3(mdo sde): bya| 'di ni sbyin par mi bya'o/ /'di la ni sbyin/ 'di la ni mi sbyin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed de/ ngan pa ni sbyin par bya/ bzang po ni sbyin par mi bya/ tshul khrims can la ni sbyin
45b4(mdo sde): par bya/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni sbyin par mi bya'o zhes rnam par rtog par byed na/ rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar
45b5(mdo sde): chad byed pa yin no/ /de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
45b6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur grang zhes rnam par rtog par mi bya'o/ /thams cad la mnyam par gtong zhing sems mnyam pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang
45b7(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
46a1(mdo sde): la gnas par bya'o/ /sbyin pa zil gyis mnan te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' snga dro'i
46a2(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/ zan zos pa'i 'og tu sems can de dag la gser gyi dong tse dang / ras bcos bu zung dang / gser thags can
46a3(mdo sde): gyi ras byin la/ de bzhin du nyi ma dgung dang / phye ma red dang / de bzhin du mtshan mo nam gyi cha stod dang / de bzhin du nam gyi dgung dang / de bzhin du nam gyi cha smad gyi
46a4(mdo sde): thun la/ sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'ang byin te/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed du gnas shing / de bzhin du yongs su gtong
46a5(mdo sde): yang ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya ba mi shes na/ de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /ji ste yongs su bsngo ba shes
46a6(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thad na mang du yongs su gtong ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
46a7(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di ltar de chos tshad med pa'i chos thob par 'dod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang thob par 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa'i yongs su gtong bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
46b1(mdo sde): par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te sbyin pa de tshad nges par gyur na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa de tshad nges pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
46b2(mdo sde): rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshad nges pa ma yin pa'i sbyin pa byin par bya'o/ /de nas phyis kyang
46b3(mdo sde): yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su gtang bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs des na ser sna tshar gcod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
46b4(mdo sde): su 'dzin to/ /de'ang 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa dpag tu med pa byin par bya ste/ gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
46b5(mdo sde): par gyur gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can
46b6(mdo sde): rnams la phan gdags par bya'o/ /de ltar na ji srid du byang chub tu spyod pa'i bar du zang zing gis phan gdags par bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
46b7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ni/ zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
47a1(mdo sde): dper na/ mi zhig rgyal po la brten te/ de rgyal po la brten cing 'khor la bsnyen bkur byas pas/ rgyal po des de la zan byin zhing / des zang zing gi sbyin
47a2(mdo sde): pas phan 'dogs te/ des bsten cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur byas pas rgyal po mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas/ rin po che brgya stong du ma bskon pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan
47a3(mdo sde): pa gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang byang chub tu spyod ba na/ sems
47a4(mdo sde): can dpag tu med pa la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / zang zing
47a5(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed do/ /tshe
47a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ rgyal po'i bu zhig yod la/ mi mang po gang dag gis rgyal po'i bu de la bsten cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ rgyal po'i bu de bstan pa'i
47a7(mdo sde): mi de dag thams cad la kha zas g.yos pas phan 'dogs par byed de/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i bu de rgyal srid la gnas pa'i dus la bab ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur
47b1(mdo sde): zhing / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa'i tshe/ de'i mi zhabs 'bring rnying du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la/ 'di dag ni bdag gzhon nu'i sa la gnas pa na/ bdag gis sbyangs
47b2(mdo sde): shing bdag gir byas pa yin/ bdag kyang 'di dag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin gyi/ bdag gis mi 'di dag longs spyod la ci rigs par dgod do snyam ste/ des
47b3(mdo sde): bdag gis 'khor rnams la cig ni grong khyer dag tu sna bor bcug/ kha cig ni las kyi sne dag tu/ kha cig ni tshong 'dus dag tu/ kha cig ni 'or gyi grong dag tu bskos/ kha
47b4(mdo sde): cig la ni grong dam pa longs spyod du byin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
47b5(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang / byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan 'dogs te/ zang zing gi sbyin pa gos dang / zas
47b6(mdo sde): dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong dag gis phan 'dogs te/ ji ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des 'khor de dag kha zas g.yos ba dang / bza' ba dang /
47b7(mdo sde): bca' ba ci 'byor pa dag gis phan 'dogs pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas kyang sems can
48a1(mdo sde): rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing / gang gi tshe de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
48a2(mdo sde): gyur te/ bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur ba thob pa na blo ji lta ba dang / shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas 'doms shing rjes su ston to/ /zang zing med pa'i
48a3(mdo sde): chos kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa na/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/ kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/ kha cig ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
48a4(mdo sde): la| kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/ kha cig ni bzod pa'i sa la 'god/ kha cig ni mthong ba'i sa la/ kha cig ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed
48a5(mdo sde): do| |tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji ltar rgyal po'i bu de gang gi tshe/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa de'i tshe sten pa'i mi de dag ci rigs par longs spyod la 'god
48a6(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can
48a7(mdo sde): rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'god par byed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho
48b1(mdo sde): ba yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god par byed do/ /de ltar
48b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
48b3(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar
48b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang bo/ dper na/ mi zhig rgyal po la bsten te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ de'i tshe rgyal po des zas dang / gos kyi bgo skal byin nas/ gang gi tshe mi des rgyal
48b5(mdo sde): po de la shas cher bsten pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po de mnyes shing dgyes par gyur te/ de thugs rangs par gyur nas/ gos dang / rgyan brgya stong du ma bskon te/ longs spyod kyis rgyas par
48b6(mdo sde): byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
48b7(mdo sde): 'dod pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed cing / de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
49a1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ 'khor ba las grol bar
49a2(mdo sde): byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus ji ltar bshad
49a3(mdo sde): pa de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa/ dper na/ mi gang dag gser gyi 'byung khung de'i nye skor na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ gser gyi 'byung khung des nam yang nye
49a4(mdo sde): bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe gsar du brkos shing phyung nas ring por ma lon pa de'i tshe'ang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe shin tu
49a5(mdo sde): dri ma med par byas shing shin tu sbyangs nas snying por byas te phyung ba de'i tshe'ang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /gang gi tshe 'byung khung de nas bton nas
49a6(mdo sde): pa zhus te| de nas sum cha'am/ bzhi cha gser du gyur pa de'i tshe'ang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
49a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang / nam yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na'ang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ byang chub kyi
49b1(mdo sde): snying po la 'dug par 'dod pa na'ang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
49b2(mdo sde): pa na'ang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rgyu 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
49b3(mdo sde): thams cad la med do/ /rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni la chog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / phul dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong
49b4(mdo sde): na med pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
49b5(mdo sde): bgos pa dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnas
49b6(mdo sde): brtan shA radwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du zungs shig/ chongs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
49b7(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
50a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa le'u dgu pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
50a2(mdo sde): phyin pa rdzogs so/ / //bam po gsum pa// //'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
50a3(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/
50a4(mdo sde): dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor
50a5(mdo sde): ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad la dbang dam pa'i
50a6(mdo sde): pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gzhan
50a7(mdo sde): yang / gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams
50b1(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston to/ /de nas
50b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
50b3(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus
50b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das las skabs phye ba thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes
50b5(mdo sde): su ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
50b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ni gang yin/ spyod yul
50b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa ni gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'di la
51a1(mdo sde): gal te byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams kyis gnas na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma
51a2(mdo sde): yin pa'o/ /de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/ /
51a3(mdo sde): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
51a4(mdo sde): dam bcas pa spong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / gal te byang chub
51a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod do/ /spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod na/ de tsam gyis
51a6(mdo sde): na tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa tsam gyis ni/ de tshul khrims 'chal
51a7(mdo sde): par rig par bya ba ma yin gyi/ gang sbyin pa byin zhing nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ de tsam gyis na tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig
51b1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ rgyal po'i bu rgyal pos gdams pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa zhig yod la/ rgyal rigs rnams kyi rgyal po'i bus bslab par bya ba bzo'i
51b2(mdo sde): gnas/ 'di ltar glang po che'i gnya' bar bzhon pa'am/ rta bzhon pa'am/ shing rta bzhon pa'am/ ral gri'i thabs sam/ 'phong ngam/ mda' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs sam /
51b3(mdo sde): brgyug pa'am/ 'gom pa'am/ mchong ba'am/ stobs 'gyed pa'am/ dgra thabs sam/ de la sogs pa'i bzo de dag la slob na/ rgyal po la dben pa yin te/ rgyal po'ang
51b4(mdo sde): sma dbab par mi sems so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' la/ dga' mgur
51b5(mdo sde): spyod du zin kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs pa nyid du gyur pa yin no/ /gal te yang sbyin pa byin pa na/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs
51b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ de tsam gyis na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin te/ bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing du mi rung bar byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar bdag
51b7(mdo sde): nyid zhing du mi rung bar byed pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin te/ /ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa de lta
52a1(mdo sde): de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de'i spyod yul ma yin pa gang yin
52a2(mdo sde): pa de nyid ni/ de'i tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gal te khyim gyi gnas nas byung bar gyur te/ de'ang tshul khrims
52a3(mdo sde): gang dang / gang yang dag par bzung nas gnas pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
52a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas
52a5(mdo sde): shing / gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur la/ de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams la longs spyod du zin kyang / de tsam gyis
52a6(mdo sde): na de byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa de
52a7(mdo sde): ni| tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no/ /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o//
52b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 'byung du zin kyang / de dag thams cad de'i thams cad mkhyen pa yid
52b2(mdo sde): la byed pa'i sems gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po / gzhan yang / nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ni/ mching bu'i nor bu 'bum dag dang lhan
52b3(mdo sde): cig tu bsres te bzhag na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i rin thang med pa dang / kha dog bzang po dang / 'od kyis mching bu'i nor bu de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa
52b4(mdo sde): gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
52b5(mdo sde): pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis gnon par rig par bya ste/ ji ltar mching bu'i nor bu de dag nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya gcig gis zil gyis non cing lam mer ma gyur
52b6(mdo sde): pa bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po /gzhan yang / gal te byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rnams 'dod cing sbyin pa byin na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/ /gang de'i spyod yul
52b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa thams cad ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan rnams 'dod pas sbyin pa byin par mi bya yi /
53a1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa byin par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa de la ni mtshan rnams yod do/ /de la
53a2(mdo sde): ni mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do| |de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod do/ /de ltar na de'i sbyin pa ni mchog
53a3(mdo sde): tu bzung ba ma yin no/ /gang gi tshe mchog tu ma bzung ba de'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
53a4(mdo sde): gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa byin par byed na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ gang dang / gang la mchog tu 'dzin pa de
53a5(mdo sde): nyid de'i tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na
53a6(mdo sde): gnas pa ma yin no/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus byas
53a7(mdo sde): kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas pa'ang ma yin/ tshad yod pa'ang ma yin te/ de ni mchog tu gzung bar mi nus so/ /chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa
53b1(mdo sde): de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin te/ gang yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa ni mchog tu gzung bar mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de lta bas na byang chub sems
53b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byin nam/ tshul khrims srung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin
53b3(mdo sde): no| |gal te'ang tshul khrims de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
53b4(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar nyams pa phyir bslang bar nus sam/ smras pa/ gal te yang dag
53b5(mdo sde): pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas la gal te bden pa rnams ma mthong na phyir yang bslang bar nus so/ /yang smras pa/ 'di la tshe dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa
53b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ smras pa/ nyan thos kyi
53b7(mdo sde): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur du 'ong pa'i phyir te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i skal
54a1(mdo sde): ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te de chos nub par gyur ba'i tshe byung na ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /
54a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ rgyu 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par ma gyur gyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byar ma gnang ngo / /tshe dang
54a3(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ tshul khrims de sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i
54a4(mdo sde): phyir mngon par mi sgrub na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / gal te byang chub
54a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can tshad yong pa rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa byin nam/ tshul khrims srung na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
54a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang yin/ smras pa/ sbyin
54a7(mdo sde): pa gang dang / gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems
54b1(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims so/ /gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du tshul khrims bsgom pa'i phyir spyod la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi
54b2(mdo sde): bsngo na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /gal te nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du'ang yongs su mi bsngo na/ de ltar na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha
54b3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te/ des tshul khrims 'chal par yang mi brtsi'o/ /gal te nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ de tsam gyis na de
54b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
54b5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod yul gang yin/ smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
54b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du khyim na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la bsten cing longs
54b7(mdo sde): spyod la/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang sems mi skyed na/ de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes mi brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
55a1(mdo sde): de ltar 'dis/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ma dkrugs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mi la la zhig nyes pa
55a2(mdo sde): med par btson rar bcug ste/ de btson ra der lo mang po/ lo brgya phrag mang po/ lo 'bum phrag mang por btson rar bcug la/ de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang 'khrugs par ma gyur/
55a3(mdo sde): des rkun po'i sems kyang ma bskyed du zin kyang / de btson rar bcug na/ de tsam gyis ni de rkun po zhes brjod pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
55a4(mdo sde): de'ang khyim na gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la yongs su longs spyod pa des/ tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya bar mi brjod do/ /gal te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi
55a5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed du tshangs par spyad pa spyod la/ de'ang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang 'khrugs
55a6(mdo sde): na de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gang gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan thos kyi tshul khrims la gnas na de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi
55a7(mdo sde): brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba las/ le'u dang po'o// //
55b1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bskal pa mtha' yas par mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar byas la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
55b2(mdo sde): bskyed de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
55b3(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gal te 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes tshad nges par byed par gyur na/ 'di la nyes
55b4(mdo sde): pa ci yod/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor bas skrag cing rings te/ de rings pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'ang tshad yod pa
55b5(mdo sde): nyid du gyur te/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ tshad yod pas ni sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar
55b6(mdo sde): mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med grangs med pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ma gtogs par
55b7(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med do/ /gal te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang da dung sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
56a1(mdo sde): rdzogs par mi 'gyur te/ mtha' yas pa'i phyir na/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de lta bas na byang chub
56a2(mdo sde): s ems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring par mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor ba de lta
56a3(mdo sde): de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par yongs su sgom par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ snod sar pa sman gyi khu ba'i chus bkang ste bzhag na/ ji lta ji ltar
56a4(mdo sde): bzhag pa de lta de ltar shin tu bsgos pa dang / shin tu sra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang ji lta ji ltar
56a5(mdo sde): shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par bsgoms shing ches brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ljod bzod par
56a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ bum pa sar pa'i nang du mar ram/ til mar bzhag na/ de ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring du bzhag pa de lta de ltar bum pa de snum
56a7(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bum pa de snum gyis khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang
56b1(mdo sde): ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar
56b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa/ ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa
56b3(mdo sde): sgom mo/ /ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
56b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems gang dang / gang skyed pa de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa skyed de/ sems gzhan dag skye ba'i go skabs mi 'byed do/ /gang gi tshe sems
56b5(mdo sde): gzhan skye ba'i go skabs mi rnyed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su bsgos pa zhes
56b6(mdo sde): bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mar gyi bum pa ni gang dang / gang nas bzung yang / de dang / de mar gyi dri dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
56b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'i sems gang dang / gang skye ba de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa nyid skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
57a1(mdo sde): po de la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags btsal kyang glags mi rnyed de/ de ni dmigs pa gang las glags 'tshol ba'i dmigs pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
57a2(mdo sde): sgom par byed pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du bdud kyi ris rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar
57a3(mdo sde): shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /
57a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos pa de lta de ltar de bzhin nyid
57a5(mdo sde): du nan tan byed cing sgom mo/ /ji lta ji ltar nan tan byed cing sgom pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub
57a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa na/ thog ma kho nar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan
57a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur la/ de nas de'i 'og tu pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad
57b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur
57b2(mdo sde): ro| / gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'doms la/ gtams pa'i sems
57b3(mdo sde): bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang de la 'doms pa de/ byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /
57b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mi la la gser gyi mi khyer te 'gro/ khyer ba gang yin
57b5(mdo sde): pa de nyid gser gyi mis kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / 'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du gal te nyan thos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis
57b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms na/ nyan thos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
57b7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mi zhig gis shel gyi mi pang bar thogs te 'gro na/ khyer ba
58a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de nyid shel gyi mis/ kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / 'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du stong gsum gyi
58a2(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gang dag yin pa de dag gi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos ni yod par gyur la/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims
58a3(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ de dag thams cad des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas zil gyis non
58a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar de dag 'doms pa de lta de ltar nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ nyan thos de
58a5(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'bogs la/ 'di lta ste/ thams
58a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas nyan thos rnams ni zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ gser ni ji lta ji ltar bzhu zhing skol ba de lta de
58a7(mdo sde): ltar ches 'od gsal zhing / ches kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis/ byang chub sems
58b1(mdo sde): dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar tshul
58b2(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ nyan thos kyi
58b3(mdo sde): theg pa pa'i gang zag zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ni ji lta ji ltar nor bu'i byi dor mkhan 'chang ba de lta de ltar/ ches 'od
58b4(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis/ ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
58b5(mdo sde): la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar shin tu yongs su dag
58b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams zil gyis
58b7(mdo sde): non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ ri mo mkhan nam/ ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma shin tu lobs pas kha dog sna lnga'i tshon gyis ji lta ji ltar kha dog dang / dbyibs su
59a1(mdo sde): gzugs 'dri zhing tshon bkye ste/ rdzogs par byed cing tshon byed pa de lta de ltar yid du 'ong zhing chags par byed par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzugs rnams bris
59a2(mdo sde): pa de nyid kha dog dang / dbyibs kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi
59a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de lta de ltar byang
59a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas ni nyan thos rnams zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ de
59a5(mdo sde): dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du rnam par 'phel lo/ /de dag ni tshul khrims de tsam nyi tshe
59a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mi zhig gis shing bskyed la/ shing bskyed nas dus dus su byi dor byed cing chus bran na ji lta ji ltar byi dor byed cing chus
59a7(mdo sde): bran pa de lta de ltar chu zheng dang / 'phang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
59b1(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems
59b2(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas
59b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
59b4(mdo sde): la gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas gang dag de la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon
59b5(mdo sde): to| |tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mi la la me chung du'i nang du rtswa dang / shing dang / lci ba rnams 'jug na/ de ji lta ji ltar 'jug pa de lta de ltar de'i rgyu las me de mched par 'gyur
59b6(mdo sde): ro| |ji lta ji ltar me de mched pa de lta de ltar me'i phung po de shin tu che bar 'gyur te/ des dpag tshad mang po/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang po rnams
59b7(mdo sde): bsreg cing snang bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing
60a1(mdo sde): rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de
60a2(mdo sde): ltar/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta
60a3(mdo sde): ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ba dpag tu med pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'doms pa'i nyan thos gzhan
60a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa dag gis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dper na/ mi zhig gis gser gyi
60a5(mdo sde): 'byung khung nas gser blangs te/ des gser de blangs nas bdag nyid kyang btsongs la/ gser de'ang btsongs na/ des gser de btsongs pa'i rin ni ches che ba yin gyi/ gang
60a6(mdo sde): gis gser blangs pa'i mi de'i ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi
60a7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu med cing ches rin thang med par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la nyan thos de dag gis tshul khrims kyis kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/
60b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos de dag tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon
60b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
60b3(mdo sde): theg pa pa'i gang zag 'doms shing rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis gnon pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
60b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe
60b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bshad pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang nas/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
60b6(mdo sde): ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes smras so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/ le'u gnyis pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus/ gzhan
60b7(mdo sde): yang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/
61a1(mdo sde): gal te byed pa po'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de byang chub sems dpa'i chos la gnas par rig par bya ba ma yin te/ byang
61a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i chos spong zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas spyod do/ /de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i 'chal ba'i tshul khrims
61a3(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i gang byed pa po'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / de tshul khrims kyi
61a4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par blangs nas 'dug na/ chos gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan gang po/ tshul
61a5(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la'ang phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par byed pa ma yin no/ /gal te chos 'ga' zhig la phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod pa byed par
61a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
61a7(mdo sde): phyin pa 'di chos 'ga' la phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
61b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /byed pa po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ tshul khrims de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa
61b2(mdo sde): nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gang dang / gang yongs su btang nas
61b3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems
61b4(mdo sde): dpa' tshul khrims gang dang / gang srung ba de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe
61b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyis spyos sam/ brgyad bkag kyang rung ste/ bzod par byed cing / bzod pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
61b6(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan dag
61b7(mdo sde): dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi ched du rtsol bar byed la/ brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa
62a1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gang dang / gang skyed pa de bzhin du/ bsam gtan 'di dag bskyed
62a2(mdo sde): nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul des kyang sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug cing shes par bya'o/ /de nas snod du gyur bar bya'o snyam
62a3(mdo sde): ste| sems kyi khyad par de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe
62a4(mdo sde): dad ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gang dang / gang la spyod cing / phung po la mkhas pa'am/ khams la mkhas pa'am/ skye mched la mkhas
62a5(mdo sde): pa'am/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa'am/ gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa'am/ mnyam pa nyid du 'du shes nas 'du shes thams cad spang
62a6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste/ sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan
62a7(mdo sde): pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
62b1(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni nyan thos gang gis kyang tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon nus pa gang yang med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang /
62b2(mdo sde): gal te sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
62b3(mdo sde): dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / gal te sems
62b4(mdo sde): can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni/ theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang
62b5(mdo sde): po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang / gal te sems can thams
62b6(mdo sde): cad byams pa la gnas par gyur/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang
62b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan yang gal
63a1(mdo sde): te sems can thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs
63a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye ba mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzhan
63a3(mdo sde): yang / gal te sems can thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs
63a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/
63a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang / gal te sems can thams cad smon pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po
63a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang
63a7(mdo sde): po| gzhan yang / gal te sems can thams cad brgyad par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
63b1(mdo sde): dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu
63b2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus bdag gi dri ba dris pa lan gdab pa'i skabs phye na/ tshe dang ldan pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o/ /smras
