153a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
153a6(mdo sde): pa|| ||rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bo d+hi satwa tsaR+ya ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
153a7(mdo sde): po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na tshal
153b1(mdo sde): chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang
153b2(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi
153b3(mdo sde): don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu
153b4(mdo sde): phyin pa/ spyod lam zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / ma brtags pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang zag gcig ni ma gtogs
153b5(mdo sde): te| de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyams su len par bka' stsal te/ tshe 'di nyid la lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong tham pa thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa /
153b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i sa thob pa/ mkhas pa/ drang po/ dad pa
153b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ rtog pa mang ba/ dang ba gtso bor byed pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ khro gnyer med pa/ g.yo med pa/ bsgrub pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa/
154a1(mdo sde): chos bstan pas yongs su mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par skyes pa/ yongs su smin par byed pa/ ldem po dag la phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod
154a2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/ yul thams cad phyin ci ma log pa'i sa dang ldan pa/ dus shes pa/ tshod shes pa/ skabs shes pa/ ran ba shes pa/ rgod pa med pa/ khengs pa med pa/ spyod lam
154a3(mdo sde): tha mal pa phun sum tshogs pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa/ 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa yongs su spangs pa/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la yun
154a4(mdo sde): ring du spyod pa la zhugs pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ spros pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mtshan ma legs par bzung ba/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas
154a5(mdo sde): pa| 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par bzhag pa la mkhas pa/ chos bstan pa yang dag par dbye ba 'jug par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston
154a6(mdo sde): pa| nye bar zhi ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par slong ba/ spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhe 'gras pa med par chos ston pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
154a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / lag na rin chen ldan dang / spos 'od dang / mtha' yas snang
154b1(mdo sde): ba'i blo gros dang / ngan song spong dang / don grub sems pa dang / yon tan rgyal po snang dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros dang / mi mnyam pa thams cad ston pa dang / de'i
154b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin du mi gnas pa dang / blo mtha' yas dang / brtson 'grus dang / rtsal bstan por sems pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i
154b3(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i mthu rtsal dang / khyad par blo gros dang / kun nas mdzes dang / sgril med ston dang / rnam par rtse dang / gser mchog 'od dpal dang / chos thams cad
154b4(mdo sde): la rtag tu lta ba'i blo ldan dang / spos dri myur sbyin me tog kun tu rgyas dang / gtso bo brtsegs dang / mya ngan med pa'i dpal dang / lhun po'i lto dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
154b5(mdo sde): spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / blo mtha' yas sgrub pa dang / dam pa'i chos thams cad mi brjed par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
154b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po seng ge ltar sgra mngon par sgrogs pa dang / de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po gzhan dag dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
154b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong nyis stong gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por
155a1(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams grong khyer du gshegs
155a2(mdo sde): pa na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag byung ste/ long ba rnams ni mthong par gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/ smyon pa rnams
155a3(mdo sde): ni dran pa rnyed par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog gi char yang bab po/ snang ba chen po'ang byung ngo / /srang yang dri ma med par gyur to/ /lha'i sil snyan yid du 'ong ba dag kyang ma brdungs
155a4(mdo sde): par grag go / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la thug pa nas 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi sems can thams cad kyang gcig tu nges par bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
155a5(mdo sde): yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na li tsa bI seng ge bu rin chen byin zhes bya ba/ skyes nas lo gsum lon pa/ ma ma'i pang pa na 'dug pa/ khang bzang gis brgyan pa'i khang bzang
155a6(mdo sde): gi steng na 'dug ste/ khye'u rin chen byin gyis rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma dag mthong ngo / /de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis rang gi ma ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ma ma
155a7(mdo sde): gang gi mthu stobs kyis/ /shin tu ya mtshan byung ba snang / /nyi ma bye ba rnams kyi 'od/ /zil gnon snang 'di su zhig yin/ /stong gsum sa gzhi khyab gyur nas/ /ngan 'gro skem
155b1(mdo sde): par byed pa yis/ /rdzu 'phrul snang ba gang yin 'di/ /ma ma bdag la myur du smros/ /dus min me tog char ba yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing mtshams med par mdzes/ /phyogs rnams bya
155b2(mdo sde): yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /skad snyan pas ni khyab par gyur/ /srang yang me tog rnams kyis khebs/ /me tog gdugs kyang rnam par bres/ /skyes pa bud med dga' rnams kyis/ /
155b3(mdo sde): kun nas rab tu mdzes par 'dug /long ba rnams kyis mig kyang thob/ /skye bo 'on rnams sgra yang thos/ /byad ngan byad gzugs phun sum tshogs/ /mdog ngan kha dog phun sum
155b4(mdo sde): tshogs/ /g.yengs pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed/ /lce med tshig ni rnam par dag /sems can byams pa'i sems med pa/ /byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur/ /ma ma sems
155b5(mdo sde): can khyad par can/ /rdzu 'phrul grub pa mthu ldan pa/ /'jig rten dag na rgyu ba 'di/ /su yin bdag la myur du smros/ /de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyi ma mas khye'u rin chen byin la
155b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rnam par dag pa spyod mchog ldan/ /rgyal ba dri med blo mi dman/ /bsam yas ma lus yongs su dag /dbang ldan yon tan rin chen 'phags/ /'jig
155b7(mdo sde): rten mgon po 'khra sa mig / de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa lag 'di/ /blo ldan bsod snyoms don du gshegs/ /'jig rten chos la rten pa med/ /'di la sdug dang mi sdug sogs/ /
156a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa yi rtog mi mnga'/ /pad+ma chu las skyes pa ltar/ /mnga' bdag mi gos spyod par mdzod/ /blo gros ldan pa the tshom gcod/ /phan mdzad
156a2(mdo sde): thugs rjer ldan pa de/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'dir gshegs so/ /bstod kyang dgyes par mi 'gyur la/ /sprad kyang 'khrug par mi 'gyur
156a3(mdo sde): te| |khong khro rjes su chags pa spangs/ /chags med rgyu ba rlung dang 'dra/ /'di ni chos rgyal dam pa ste/ /ye shes zab mo phun sum tshogs/ /don dam don la mkhas pa po/ /'gro
156a4(mdo sde): ba'i slob dpon gshegs pa yin/ /de ni dbu ma ston pa ste/ /yod med 'dzin las rnam par grol/ /chos lam ldan zhing zhi ba ste/ /bsten pa thams cad yongs su spangs//
156a5(mdo sde): ye shes phung po bdag med bdag /bsod nams tshogs rnams bsags pa yi/ /bde gshegs 'jig rten 'dren pa po/ /mtha' yas gzugs can deng gshegs so/ /
156a6(mdo sde): dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas/ /'jam zhing mdog snum lcang lo can/ /gnag cing 'dzings pa med rnams kyis/ /de yi dbu ni rnam par mdzes/ /gtsug tor g.yas
156a7(mdo sde): su 'khyil ba ste/ /dbu skra 'khyil zhing legs par gnas/ /ri rab rtse mo 'dra bar ni/ /de yi dbyibs ni mdzes pa yin/ /de yi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/ /'jam zhing
156b1(mdo sde): g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ /'od ni shel dag zla ba yi/ /'od zer dra ba mang bas lhag /de yi zhal nas spyan mdzes pa/ /me tog ut+pal sngon po 'dra/ /ba yi rdzi ma yongs su dag /
156b2(mdo sde): mi dmar ma 'dzings zhi bar gzigs/ /dpal ldan seng ge'i 'gram pa 'dra/ /de ni rtag tu zhal yang 'dzum/ /sgros ni bim pa bzhin du dmar/ /zhal mdzes lus can kun 'dren
156b3(mdo sde): pa| |mthu stobs chen po phun sum tshogs/ /bsod nams brgya yi stobs mnga' ba/ /tshems kyi phreng ba sra ba'i 'od/ /snyoms shing thags bzang yongs su dag /de yi tshems
156b4(mdo sde): ni shin tu dkar/ /ljags ni shin tu ring zhing srab/ /bdag nyid kyi ni zhal gyi ngos/ /de yis kun tu khyab par gnas/ /dpal ldan dbu ni gdugs dang 'dra/ /de bzhin de ni shangs
156b5(mdo sde): kyang mtho/ /mdog ni btso ma'i gser dang 'dra/ /de yi zhal gyi dpral ba mdzes/ /de yi zhal gyi smin tshugs ni/ /kha dog mthon mthing shin tu sdug /zhi ba'i spyan ni mdzes pa ste//
156b6(mdo sde): snyan gyi drung du thug par gnas/ /snyan shal ring la rab tu 'phyang / /zhal mdzes ston gyi zla bas lhag /zhal ras pad+ma rnam dag 'dra/ /zhal mdangs dkar la dang zhing gsal/ /
156b7(mdo sde): brtan po tshangs pa'i sgra skad ldan/ /de gsung ka la ping+ka 'dra/ /de yi gsung bzang yid du 'ong / /'jam zhing sems can tshim par byed/ /rma bya ngang pa mi 'am ci/ /ne tso ri
157a1(mdo sde): skegs khu byug dang / /'brug sgra khrung khrung kun la/ /shang shang te'u dang gling bu dang / /rdza rnga'i sgra dang gzhan dag kyang / /sgra skrad snyan pa ci yang
157a2(mdo sde): rung | |de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gsung gi bcu drug char mi phod/ /bskul mdzad de bzhin mnyen pa ste/ /de ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang / /yid 'ong dga' byed gsal
157a3(mdo sde): ba ste| |skyon dang bral zhing 'jigs pa med/ /re ba rnams la char rgyun ltar/ /sems rgyun tshim par byed la zhi/ /ma nyams ma 'khrul rab tu zhi/ /de bzhin dag cing brda phrad
157a4(mdo sde): sla| |skal dang ldan zhing snyan par ldan/ /don dang yon tan thams cad tshogs/ /gsung gi rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs/ /de yi gsung ni dge skyed pa/ /sems can mos
157a5(mdo sde): pa tha dad pa/ /de bzhin nges tshig tha dad rnams/ /de yi gsung la nges par dad/ /yid kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /gnas pa'i sems
157a6(mdo sde): can gsung gis khyab/ /mgon po de yi gsung tshig ni/ /sems can rnams la don yod 'jug /thub pa skyes mchog de yi ni/ /mgur yang dung 'dra dpung mgo zlum/ /de yi thal
157a7(mdo sde): gong rgyas pa ste/ /de ni bdun po mtho ba mnga'/ /de yi phyag kyang rab tu ring / /pags pa gser mdog 'dra ba ste/ /gser gyi sdong po bzhin du mtho/ /n+ya gro d+ha lhar chu zheng gang /
157b1(mdo sde): thugs ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan/ /'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma'i phyag /shing bal 'dab ltar reg na 'jam/ /de yi phyag gi sor mo ring / /spu rnams re rer skye zhing yar phyogs
157b2(mdo sde): stug la 'jam/ /brang gi 'phel ka tshe la rab rgyas lte ba zab/ /phyal dbyibs gzhu 'dra glang chen bzhin du sbubs su nub/ /rje ngar e ne ya 'dra mdangs dkar 'dam bu'i sbubs//
157b3(mdo sde): long bu mi mngon de yi rting pa legs par grub/ /de bzhin drang srong sor mo ring zhing sen mo dmar/ /bde bar gshegs kyi zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon te/ /'khor lo lcags kyu bkra
157b4(mdo sde): shis ldan dang dung gis spras/ /mgon po de yi zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing legs gnas dang / /shing bal bzhin du reg na 'jam zhing bzang ba dang / /me tog ut+pal dmar
157b5(mdo sde): po legs par skyes pa yi/ kha dog 'dra bas sa gzhi dag la gshegs par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra sgrogs bde sbyin pa/ /'gro ba rnams kyi gtso bo de
157b6(mdo sde): ni 'dir gshegs te/ /yong gis 'jigs pa med par seng ge'i sgra skad kyis/ /gnyis su med cing spros pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis bdag gi
157b7(mdo sde): ma ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ma ma bdag skar khung 'dir zhog cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o/ /de nas ma ma des khye'u rin chen byin skar khung du bzhag go /de nas bcom
158a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas srang de kho nar gshegs so/ /khye'u rin chen byin gyis
158a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'di lta bu mthong nas
158a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems skyed par mi byed pa de dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin gyi sgo drung du gshegs so/ /de nas khye'u rin
158a4(mdo sde): chen byin 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can khyad par can 'di lta bu ni bskal pa phye ba phrag 'bum du'ang rnyed par dka'i/ khang bzang 'di las bdag gis mchod par bya'o snyam
158a5(mdo sde): mo| |de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis ril gyis gser las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pa brtsen pa lag mthil du khyer ro/ /de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis khang
158a6(mdo sde): bzang de las bdag nyid kyis mchongs so/ /de sangs rgyas kyi mthus nam mkha' par snang la 'dug go /de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis ril gyis gser las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma 'bum
158a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /de khye'u rin chen byin gyi lag nas btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la pad+ma'i gdugs
158b1(mdo sde): su byas te rin po che'i dra ba'ang bres so/ /de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma 'di phul ba/ /bdag ni ci yang mi 'tshal te//
158b2(mdo sde): don rnams thams cad gcod slad du/ /bdag ni byang chub mchog 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar byang chub ma skyes la/ /thob pa ma mchis bshig ma mchis/ /blang du ma mchis dor ma mchis/
158b3(mdo sde): de ltar bdag gis me tog dbul/ /byis pa rnams kyis don gang brtags/ /brtags pa de ni don ma mchis/ /rtog pa thams cad gcad slad du/ /gang zag mchog la bdag
158b4(mdo sde): mchod bgyid/ /de phyir me tog phul ba 'di/ /bdag la rnam smin 'bras ma gyur/ /dngos po thams cad gcod slad du/ /pad+ma 'di ni bdag gis phul/ /bdag gi sangs rgyas zhing du
158b5(mdo sde): ni| |rgyal mchog theg pas 'gro ma gtogs/ /nyan thos kyi ni ming yang rung / /rang rgyal ming yang 'byung ma gyur/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la
158b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni ston pa 'di 'dra la/ /dad pas mchod pa byed mod kyi/ /blo gros phyin ci log gyur na/ /sangs rgyas su ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de nas khye'u rin
158b7(mdo sde): chen byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di dag thams cad ma skyes te/ /'dus byas dag ni gsob dang gsog /de 'dra ba yi chos rnams
159a1(mdo sde): la| |dngos par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /khyod ni chos gos dur smrig bgos/ /dgra bcom nyid du 'dzin par byed/ /rnam shes 'di dang spyod yul yang //
159a2(mdo sde): stong pa kho na ma yin nam/ /dmigs pa la ni gnas bcas pas/ /sangs rgyas bye ma mnyes byas/ /bye ba de yang zhi bar mthong / /su yang ma mnyes byas pa med/ /maud+gal bu la da dung
159a3(mdo sde): yang | |dmigs pa 'jug pa yod dam ci/ /khyod kyi sems ni gang zhig gis/ /yon yang yongs su sbyong bar byed/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen
159a4(mdo sde): byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ khye'u ci/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas sam/ chos kyang ma bstan
159a5(mdo sde): tam| khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ mkhas pas ni byang chub spros par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /chos mi skye'o snyam du
159a6(mdo sde): brtag par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad 'dus byas so snyam du brtag par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so snyam du brtag par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te chos thams
159a7(mdo sde): cad skye ba dang / mi skye ba dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dzin ba dang / gtong ba zhes bya ba dang / phrad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang /
159b1(mdo sde): gnang ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'dod chags kyi chos dang / zhe sdang gi chos dang / gti mug gi chos dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa zhes brtag par mi bya'o/ /ma rig pa la sogs pa
159b2(mdo sde): nas so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams
159b3(mdo sde): dang | rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spyod
159b4(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / mi mnyam pa nyid dang / lus dang / sems dang / chos thams cad tshul bzhin dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du skye bar
159b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /zhes brtag par mi bya'o/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
159b6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya 'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang / byang chub de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang / so so'i skye bo
159b7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par 'dod dam/ maud+gal gyi bus smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ khye'us smras pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod spros pa med pa la spros par byed dam/ maud+gal gyi bus smras
160a1(mdo sde): pa| kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi sgo nas ston to/ /khye'us smras pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ 'jig rten ni rdzun pa/ slu ba/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa/ byis pa 'drid par byed
160a2(mdo sde): pa'o| |maud+gal gyi bus smras pa/ gal te 'jig rten 'di rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin pa dang / bstan pa 'di'ang rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin na khyod ci'i phyir ston par byed/
160a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ chos thams cad bstan du med pa ste/ de dag ni bstan par bya ba ma yin/ thob par bya ba ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/
160a4(mdo sde): yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba ma yin no/ /maud+gal gyi bus smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ khye'us smras pa/ maud+gal
160a5(mdo sde): gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ sbyin pa po'am/ sbyin par dmigs sam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras
160a6(mdo sde): pa| maud+gal gyi bu/ bdag gis de las bsams nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yongs su spangs te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems skyed par byed pa gang dag yin pa de
160a7(mdo sde): dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so/ /maud+gal gyi bus smras pa/ khyod ni na tshod shin tu gzhon/ /shes rab kyi ni rgya mtsho bzhin/ /khyod kyis ji srid tsam
160b1(mdo sde): zhig nas/ /chos 'di dag la bslabs par gyur/ khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ bslab pa thams cad rnam 'jig pa/ /bslab pa gang yin de bslab min/ /gang la bslab pa
160b2(mdo sde): med pa de/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi bslab pa yin/ /don gang khyod kyis bdag dris pa/ /sems can 'du shes gnas pa ste/ /'dir ni chos rnams thams cad la/ gang la'ang skye ba mi
160b3(mdo sde): rnyed do/ /byis pa rnams ni byang chub dang / /'khor ba nyid du rtog par byed/ /'dir ni da dung btsun pa khyod/ /byis pa'i chos la 'brang ngam ci/ /ring po'am yang na thung du zhes/ /
160b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa dag ni rtog mi byed/ /chos kun snying po med par ni/ /de bzhin de dag khong du chud/ /byis pa'am byis pa'i chos rnams sam/ /sangs rgyas chos sam rgyal ba'ang rung / /blo
160b5(mdo sde): ldan tha dad mi 'byed kyi/ /stong pa nyid la de ltar ltos/ /drang srong chen pos byang chub thob/ /de ni mi rigs brtags pa yin/ /chos 'di la ni skye med na/ /mya ngan 'das pa ji ltar thob/
160b6(mdo sde): chos rnams mtha' yas rab tu gsungs/ /sems can grol ba'ang dngos po med/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba la/ /tha dad dbyer med gzung bar gyis/ /'di la rnam pa thams cad
160b7(mdo sde): du| |bsnan dang dbri ba ci yang med/ /tha dad med pa'i chos rnams la/ /mkhas pa rnams ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams kyis thob cing rnyed/ /byis pas mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /
161a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba la ni de kun chags/ /rloms sems bdud kyi 'ching ba yin/ /gang gis blo la ngas thob snyam/ /des ni ci yang thob pa med/ /de yi yang srid
161a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba yi/ /ma rig par yang 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/ /mthong ba med cing spangs pa'ang med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub 'di/ /tha snyad
161a3(mdo sde): yin te don du min/ /byang chub dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /tha snyad dag gis brjod mi nus/ /gang dag de ltar yang dag mthong / /de dag chos nyid rnam par shes/ /de nas bcom
161a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khye'u rin chen byin gyis yun ji srid cig nas chos 'di la spyad lags/ /bcom
161a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe de de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ 'di mar
161a6(mdo sde): me mdzad kyi gsung rab la stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /gang gi tshe ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
161a7(mdo sde): tu dang po sems bskyed pa de'i tshe 'di bzod pa thob nas bskal pa sum 'bum lon no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ khye'u rin chen byin bla na med pa
161b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis khye'u rin chen
161b2(mdo sde): byin 'di nyid la dris shig dang / 'di nyid kyis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci'i phyir khyod bla na med
161b3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dmigs pas na
161b4(mdo sde): de'i phyir bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'o na ci/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa las na dmigs pa la
161b5(mdo sde): spyod dam/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dzin na ni/ de'i dmigs par 'gyur ba zhig na/ chos gsung ba
161b6(mdo sde): ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi mdzad la spong bar yang mi mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ khyod chos bzhi sgrub pa dang / yongs su smin pa mnyam pas bzod
161b7(mdo sde): pa gang la gnas/ khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ bdag gis ni chos gcig kyang yongs su grub par yang dag par mi mthong na bzhi lta ci smos/ 'di la yang dag par grub
162a1(mdo sde): pa gang zhig yod de/ chos rnam par rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs pa'o/ /byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni dmigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
162a2(mdo sde): bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa'o/ /grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la spyod pa la rdzus te skye bas sangs rgyas
162a3(mdo sde): rnams mngon par sum du gyur par skye zhing rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /skye dang de
162a4(mdo sde): bzhin skye med gnyis ni spros pa ste/ /kun tu rtogs pa'i sa dang bdud kyi spyod yul yin/ /lus la sogs pa'i chos 'dzin rlom sems 'dod pa yi/ /lha dang lha min 'gro ba
162a5(mdo sde): rnams ni 'dir brlag go / rgyal bas bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas pa brnyes snyam du/ /de ltar gang dag bsam pa rab tu 'jug byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas la ni sku ngas gsol
162a6(mdo sde): bar byed/ /brnyes kyang 'di la 'dren pa rnams kyis brnyes pa med/ /'dir ni skye ba mang po dag /rab tu byung nas rang byung rlom/ /sems kyi dmigs pas rnam 'khrul nas//
162a7(mdo sde): bstan pa la ni sun 'byin rnams/ /bdud rtsi bdag gis thob bo zhes/ /thob pa'i nga rgyal can dag smra/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yi/ /bstan pa la ni spros med pa/ /sems kyis
162b1(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad du/ /sems kyi ngo bo nyid mi rtogs/ /de bzhin rnam 'dren gsungs pa yi/ /lta ba de ni rang bzhin med/ /spyan dag rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /lta ba la ni
162b2(mdo sde): lta ba med/ /de phyir shes rab ldan pa ni/ /bdag nyid grol snyam 'dzin pa med/ /mtshan ma 'dzin pa sgom pa rnams/ /bdag tu dmigs pas rmongs par 'gyur/ /mkhas
162b3(mdo sde): pa ma yin kha cig na/ /yang dag ma yin stong pa spong / /dngos po rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra/ /rang gi blos ni brtags nas kyang / /mi mkhas de dag dngos po rnams/ /gzhig
162b4(mdo sde): phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra/ /lus la yang ni rten bcas nas/ /tshul khrims 'du shes rnam par 'jig /sems kyi dmigs bdag la yang / /bsam gtan 'du shes
162b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig / de bzhin shes rab dmigs nas kyang / /sa bon 'du shes rnam par smongs/ /'jig rten 'jig rtan mkhas rnams kyis/ /de dag chos kyi rkun por brjod//
162b6(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba yi chos rnams la/ /chos dbyings 'od gsal nyon mongs med/ /'o na rab tu byung ba'i don/ /khyod kyis bdag la ji skad brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad tha
162b7(mdo sde): dad med/ /'di dag brag ca 'dra ba yin/ /mkhas pa de dag nam du yang / /'phags pa'i spyod yul rtog mi byed/ /gzhan min mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid/ /gzhan dag
163a1(mdo sde): tu ni yong mi 'gyur/ /chos rnams 'gyur ba med pa la/ /rab byung brtags pas ci zhig bya/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khye'u rin
163a2(mdo sde): chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khye'u/ byang chub ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub ni tshig gi bla dwags med
163a3(mdo sde): pa'o| |'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos nyid ni bsam du med pa yin na/ de
163a4(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di skad bsams te bstan par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ji ltar gdams ngag bstan par bya/ ji
163a5(mdo sde): ltar rjes su bstan par bya/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ 'di skad ces smra bar bya ste/ 'dod chags ma spangs shig/ zhe sdang ma gzhil cig /gti mug ma bsal
163a6(mdo sde): cig / rang gi lus las gyen du ma bskyed cig /mi dge pa spyod cig /lta ba tshar ma bcad cig /kun tu sbyor ba rnams ma ston cig /phung po rnams yongs su zungs shig/
163a7(mdo sde): khams rnams ril por gyis shig /skye mched rnams la spyod cig /byis pa'i sa las 'da' bar ma byed cig /mi dge ba la rtogs shig /dge ba spongs shig /
163b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yid la ma byed cig /chos ma sems shig /dge 'dun la ni mchod pa ma byed cig /bslab pa dag yang dag par ma len cig /srid pa nye bar zhi ba don du ma
163b2(mdo sde): gnyer cig / chu bo las ma brgal cig ces gdams ngag 'di lta bu 'dis las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gdams par bya/ /rjes su bstan par bya'o/ /de
163b3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa 'di ni gnas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byis pa de dag ni skye ba'i chos su lung ston par byed do/ /'gag pa'i chos su lung
163b4(mdo sde): ston par byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin te/ chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin de ltar rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo zhes de
163b5(mdo sde): ltar gdams na/ gal te mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i skal ba can yin no snyam du
163b6(mdo sde): shes par bya ste/ gdams dag 'dis yang dang yang du yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i tshe dmigs pa can gyi dge slong brgyad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bsten par

164a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas gnod pa chen po ji

170b7(mdo sde): 'gag pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gro ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'ong ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'chi 'pho med pa rnam par gnon dang / mi skye ba rnam par

171a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par gnon dang / chos thams cad rnam par gnon dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam
171a3(mdo sde): par gnon dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa rnam par gnon dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par gnon dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam
171a4(mdo sde): par gnon dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnon dang / mnyam pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dbyings rnam par
171a5(mdo sde): gnon dang / bdud yul mi gos dang / bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las rgyal chen po dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / 'od zer stong gi 'od 'phro dang / mngon par 'byung
171a6(mdo sde): dka' dang / rab tu thub dka' dang / rtogs dka' dang / bsnyen par dka' ba'i blo dang / ngan 'gro skem dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /
171a7(mdo sde): ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha'i lha dang / zla ba'i lha dang / dri ma med kyis byin dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
171b1(mdo sde): chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab
171b2(mdo sde): kyi rdul rnyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag nas 'dus pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can kyi khams
171b3(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dpyod pa dang / thabs dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la 'god pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad
171b4(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad la dpyod pa'i tshul shes pa rab 'byams la zhugs pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa'i spyod yul
171b5(mdo sde): shes pa la dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang spros pa thams cad shin tu chad cing spyod pa len pa rnam par chad de sems can gyi khams thams
171b6(mdo sde): cad sdud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang mtha' dang / dpus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la shin tu mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can
171b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi
172a1(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba la shin tu dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams
172a2(mdo sde): cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang / blang ba shes pa
172a3(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la
172a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang / rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang 'das pa
172a5(mdo sde): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha stag go/

172b1(mdo sde): kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go /thams
172b2(mdo sde): cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go / thams cad
172b3(mdo sde): kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las mi bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa thob par spyod pa las

172b5(mdo sde): pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang

173a5(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go /

173b1(mdo sde): pa la mos pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang rgyus kun bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams

173b6(mdo sde): ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang /

178a7(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
178b1(mdo sde): dang | 'or rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang gi gnas dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang /
178b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
178b3(mdo sde): dang | mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya
178b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus
178b5(mdo sde): sems can 'ga' la'ang gnod pa med cing sgrib pa med do/ /zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang
178b6(mdo sde): ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
178b7(mdo sde): ga la ba der lhags so/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa'ang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang /
179a1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems
179a2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
179a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la gzhol ba/
179a4(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod pa sha stag go /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od kyis 'khor thams
179a5(mdo sde): cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi mas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa phyung ste srin bu me khyer
179a6(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis
179a7(mdo sde): mnan te lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi dra ba las grol ba ni skar ma'i tshogs thams
179b1(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad spa bkong ste zil
179b2(mdo sde): gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar dpal gyis rab tu 'bar te/ sku mi g.yo/ mi 'gyur/ mi 'gul bar lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de
179b3(mdo sde): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de
179b4(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sku mi g.yo/ mi 'gyur/ mi 'gul bar bzhugs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
179b5(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni
179b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar mngon du phyogs shing khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rab tu byung zhing dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par shes so/ /'khor 'di
179b7(mdo sde): nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying por gshegs par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang
180a1(mdo sde): nas kha cig gis ni bdud 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba bcom par shes so/ kha cig gis ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
180a2(mdo sde): dang | dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med grangs
180a3(mdo sde): med pa dag gis/ ded dpon chen po rgyal lo/ /rgyal lo zhes spros bar byed par shes so/ kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas brgya byin rnams gsol
180a4(mdo sde): ba 'debs par shes so/ kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom
180a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par shes so/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig
180a6(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni bzod pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/ kha cig
180a7(mdo sde): gis ni bsam gtan gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni shes rab kyi gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni thabs la mkhas pa'i gtam
180b1(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni smon lam gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi gtam bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha
180b2(mdo sde): cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
180b3(mdo sde): ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams bcom
180b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni yi dwags su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig
180b5(mdo sde): rten du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
180b6(mdo sde): la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'thab bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
180b7(mdo sde): la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'phrul dga'i gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas
181a1(mdo sde): su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni bdud kyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston
181a2(mdo sde): par shes so/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang /
181a3(mdo sde): dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min dang / nam
181a4(mdo sde): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba'i chos
181a5(mdo sde): rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mir skye ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni 'khor
181a6(mdo sde): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni gling gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum
181a7(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams
181b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dom do tsam du 'phags par
181b2(mdo sde): shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rgyang grags tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni rgyang grags gnyis tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad tsam
181b3(mdo sde): du 'phags par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad gnyis tsam du 'phags par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag
181b4(mdo sde): tshad bcu tsam du 'phags par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong du shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
181b5(mdo sde): sku dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dpag tshad 'bum dang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs
181b6(mdo sde): pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku da pag tshad
181b7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrang ba las 'das
182a1(mdo sde): par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni nor
182a2(mdo sde): bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po an+d+ra rnyil gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu/
182a3(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od kyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha
182a4(mdo sde): dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi
182a5(mdo sde): zla snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che shel gyi kha dog tu
182a6(mdo sde): shes so/ /kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni
182a7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor
182b1(mdo sde): bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig
182b2(mdo sde): gis ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i kha dog tu shes so/ /'jam dpal/ kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs gang dang / gang kho nas sems
182b3(mdo sde): can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs de dang / de kho nar sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo / /
182b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ chos bstan pa gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang / de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par sems can rnams
182b5(mdo sde): kyis shes so/ /'jam dpal/ spyod pa gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'dzud cing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang / de la
182b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/
182b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
183a1(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma
183a2(mdo sde): yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho dang / de
183a3(mdo sde): bzhin du lho nub dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/
183a4(mdo sde): grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

183a6(mdo sde): pa dag gis/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag /'jam dpal/ gal
183a7(mdo sde): te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin na/ sems can de dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so/ /'jam
183b1(mdo sde): dpal/ kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / gnas gang dang / gang gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang / de kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par sems
183b2(mdo sde): can de dag gis mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ chos bstan pa gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams yongs su min par 'gyur pa de dang / de nyid kyi chos ston par thos so/ /'jam dpal
183b3(mdo sde): spyod pa gang gis sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ de bzhin
183b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi
183b5(mdo sde): d us na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par shes kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i
183b6(mdo sde): phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam du mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang / 'jam
183b7(mdo sde): dpal/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de
184a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa
