184a3(mdo sde): mthong mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs pa shes par 'gyur bar sems can de dag
184a4(mdo sde): gis mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs
184a5(mdo sde): par shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ sems can rnams kyi las tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi rnam
184a6(mdo sde): par smin pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams 'byung bar 'du byed rnams ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'du byed de
184a7(mdo sde): dag lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'jug go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
184b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang /
184b2(mdo sde): rab tu sems can rnams kyis mthong yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bus de
184b3(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub par 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya rigs la ni ras tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal /
184b4(mdo sde): gal te nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya kha dog ser por 'gyur/ gal te ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin
184b5(mdo sde): po che bai DUR+ya kha dog dmar por 'gyur/ gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/ de ltar ras kha dog ci dang / ci 'dra ba'i
184b6(mdo sde): steng du bzhag pa de dang / de nyid kyi kha dog kho nar 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par
184b7(mdo sde): mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/
185a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ gal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis ni de bzhin
185a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin
185a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin
185a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku mu tig gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin
185a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta bus gdul
185a6(mdo sde): bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od
185a7(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /
185b1(mdo sde): gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal
185b2(mdo sde): po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul
185b3(mdo sde): b ar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu
185b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
185b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar
185b6(mdo sde): bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ gal te sems can rnams
185b7(mdo sde): n or bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong
186a1(mdo sde): n go| |gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
186a2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha
186a3(mdo sde): dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba'ang yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /de
186a4(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar te sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de
186a5(mdo sde): dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog tu
186a6(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs
186a7(mdo sde): dang | lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam de dang / de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher
186b1(mdo sde): las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med
186b2(mdo sde): min gyi sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang / gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam
186b3(mdo sde): de dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis gser gyi kha dog mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog
186b4(mdo sde): tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni
186b5(mdo sde): ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur
186b6(mdo sde): cig |sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma
186b7(mdo sde): gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong
187a1(mdo sde): bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas
187a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam
187a3(mdo sde): par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur
187a4(mdo sde): cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog
187a5(mdo sde): tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya byin thogs
187a6(mdo sde): pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i
187a7(mdo sde): kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i
187b1(mdo sde): kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog
187b2(mdo sde): tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni
187b3(mdo sde): ma gyur cig / sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni
187b4(mdo sde): ma gyur cig ces mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog go /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la'ang brjod par bya ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin
187b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog mod kyi / 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // //bam po
187b6(mdo sde): gnyis pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang / lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams mi 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang
187b7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di snyam du bdag gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang / lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung bar ma
188a1(mdo sde): gyur cig snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de
188a2(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas
188a3(mdo sde): thams cad mi 'byung / der lta bar gyur pa thams cad mi 'byung / der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung / der mtshams med pa lnga po dag mi 'byung / der mi dge ba bcu'i
188a4(mdo sde): las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung / der rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung / der nyi zla'i 'od dag mi 'byung / der brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
188a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang lha thams cad kyi 'od dag mi 'byung / der nor bu rin po che'i 'od rnams dang / me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung / der yud
188a6(mdo sde): tsam dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lor bgrang ba rnams mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ gzhan dun sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de
188a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni ma gtogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis
188b1(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che mthong ka chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams
188b2(mdo sde): cad nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang nor bu rin po cha mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
188b3(mdo sde): par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams
188b4(mdo sde): cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
188b5(mdo sde): par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+ya byi dor legs par byas pa mgo'i rgyan nam /mgul
188b6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyan nam/ lag pa'i rgyan nam/ rkang pa'i rgyan yang rung ste/ gang dang / gang gis logs na rgyan du 'dug pa de dang / der rgyan du shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /nor bu
188b7(mdo sde): rin po che bai DUR+ya de nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag kyang shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug kyang nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+ya mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun
189a1(mdo sde): kyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
189a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lam gyi gnas gang dang / gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
189a3(mdo sde): 'am| de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'am/ spyod pa po dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa'i spyod pa'am/ dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
189a4(mdo sde): rten dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srin po'i spyod pa'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i spyod pa'am/ spyod pa gang dang / gang la gnas pa'i spyod
189a5(mdo sde): pa de dang / de nyid shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger rnam par mdzes kyang
189a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam
189a7(mdo sde): dpal/ dper na/ sa la gnas/ sa la brten nas sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phel la shin tu
189b1(mdo sde): rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ sa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /
189b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye zhing
189b3(mdo sde): 'phel te/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa
189b4(mdo sde): de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ sprin chen pos dzam+bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas nas rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha
189b5(mdo sde): dad pa rnams su char pa chen po rab tu bab ste/ ro gcig pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar
189b6(mdo sde): byed cing gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad par yang gnas la/ 'jam dpal/ sprin ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang
189b7(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
190a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dge
190a2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon
190a3(mdo sde): par phab ste/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi char de'ang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang / lhag
190a4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la zhugs
190a5(mdo sde): pa rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid kyi chos tha dad pa kho na'i char bas nus pa ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed kyang / 'jam dpal/ de
190a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam
190a7(mdo sde): par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed pa bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni sangs
190b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag
190b2(mdo sde): rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te 'thab bral
190b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs chen rnams dang /
190b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge
190b5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams
190b6(mdo sde): dang | shin tu mthong rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams dang / 'og min rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
190b7(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go /sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal por skye ba'i
191a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed
191a2(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs
191a3(mdo sde): pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
191a4(mdo sde): mos pa ji lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang snyoms su bzhugs shing
191a5(mdo sde): btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog go / 'jam dpal/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas
191a6(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
191a7(mdo sde): par bya ba de lta bu da 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
191b1(mdo sde): grangs med pa btang bas sems can rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
191b2(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngas sems can rnams kyi lta bar
191b3(mdo sde): gyur pa bsal la snyam mam/ bsal bar bya'o snyam du mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin
191b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam ste btang snyoms pa'o/ /'jam dpal/
191b5(mdo sde): dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang / 'jam dpal/ sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med
191b6(mdo sde): pa| ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa
191b7(mdo sde): med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyen po med pa yin yang / 'jam dpal/ sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par
192a1(mdo sde): bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems
192a2(mdo sde): can gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi nang na gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / sbyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam
192a3(mdo sde): dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi
192a4(mdo sde): khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par
192a5(mdo sde): 'das pa ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to/
192a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ dper na/ nyi ma ni gcig kho na yin na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang po la mthong ste/ kha
192a7(mdo sde): cig gis ni de 'char bar mthong / kha cig gis ni shar zin par mthong / kha cig gis bag dros pa tsam du mthong / kha cig gis ni dros chen tsam du shes/ kha
192b1(mdo sde): cig gis ni nam phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma mel tshe thun gcig tsam du shar bar shes/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsam du shes/ kha cig
192b2(mdo sde): gis ni nyi ma snur tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni tho rangs tsam du shes te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gling bzhi dag tu sems can rnams kyi
192b3(mdo sde): gzhan dang / gzhan dag tu mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i
192b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can
192b5(mdo sde): gyi dbang gis 'khor gcig kho na'i nang nas kyang sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes/ kha cig gis ni
192b6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so/ /'khor de nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni
192b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das bar shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu lon
193a1(mdo sde): par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan
193a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstan pa snying por gyur par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa nub par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan
193a3(mdo sde): nas lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu
193a4(mdo sde): dang | nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo brgya dang / lo
193a5(mdo sde): stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
193a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs
193a7(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs
193b1(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs
193b2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid
193b3(mdo sde): kyi nang nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes/
193b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
193b5(mdo sde): du med pa lon par shes kyang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du sems can
193b6(mdo sde): gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling du rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang / shing
193b7(mdo sde): gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma thams cad g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab 'gul/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu
194a1(mdo sde): 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing lo ma kha cig ni shar phyogs su dma' la nub
194a2(mdo sde): phyogs su mtho/ kha cig ni nub phyogs su dma' la shar phyogs su mtho/ lo ma kha cig ni mtha' dma' la dbus su mtho/ /kha cig ni byang phyogs dma' la lho
194a3(mdo sde): phyogs su mtho'ang rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma rnams mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ rlung gi dkyil
194a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog /rnam
194a5(mdo sde): par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag tu skad cig skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / bya
194a6(mdo sde): ba la 'jug pa'i gnas grangs med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ sems can rnams kyi
194a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa ji snyed 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i
194b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyun chad cing ldog ste/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan tshad med pa
194b2(mdo sde): dang ldan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la dmigs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
194b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/ /'jam
194b4(mdo sde): dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha rnams dang / mi rnams ni ches nyung gi phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod
194b5(mdo sde): pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam
194b6(mdo sde): dpal/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
194b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches nyung gi / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan
195a1(mdo sde): pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
195a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
195a3(mdo sde): gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na
195a4(mdo sde): sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can
195a5(mdo sde): ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad
195a6(mdo sde): tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab
195a7(mdo sde): pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas
195b1(mdo sde): lha'i sbyan gyis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag gzigs pa ni chos grangs med do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i
195b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re re'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i
195b3(mdo sde): chos byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag gzigs pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
195b4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang bgrang ba'am/ bsam pa'am/ grangs su bya bar sla ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can 'das
195b5(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag gis sems dang sems las byung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
195b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis lhun gyis grub par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems
195b7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las 'byung ba rnams rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis ji ltar byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur
196a1(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can de dag gi spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas gang dag byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur
196a2(mdo sde): b a de dag de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
196a3(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ sems can de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dul ba'ang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par mi
196a4(mdo sde): rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ sems can re re'i ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas
196a5(mdo sde): mang ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam
196a6(mdo sde): dpal/ rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / thabs kyi shes pa gang gis sems can de dag gis nyon mongs
196a7(mdo sde): pa ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar
196b1(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ zla ba'i
196b2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis dzam+bu'i gling du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar snang yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'bri ba dang / 'phel
196b3(mdo sde): ba'ang med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma bgrang ba dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed kyi grangs brtsi bar bya ba de lta bu de 'ang 'byung
196b4(mdo sde): la| 'jam dpal/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam
196b5(mdo sde): dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
196b6(mdo sde): bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang / 'jam
196b7(mdo sde): dpal| sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs ci 'dra ba yin pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa
197a1(mdo sde): mthong ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab 'bring tha ma med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
197a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa yin na/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang sems can rnams
197a3(mdo sde): kyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on
197a4(mdo sde): kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang /
197a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang /
197a6(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa rnams dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi gsol
197a7(mdo sde): ba dang / gang dag mthong ba dang / gang dag mi mthong ba dang / gang dag stong pa dang / gang dag mi stong pa dang / gang dag gshe ba dang / gang dag mi gshe ba dang / gang
197b1(mdo sde): dag reg pa dang / gang dag mi reg pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba de lta bu rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper
197b2(mdo sde): na| gang dag gis nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur
197b3(mdo sde): yang nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs
197b4(mdo sde): su byas pa mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / de'i spyod yul yang shes pa de dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub pa thob par 'gyur yang
197b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog go / rnam par mi rtog /'jam dpal/ dper na rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong zhes bya ba sems can gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/
197b6(mdo sde): dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang
197b7(mdo sde): dag gis rna bas de rlung gis bskyed pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gis rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung
198a1(mdo sde): gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'ang
198a2(mdo sde): rung | gang dag gi lces de'i ro myong ba de dag gi lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag
198a3(mdo sde): lus kyis reg pa de dag gi lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong ba ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun
198a4(mdo sde): gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag
198a5(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa than ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas
198a6(mdo sde): su song ba'ang rung ste/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ de bzhin
198a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten mgon po zhes bya ba'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag
198b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tshor ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des sna rnam
198b2(mdo sde): par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis de'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lce rnam
198b3(mdo sde): par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis lus kyi reg pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lus rnam par
198b4(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
198b5(mdo sde): par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba zhes bya bas bskus pa'i rnga sgra sems can zug rdus zug pa dang bcas pa/ dug dang
198b6(mdo sde): bcas pa gang dag gis thos pa de dag gis zug rdu thams cad 'byung zhing dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba ni mi rtog /rnam par
198b7(mdo sde): mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang dang / rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba'i bya ba
199a1(mdo sde): de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i zug
199a2(mdo sde): rdu dag 'byung zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi
199a3(mdo sde): rtog ste/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres
199a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi /bcom ldan
199a5(mdo sde): ' das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re rer
199a6(mdo sde): yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
199a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod par lhun gyis grub cing rnam
199b1(mdo sde): p ar mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
199b2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par mdzad zin pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dag ni ches mang ste/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar de bzhin
199b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/
199b4(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang / skye ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur bar yang snang la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang / mi snang ba dang / skye ba
199b5(mdo sde): med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma'i grangs dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba dang /
199b6(mdo sde): lo bgrang ba'i grangs bzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sa bya ba de lta bu dag 'byung yang / 'jam dpal/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba'am/
199b7(mdo sde): 'phel ba'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / nyi ma'i dbang gis lhun
200a1(mdo sde): gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
200a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa
200a3(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzud pa'i
200a4(mdo sde): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'grib pa dang nub par kun tu ston te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i
200a5(mdo sde): chos nub pa dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs
200a6(mdo sde): pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / 'jam dpal/ dper na/ nam mkha' la gnas/ nam mkha' la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung yang
200a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin nam/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen
200b1(mdo sde): po med pa ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
200b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad
200b3(mdo sde): 'byung yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi skye mi 'gags te/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod
200b4(mdo sde): du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa ste/ 'on kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs
200b5(mdo sde): kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams la de'i chos kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang
200b6(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bya ba gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul
200b7(mdo sde): re re la sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang /
201a1(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs
201a2(mdo sde): med pa dag ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob
201a3(mdo sde): par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'thab bral gyi lha'i
201a4(mdo sde): gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med
201a5(mdo sde): bdag ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs
201a6(mdo sde): med pa dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems
201a7(mdo sde): can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni klu'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can
201b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dri za'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu
201b2(mdo sde): med grangs med pa dag ni mi'am ci'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu
201b3(mdo sde): med grangs med pa dag ni mi'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mir skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
201b4(mdo sde): ni rigs chen por skye ba thob par byed na thal mo sbyor ba lta ci smos/ bdug pa phul ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin du mar me phul ba lta ci smos/ spos phul ba lta ci smos/ me tog
201b5(mdo sde): phul ba lta ci smos/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan phul ba lta ci smos/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ dam pa'i chos
201b6(mdo sde): rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de bas chos grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'
201b7(mdo sde): bskal pa'am/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba
202a1(mdo sde): thob pa ni sla yi/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/ chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam
202a2(mdo sde): dpal/ de las sangs rgyas mi mnyes par byed pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa ni tha na bdag gi chung ma la mi tshangs par spyod pa las byung ba'i
202a3(mdo sde): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par zhe sdang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
202a4(mdo sde): la khyad du gsod pa dang / chos spong ba dang / chos 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gus par mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur mi
202a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'dor ba dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze yang
202a6(mdo sde): dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa la gus par mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba/ chos khyad par can rtogs pa/ chos rgya chen po ston pa theg pa chen po la
202a7(mdo sde): yang dag par gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bya ba shes pa/ gzungs dang / mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams la mi 'dud cing brjid byed pa dang / khengs
202b1(mdo sde): pa yin/ chos dang / chos smra ba la mi gus pa skyed pa dang / sri zhu dang / rim gro mi byed pa dang / chos rgya mtsho chen po bsgrags pa byung na la la zhig dad par gyur na mi rung
202b2(mdo sde): ngo snyam nas chos smra gang zag la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa dang / bdag shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa mi skyed pa dang / mngon
202b3(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal bskyed de bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa bcabs shing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / pha rol gyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa la mi
202b4(mdo sde): dga' ba yin/ gang zag la zhe sdang bas chos la zhe sdang bar byed cing chos spong ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rtsod du 'jug pa dang / stan mthon po 'dod cing
202b5(mdo sde): thabs tshol ba dang / gzhan las rim gror bya ba bdag gis byed cing mngon par dga' ba dang / gnas brtan rgan zhing yun ring du tshangs par spyad pa rnams la
202b6(mdo sde): rim gro mi byed cing bsu bar mi byed la bzhin khro gnyer can yin/ rtag tu sems rtsub cing klan ka tshol ba dang / glags lta ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas mkhas pa'i
202b7(mdo sde): gan du mi 'gro / mi ste na/ snyen par mi byed/ bkur sti mi byed cing dag ba ni gang / mi dge ba ni gang / bya ba ni gang / mi bya ba ni gang / bya ba ma yin pa ni gang / ci zhig
203a1(mdo sde): byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing rtsod pa mang ba yin te/ 'jam dpal/
203a2(mdo sde): de ltar na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
203a3(mdo sde): ni dbang skur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho dam pa'i snying po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/
203a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu sems can dmyal
203a5(mdo sde): ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tshe 'di la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ klad pa tsha bas sam /
203a6(mdo sde): rims tsha bas sam/ rtsi ba logs na bas sam/ rgyal srid 'khrugs pas sam/ kla klo 'khrugs pas sam/ mu ge'i 'khrugs pas sam/ lus la gnod pa dang /
203a7(mdo sde): yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyad bkag pas kyang tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur te/ tha na rmi lam tsam gyis kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes
203b1(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang /
203b2(mdo sde): mchod pa las byung ba dang / de dag gi thad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/ de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur
203b3(mdo sde): bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gter bcu rnyed par 'gyur te/ bcu
203b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bgrang bar sbyor pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'i gter dang / sangs
203b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas
203b6(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa rtogs par byed pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mngon
203b7(mdo sde): sum du mthong ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral
204a1(mdo sde): ba'i gter dang / sgyu mar gyur pa'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas dang /
204a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dang ba chen po 'thob pa'i gter ro/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
204a3(mdo sde): su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu
204a4(mdo sde): byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la nges par sems pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir sems la dbang ba dang /
204a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa dang / rgyan du mas brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston pa'i phyir yo byad la dbang pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
204a6(mdo sde): cad du skye ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir skye ba la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir las la dbang ba dang /
204a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang bar byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus gang dang / gang gi tshe byang chub mngon
204b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i dus de dang / der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang du 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
204b2(mdo sde): dang | der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir smon lam la dbang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa'i
204b3(mdo sde): phyir rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
204b4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang ba'o/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
204b5(mdo sde): g yis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skra'i khyon tsam gcig la phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jug par byed kyang
204b6(mdo sde): sems can gang la'ang gnod pa dang / sgrib pa med de/ sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin no/ /bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa
204b7(mdo sde): med pa rnams yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing yud tsam gcig ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob ste/ bskal pa re re
205a1(mdo sde): la'ang mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig pa byin gyis rlob kyang sems can gang la'ang yo byad cis kyang phongs par mi
205a2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing lus la gnod pa'am/ sems la mi bde ba'ang mi 'byung la/ sems can gang ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba des bya ba de lta bu'ang shes so/ /'jam
205a3(mdo sde): dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'ang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i bar
205a4(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i lus rnams kyis lus re res kyang
205a5(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul
205a6(mdo sde): ba ston pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to/ /'jam
205a7(mdo sde): d pal| dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la
205b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'jug par byed cing / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag
205b2(mdo sde): yin pa de dag zhing gcig tu ston par byed/ zhing gcig gi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing thams cad du ston par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
205b3(mdo sde): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang na'ang snang la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang
205b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su ston te/ sems can gcig
205b5(mdo sde): gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su ston kyang lus 'dres par yang mi byed de/ sems can gang la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing bya ba de lta bu de'ang ston te/ lhun gyis
205b6(mdo sde): grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu
205b7(mdo sde): byin gyis rlob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob la de bzhin gshegs pa
206a1(mdo sde): rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur te/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu thams cad kyang ston to/ /lus gcig gis mnyam
206a2(mdo sde): par 'jog la/ lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis ldang zhing lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis mnyam par bzhag la lus gcig gis ldang ngo // //
206a3(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings la spyod yul ba'ang yin la sems
206a4(mdo sde): can gyi khams la spyod yul bar yang snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon par dga' ba'ang yin la bdud kyi spyod yul bar yang rnam par snang ngo / /mya ngan las 'das
206a5(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul ba'ang yin la 'khor ba'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spyod yul pa'ang yin la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bar yang
206a6(mdo sde): snang ngo / /zhi ba'i spyod yul ba yang yin la ma zhi ba dang / rab tu ma zhi ba dang / nye bar ma zhi ba'i spyod yul ba'ang snang ste/ sems can rnams kyang 'dul lo/ /blang ba
206a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / ma spros pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / shes par bya ba med pa dang / bar snang dang mtshungs
206b1(mdo sde): pa spyod yul ba'ang yin la spros pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa spyod yul ba'i sems can thams cad kyi nang na'ang snang ngo / /stobs bkod pa'i spyod yul ba'ang yin la
206b2(mdo sde): gzugs bzang po'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo / /chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pas gnyen po spyod yul pa'ang yin la sems can yongs su smin par skyed
206b3(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo / /ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i spyod yul ba'ang yin la phyogs bcu'i
206b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya
206b5(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / sems can
206b6(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te
206b7(mdo sde): skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min nas gzugs med
207a1(mdo sde): pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
207a2(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa thams cad kyi spyod yul thob pa'ang yin la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod lam yang kun tu ston to/ /'jam
207a3(mdo sde): dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sgra sems can gcig gi sgrar 'jug par byed la/ sems can
207a4(mdo sde): gcig gi sgra sems can thams cad kyi sgrar 'jug par byed cing / sgra rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur sems can gang gi sgra la'ang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/
207a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
207a6(mdo sde): thams cad du rang gi lus sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams su byin gyis rlob bo/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
207a7(mdo sde): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi lus la zhing gi lus kun tu ston kyang sems can gyi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed/ zhing gi lus la sems
207b1(mdo sde): can gyi lus kun tu ston kyang zhing gi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su kun tu ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dman
207b2(mdo sde): par yang mi byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed do/ /spyod pa'i lus
207b3(mdo sde): la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku kun tu ston kyang spyod pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku la spyod pa'i lus kun tu ston kyang
207b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyams par yang mi byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor ba'i rgyun du ston kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa 'ang mi skyed do/ /
207b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa kun tu ston kyang gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed do/ /mnyam par yang bzhag la bya ba
207b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang ston te/ 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / nyal bar byed do/ /spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston la ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'khrug par mi
207b7(mdo sde): byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhabs kyi drung na chos nyan par yang snang la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
208a1(mdo sde): cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag na gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog yongs su 'grub pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis kyang chos nyan la ting nge
208a2(mdo sde): 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed cing / chos kyang len la 'dzin te/ 'don cing kun chub par yang byed la sangs rgyas de dag las chos nyan pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do/ /phyogs
208a3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog yongs su 'grub pa tha dad pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed la
208a4(mdo sde): lus tha dad par yang mi byed cing gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du bya ba thams cad kun tu ston kyang ting nge 'dzin tha dad
208a5(mdo sde): par yang mi byed do/ /sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mngon par sgrub la ting nge 'dzin tha
208a6(mdo sde): dad par yang mi byed de/ 'jam dpal/ rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
208a7(mdo sde): gi mthas klas pa'i bskal par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bskyab pa mngon par sgrub kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa rnams kyi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /
208b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa de thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo
208b2(mdo sde): brjod du med pa/ mngon par bsgrub pa/ mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med pa dag dang / gzungs thob pa phun
208b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par byung ngo / /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/
208b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal/ mdor bsdu na de ltar byang chub
208b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par byung ba yin
208b6(mdo sde): no| |'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug pa sems can la kun tu ston pa'i
208b7(mdo sde): yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs du ma mngon par sgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad shes par byed pa'i yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul
209a1(mdo sde): pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
209a2(mdo sde): lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i
209a3(mdo sde): khams su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /
209a4(mdo sde): sems can gyi skad brjod pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa'i yul dang / gdong dang / lus mtha' yas pa kun tu bstan pa lus gcig tu byin gyis brlab
209a5(mdo sde): cing lus kyi rim pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / lus gcig gis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i yul dang / sems can gcig gis sems bskyed
209a6(mdo sde): pa rnams la sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul dang / 'jam dpal/ de la sogs pa
209a7(mdo sde): yul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par 'grub bo/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes
209b1(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu mos shing 'jug go / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig
209b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du mos shing 'jug go / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad+ma'i gdan gcig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis yongs su khyab par mos
209b3(mdo sde): shing 'jug go / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du kun tu ston par mos shing 'jug go /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan du mos shing
209b4(mdo sde): 'jug go / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la
209b5(mdo sde): 'jog par mos shing 'jug go / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig tu 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs
209b6(mdo sde): pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang / byang chub kyi snying pos yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra skad gcig gis go bar byed cing sems can
209b7(mdo sde): gyi khams sna tshogs kyi sgra la 'jug pas tshim par byed par mos shing 'jug go / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lus su mos shing 'jug go /sems can gyi khams thams
210a1(mdo sde): cad sems can gcig gi lus la 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go / sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du song bar mos shing
210a2(mdo sde): 'jug go / sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i khong du zhugs par mos shing 'jug go /sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi
210a3(mdo sde): lus la brten par mos shing 'jug go / sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin
210a4(mdo sde): dang | tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gang 'dod pa dang / mos pa'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / rtags la mngon du phyogs pa ston par mos shing 'jug go /
210a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul du ston par mos shing 'jug go /sems can
210a6(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa legs par brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston par mos shing 'jug go / sems can gyi khams thams
210a7(mdo sde): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / spyod lam dang / spyod pa kun tu
210b1(mdo sde): ston pa gzhan shes par byed par mos shing 'jug go / 'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa'i khams nas kyang mi
210b2(mdo sde): g.yo la/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag
210b3(mdo sde): gi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /nyan thos kyi lam mngon du shes pa la zhugs pa'ang yin la snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon du shes
210b4(mdo sde): shing mthong ba la mkhas pa'ang yin la snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do/ /g.yog 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba'ang yin la/ lha dang / mi'i g.yog 'khor mang
210b5(mdo sde): po rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan no/ /lha'i bu mo 'bum dag glu dbyangs rjes su sgrogs shing sil snyan 'bum dag sil khrol 'byin pa dang yang ldan la byang chub sems dpa'i lam
210b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi 'dor ro/ /'gro ba'i dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / bzhad gang dang / 'jo sgeg thams cad
210b7(mdo sde): dang | sems can brkam chags pa'i 'du 'ji thams cad kyi nang na gnas pa'ang yin la sems kyi skad cig gcig la'ang byang chub kyi sems kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang mi 'dor ro/ /
211a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dras la pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam la slob par yang snang zhing las dang / nyon mongs
211a2(mdo sde): par bying ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed do/ /lam la gnas shing lam la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa mthong ba la zhugs pa'ang yin la/ lam ngan par
211a3(mdo sde): lhung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir la ma ngan pa na'ang snang zhing lam de la snying por 'du shes pa'ang ma yin la des dag par 'dod pa'ang ma yin no/ /lus dang /
211a4(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang yin te/ rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la'ang
211a5(mdo sde): gzhol la sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo phal po'i spyod yul ba la'ang kun tu snang ngo / /bsod nams dang / ye shes
211a6(mdo sde): kyi tshogs bsags shing byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba la'ang gzhol la ngan 'gror skyes pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
211a7(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba'i 'gro ba'ang kun tu ston la 'gro ba der yang dag par gzhol ba'ang ma
211b1(mdo sde): yin no/ /ye shes dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'ang yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
211b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / lus gzugs gcig tu gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin
211b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dgongs pa snang ba rtogs pa dang / theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs
211b4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsngags par 'os pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis gdong du lta ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang / zab cing
211b5(mdo sde): brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa'ang
211b6(mdo sde): yin la chos yongs su tshol ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob dpon dam pa'ang yin la/ tsog tsog por 'dug
211b7(mdo sde): ste thal mo sbyar nas mkhan po dang / slob dpon las chos len par yang kun tu ston cing gus par bya ba thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par yang snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
212a1(mdo sde): lam la gnas nas thabs gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'am/ 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang / de nyid sems can rnams
212a2(mdo sde): la ston to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rtse mor phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
212a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang / chos kyi cod pan thogs pa med cing dri ma med pas bcings pa dang /
212a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kun tu ston pa dang / thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
212a5(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / lus gzugs 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang ldan pa dang /
212a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa dang / 'gro ba'i zhing thams cad du skye ba ston pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de
212a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yul gcig tu gyur pa'ang yin la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'du bya ba'i
212b1(mdo sde): stobs las kyang yongs mi nyams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs las kyang thag ring du mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/ byang
212b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' las kyang mi 'da'/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang phyir mi ldog /byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhum par yang mi byed do/ /'jam
212b3(mdo sde): dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / 'degs pa med pa dang / 'jog pa
212b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / mi ga yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mang po dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
212b5(mdo sde): 'du bya ba med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / smrar med pa dang / bsnyad du med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang / mnyam pa
212b6(mdo sde): nyid dang / dbyer med pa dang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ces bya ba de ni de'i dmigs
212b7(mdo sde): pa ste| 'du shes pa 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems med pa la sems su dmigs pa ni 'du shes phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir te/ sems phyin ci

213a3(mdo sde): dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems
213a4(mdo sde): la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /

213b6(mdo sde): rgyun mi chad pa la bzhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag

214a2(mdo sde): no| |'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
214a3(mdo sde): r gya ste de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re re na'ang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la dus gsum la 'jug cing bskal ba'i

214a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'du shes phyin ci log gis sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams 'di
214a7(mdo sde): dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes mngon par zhen nas chos spong bar byed do/ /mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs kyang byed do/ /
214b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni skye ba'am/ 'gag pa med de/ 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med
