214b6(mdo sde): po med pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang gnyen po med pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag go /gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de
214b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa'o/ /de la ni tshigs med mod kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam
215a1(mdo sde): gyi stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang
215a2(mdo sde): bar byed pa chu'i nang du bcug ma thag tu 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang / 'jam dpal/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog
215a3(mdo sde): ste| 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
215a4(mdo sde): khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdza ba dang / rnyog pa thams cad dang bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi
215a5(mdo sde): rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo shin tu myur zhing stobs kyi
215a6(mdo sde): shugs kyis 'phangs pa ni rdza mkhan gyi dbang gis snod spyad sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed kyang / 'jam dpal/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste /
215a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
215b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi shugs kyis sems can gyi dbang gis sems can rnams la dge ba'i
215b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung
215b3(mdo sde): ste| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi
215b4(mdo sde): gsol ba dang / gang dag gis mthong ba dang / gang dag gis ma mthong ba dang / gang dag gis bstod pa dang / gang dag mi bstod pa dang / gang dag gshe ba dang / gang dag mi
215b5(mdo sde): gshe ba dang / gang dag zhu ba byed pa dang / gang dag zhu ba mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
215b6(mdo sde): par 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dge
215b7(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa grub pa'i gzungs thob ste/ gzungs de
216a1(mdo sde): thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skus khyab par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mngon par rdzogs
216a2(mdo sde): par byang chub pa'i sku ston to/ /lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba grangs med pa dang / chos tha dad pa nyid grangs med pa ston te gnas nas
216a3(mdo sde): kyang mi g.yo'o/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na byang chub sems
216a4(mdo sde): dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/ /bsnyen par bya'o/ /bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ mi dge ba'i bshes
216a5(mdo sde): gnyen rnams ni brag gi bya skyibs rab tu 'bar ba bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten na byang chub sems
216a6(mdo sde): dpa'i sems dang / 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/ /sems phyin ci log tu gyur na kun tu 'khrul bar 'gyur ro/ /sems kun tu 'khrul bar gyur na rnam par rmongs par
216a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sems rnam par rmongs na skrag par 'gyur ro/ /sems skrag par gyur na byang chub kyi sems 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems bor na lha yongs su gtong
216b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /lha yongs su gtong na lha rnams kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
216b2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi bar dag kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na byang chub
216b3(mdo sde): sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/ /bsnyen par bya'o/ /bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni gnod sems
216b4(mdo sde): kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pas mthong yang rung ste/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag gi nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang skyabs zhes bya ba'i
216b5(mdo sde): sman ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du
216b6(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa'am/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na tha na dud 'gro'i
216b7(mdo sde): skye gnas su song ba'ang rung ste / de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang
217a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chen po las
217a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags te/ nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs
217a3(mdo sde): dang | yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par byed cing mun pa sel bar byed/ 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams cad skam par byed/ pad+ma
217a4(mdo sde): rnams kyang kha 'bye bar byed do/ /rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang skyed par byed/ sman thams cad kyang yongs su smin par byed/ las kyi gnas
217a5(mdo sde): thams cad ni gnas par byed la/ chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran thams cad la'ang dus gcig tu snang ba thob par 'gyur yang gnas las kyang mi g.yo zhing / 'jam dpal/
217a6(mdo sde): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de rtag tu 'byung ngo //
217a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi
217b1(mdo sde): n am mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa btang bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du snang ba sbyin par
217b2(mdo sde): mdzad cing sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib dang / ling tog rnams rnam par sel bar mdzad/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab dang / rnyog pa thams
217b3(mdo sde): cad skem par mdzad/ yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams ni sad par mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ni skye bar mdzad/ sems
217b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad ni yongs su smin par mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad ni rab tu 'jog par mdzad de/ dus gcig tu de'i mdzad pa thams
217b5(mdo sde): cad 'byung yang gnas nas kyang mi g.yo zhing / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub
217b6(mdo sde): cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can yongs su smin par
217b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i gnas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
218a1(mdo sde): chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing dpyod pa la mkhas par 'gyur te/ de chos rnams la 'di ltar dpyod do/ /mig ni gzugs kyi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma
218a2(mdo sde): yin| gzugs kyang mig dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin la dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de'ang mig las kyang ma byung / gzugs
218a3(mdo sde): las kyang ma byung zhing rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang de bzhin no/ /yid kyang chos kyi rkyen ma yin zhing
218a4(mdo sde): chos kyang yid kyi rkyen ma yin la dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa de ni yid las kyang ma byung / chos rnams las kyang ma
218a5(mdo sde): byung zhing yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang byang chub kyi rkyen ma yin/ byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
218a6(mdo sde): rkyen ma yin mod kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang byang chub kyi rkyen la dmigs pa las sems skye ba rnams kyi sa skye ste/ de dag kyang skyes nas zhig cing zhu la mi gnas pa'o/ /de la
218a7(mdo sde): sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de gnyis ni phan tshun mi sbyor ro/ /dper na/ me ni gang nas
218b1(mdo sde): kyang mi 'ong / gang du mi 'gro ste/ 'on kyang rgyu dang / rkyen gyis 'bar ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar ba'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
218b2(mdo sde): gang du'ang mi 'gro ste/ 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar te/ shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag
218b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/
218b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/
218b5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams la rtag par nyin gcig bzhin du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag phul la/ de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
218b6(mdo sde): d ag tu phul zhing de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
218b7(mdo sde): cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mchod rten dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i
219a1(mdo sde): stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
219a2(mdo sde): bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i byug pas byug pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas khebs par byas pa/ phyogs
219a3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten de dag la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i na bza' dag dang / gdugs kyi sprin
219a4(mdo sde): dag dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang / me tog gi sprin dag dang / spos kyi sprin dag dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin dag dang /
219a5(mdo sde): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor la nyin gcig bzhin/ de ltar mchod cing bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod la/
219a6(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mchod pa de nyid la 'god pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis de bzhin gshegs
219a7(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tha na mos par byed na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches grangs
219b1(mdo sde): med par bskyed do/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
219b2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gnon to/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
219b3(mdo sde): phyir snyil bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rab tu shes so/ /nga rgyal gyi ri dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
219b4(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /phrag dog dang / ser sna'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med grangs med pa dag snyol bar byed do/ /srid pa'i chu klung dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skem
219b5(mdo sde): bar byed do/ /skye ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med grangs med pa dag las rgal bar byed do/ /bdud kyi zhags pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gcod do/ /nyi zla rnams dang / brgya
219b6(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te 'dug go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sems can dmyal
219b7(mdo sde): pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
220a1(mdo sde): rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i
220a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rin
220a3(mdo sde): po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /
220a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po
220a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /yul la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /cher bsgyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rnam pa
220a6(mdo sde): dang / sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /seng ge bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
220a7(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo/ /mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rab tu g.yo ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
220b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rdo rje lte ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
220b2(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /sa 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /lhun po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /lhun po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang
220b3(mdo sde): 'thob bo/ /rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems la dbang
220b4(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /sbyor ba zab cing gsang ba zhes bya ba'i
220b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i spobs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad
220b6(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa zhes bya
220b7(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
221a1(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo/ /gzugs thams cad kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang
221a2(mdo sde): 'thob bo/ /spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /mngon sum du byang chub snang ba zhes
221a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rin po che bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes
221a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad 'dul bar rnam par nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul
221a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/ /zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
221a6(mdo sde): kyang 'thob ste/ de dag la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa
221a7(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /mi zad pa'i za
221b1(mdo sde): ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /pad+ma bkod pa
221b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
221b3(mdo sde): gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya
221b4(mdo sde): ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob ste/ de dag la sogs pa gzungs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad la spyod pa'i khyad par nyid kyang 'thob bo/ /chos
221b5(mdo sde): thams cad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa'ang 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad la som nyi gcod pa nyid kyang 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa stong phrag grangs med pa
221b6(mdo sde): dag kyang 'thob bo/ /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa'ang 'thob bo/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas
221b7(mdo sde): lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
222a1(mdo sde): zil gyis mnan nas lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib
222a2(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dag
222a3(mdo sde): kyang 'thob pa'i chos kyi bye brag gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
222a4(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos na/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob
222a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ chos thams cad gnyen po med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / brjod du med par mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi
222a6(mdo sde): 'chad par skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang / spyod lam la 'jug pa'i gnas dzam+bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul las kyang lhag pa dag la
222a7(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'jug par mos pa dang / seng ge bran bzang gi bu'i rtogs pa brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de bcom ldan
222b1(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pas/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mdzad par mos pa dang / mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa nas bzung ste
222b2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bar der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i
222b3(mdo sde): bskal pa nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa yin par mos pa dang / shAkya thub pas bstan pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa gang yin pa de sangs
222b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul gyis mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa yin par mos pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ lnga po
222b5(mdo sde): de dag ni byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang thob pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
222b6(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa rnams
222b7(mdo sde): la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i gos dag byin te/ de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs
223a1(mdo sde): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyi ma gcig zas byin na de ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par
223a2(mdo sde): bskyed de/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang gtsug lag khang dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor
223a3(mdo sde): rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes
223a4(mdo sde): par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/ nor bu rin po
223a5(mdo sde): che dbang gi rgyal pos khebs par byas pa/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i rin po che rnam par dag pa bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang pos dkrigs
223a6(mdo sde): pa| nor bu rin po che'i seng ge ral pa zhes bya ba'i spang leb bres pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo las byas pa'i sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung
223a7(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang pos bres pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas stong phrag grangs med pa
223b1(mdo sde): dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i gos dag kyang byin zhing de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu
223b2(mdo sde): byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas she'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhe'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhe'am/
223b3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa'am/ gzugs su byas
223b4(mdo sde): pa mthong ba lta ci smos te/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /gang gis mar me phul ba'am/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ me tog dag gam/
223b5(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra'am/ mchod pa sna tshogs gzhan dag byed pa lta ci smos te/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do/ /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
223b6(mdo sde): phyir nyi ma gcig bslab pa gcig srung ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
223b7(mdo sde): zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/ nyan thos dang bcas pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab snyed rnams la nyin
224a1(mdo sde): gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag kyang 'bul la/ de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu
224a2(mdo sde): 'bul zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir mchod rten tshad gling bzhi pa tsam/ rnam pa thams
224a3(mdo sde): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang / dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor
224a4(mdo sde): bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
224a5(mdo sde): dang | ba dan bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/ tsan+dan na sprul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas g.yogs pa /
224a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/ mchod rten de dag la nyin gcig bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i gos dag
224a7(mdo sde): dang | gdugs kyi sprin dag dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang / me tog gi sprin dag dang / spos kyi sprin dag dang / rin po che'i sprin dag dang /
224b1(mdo sde): dang | rol mo'i sgra'i sprin dag dang / rgyan gyi sprin dag dang / seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i zla ba'i sprin dag dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin
224b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis gtor/ mngon par gtor la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i
224b3(mdo sde): yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gcig la
224b4(mdo sde): zan kham gcig byin na 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis
224b5(mdo sde): mdo 'di las ji skad smos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byed pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di nyid la mos pa gzhan gang zhig gis mdo 'di nyid la
224b6(mdo sde): mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'o snyam ste dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po
224b7(mdo sde): rnyed la/ de sems dad pas langs te/ de la thal mo sbyar nas phyag btsal te ci nus ci lcogs su de la yongs su bzung ba byas na/ 'di nyid de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob
225a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam
225a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang brgal te 'gro bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'
225a3(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyad pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs
225a4(mdo sde): pa ni rtag pa'o snyam du mos par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas
225a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' dag nyin gcig bzhin du 'bul zhing / de

225a7(mdo sde): s hes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas khyod chos kyi
225b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la mos pa legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no/ /zhes bsam pa thag pa nas legs so zhes bya
225b2(mdo sde): ba byin la/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas rnams su zhugs la chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces byas nas/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems
225b3(mdo sde): dpa' de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par 'phel te/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar
225b4(mdo sde): mi 'gro / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs
225b5(mdo sde): dang | cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / zla dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
225b6(mdo sde): de skad ces smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi
225b7(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
226a1(mdo sde): dang | ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi
226a2(mdo sde): mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bud+d+ha ba la war+d+ha na
226a3(mdo sde): pA ti hAR+ya bi kurbA Na ni rde sha nA ma mahA yA na swA tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa
226a4(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das chu bo chen po klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na/ 'phags
226a5(mdo sde): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong dang / rab 'byor dang / shA
226a6(mdo sde): ri'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad
226a7(mdo sde): dang | rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba byas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag
226b1(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis tshim par byas/ bskul/ gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin/ /
226b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos grong khyer wA ra NA sir gshegs te/ wA ra NA si'i shing a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe nas cher g.yos par gyur
226b3(mdo sde): nas seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed tsam gyi tshad legs par spras pa/ shin tu dga' bar 'gyur

226b6(mdo sde): byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'
226b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /khyod song la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs
227a1(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na khyod kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can snyigs ma'i rang bzhin can/ ma dad pa/ sdig pa spyod pa/ nyon
227a2(mdo sde): mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag gis bsgribs pa/ mar mi shes pa/ phar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la

227a4(mdo sde): shig |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa las tshig 'di thos nas

227a6(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab g.yos so/ /de nas lus las 'od zer brgya stong du ma byung ngo / /byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
227a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs kyis khyab pa man chad du snang bar byas te/ 'od zer de
227b1(mdo sde): dag las kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /bag yod pa dang nyon mongs med par byos/ /bag med pa yi dbang du ma 'gro zhig /skye dang rga

227b3(mdo sde): mongs dog par rtag tu 'khor ba na/ /'tsho ba ma rungs pa ni skrag mi 'gyur/ /rnyed dang chags dang bud med rtag pa min/ /rtag tu glu gar sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan/ /bskal pa du mar

227b5(mdo sde): nas kyang / /mi mkhas pa dag mi shes dga' bar 'dzin/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye ba de/ /mi sa ni ma myong med la skrag pa med/ /mi rnams kyi ni dam pa'i chos 'chad
227b6(mdo sde): kyi| |bde bar gshegs la mchod par 'dod rnams dang / /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba de mthong nas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgo ma pa thob 'gyur gyi/ /de phyir sdug bsngal rgya mtshor
227b7(mdo sde): mi gang rnams/ /skrag par gyis la thar pa 'dod par byos/ /mi rnams kyis ni dam pa de la mchod/ /gzhan gyi srog ni ma gcod de bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi nor dag ma byin len
228a1(mdo sde): ma byed/ /gzhan gyi bud med dag la 'tshe ma byed/ /sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu gus par byos/ /nga rgyal rgyags dang brlang ba spangs nas kyang //
228a2(mdo sde): wA ra NA si zhes ni bya ba yi/ /a mra srung ba mo yi tshal du deng / /mi mchog la ni myur du blta bar gyis/ /de yi bkod pa rgya cher yid du 'ong / /dge slong dge 'dun rtag

228a7(mdo sde): 'dod phyir bskal pa bye ba mang por yang / /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob cing 'thob par 'gyur/ /mkhas pas rtag tu thar pa 'dod par gyis/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas la ni
228b1(mdo sde): mchod par byos/ /bu dang bu mo de bzhin gnyen rnams dang / /pha ma chung ma bshes mang skye bo rnams/ /thams cad sgyu ma 'dra bas don med de/ /rtag par gzhan dang gzhan
228b2(mdo sde): du skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar gser dang dngul yang glog dang 'dra/ /'di la snying po 'ga' yang snang ba med/ /byang chub go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /mi rnams 'dren pa la ni mchod

228b4(mdo sde): sgras gang bar gyur nas sems can thams cad la bskul bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag log par lta ba de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod par gyur/ gang dag nga rgyal
228b5(mdo sde): dang | rgyags pa dang / khengs pa dang / 'gying ba de dag ni/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa rnams dang bral bar byed par 'gyur/ gang dag 'dod chags la rjes su spyod cing
228b6(mdo sde): bag med par gyur pa/ de dag ni 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur/ gang dag srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / mi dge ba'i
228b7(mdo sde): chos brgyad la gnas pa de dag thams cad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par gyur/ thams cad kyang rgod pa dang / ku re
229a1(mdo sde): dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / chags pa yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsten
229a2(mdo sde): pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba la spro bar gyur/ thams cad kyang chos nyan par 'dod par gyur to/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
229a3(mdo sde): dang | mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / rgyal po mkhar gyi bdag po dang / rgyal phran dang / stobs kyi 'khor los
229a4(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me

229a6(mdo sde): wA ra NA si zhes bya ba gang na ba dang / a mra srung ba mo'i tshal gang na ba der dor nas bdag gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor

236b2(mdo sde): pas bskor zhing 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu la chos ston par snang ba dang / shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs
236b3(mdo sde): pa du ma seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas chos 'chad cing bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas thams cad
236b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha'i bu de dag dga' bar gyur te/ mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs
236b5(mdo sde): skyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan rnams kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan
236b6(mdo sde): gsum du bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /e ma ye shes ye shes ni/ /ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab sgom/ /ji ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnams//
236b7(mdo sde): 'das nas bskal pa du ma na/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dpa' bo chen po 'di na bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor zhing / /seng ge'i khri la
237a1(mdo sde): bzhugs pa gda'/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba legs pa ste/ /chos mnyan pa yang legs pa yin/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang / /
237a2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'ang de bzhin legs pa yin/ /gang dag 'dir ni bslab 'dzin pa'i/ /lus kyi sdom pa legs pa yin/ /nan tan gyis ni sgrub pa dag /de kun byang chub thob
237a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa rnams/ /'dir ni sems can thar bar mdzad/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin sgyu ma byed pa 'dra/ /
237a4(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad/ /mchod rten dang ni ri mo dang / /sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang / mchod dang bkur
237a5(mdo sde): bsti bya ba'i phyir/ /gang dag mtshan ni dran byed pa/ /byang chub phyir ni gnas pa rnams/ /thams cad thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal
237a6(mdo sde): nas| |dam pa'i chos ni mnyan pa dang / /mchod cing 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin te/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
237a7(mdo sde): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yang dag par bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri bzhi stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
237b1(mdo sde): srog chags nyi khris chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /lha'i bu lnga stong gis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas
237b2(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bdun brgyas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
237b3(mdo sde): la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du dris pa'i lan bshad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par
237b4(mdo sde): bshad de legs mod kyi/ kho bo the tshom cung zad cig skyes kyi/ /gang thos nas sems can rnams kyis yid la byas te/ de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
237b5(mdo sde): las grol bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar kho bos dris pa de
237b6(mdo sde): bstan cing lung ston cig / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis spobs
237b7(mdo sde): pa skyes pa ni legs so/ /khyod gang dang / gang 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan
238a1(mdo sde): thos pa tsam dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti byas pa nyid kyis sdig pa byed pa'i sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
238a2(mdo sde): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gang na bzhugs/ de
238a3(mdo sde): dag la mchod pa ni ji ltar bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi phyir sems can rnams ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang ngan song
238a4(mdo sde): du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
238a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su mchod cing bsti stang bya ba bshad kyi nyon cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+ya snang ba na de bzhin
238a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa yod do/ /'jig
238a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gtsug phud can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams dri ma
238b1(mdo sde): med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba na de bzhin gshegs
238b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi bar bkod pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
238b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i bla ma na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
238b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhregs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na
238b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya
238b6(mdo sde): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rtogs pa dang / blo gros su ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ngan 'gro
238b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag
239a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan gzung ba nyid kyis
239a2(mdo sde): lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams zla ba na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas nyon mongs pa thams
239a3(mdo sde): cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams khyad par thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan
239a4(mdo sde): bzung zhing mchod pas ngan 'gro thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams legs par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad sdug par
239a5(mdo sde): mthong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas 'jig rten pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa
239a6(mdo sde): dga' ba'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi stobs rab tu
239a7(mdo sde): 'joms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa log pa dad sel dang / de bzhin
239b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung dang / rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon
239b2(mdo sde): pa'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du 'jug pa dang / ri
239b3(mdo sde): mo dang / sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin dang /
239b4(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / sdom pa dang / nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur
239b5(mdo sde): ro| |bskal par gnas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'ang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi
239b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba nas/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ /rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang /
239b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems dran pa nyams pa zhig gis sdig pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa dag la skur ba 'debs pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /
240a1(mdo sde): srog gcod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rku ba dang / sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gro ba dang / ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i
240a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi don dang / grogs po dang / gnyen rnams yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs dang / 'jim pa'i sku
240a3(mdo sde): gzugs byed du 'jug cing byed du bcug nas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems gtso bor byas te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par
240a4(mdo sde): gyur nas zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad nas brtsams te bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang /
240a5(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du mchod de/ sems can de dag thar bar bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom
240a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis ni mkhyen/ lha'i snyan gyis ni gsan/ lha'i spyan gyis ni gzigs shing sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar
240a7(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bya ba byed kyi ngan par bya ba mi byed par yongs su bsngo zhing / de ltar sems can ngan song du skyes pa de dag thar
240b1(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba gdab po/ /bshags pa dang / mthol bas sdig pa bsrabs par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
240b2(mdo sde): mtshan thos par gyur cig / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur cig /ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
240b3(mdo sde): sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bdag gi spyod pa dang mthun par spyod par gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang /
240b4(mdo sde): bcangs pa dang / bklag pa dang / mchod pa de'i phyir sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis smon lam gyi mthus sems can mnar med par 'gro ba dang / ngan song
240b5(mdo sde): gsum du skyes pa de dag gi rna bar mtshan rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus kyang sdig pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
240b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gi gzi brjid kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rjes su dran par gyur nas phyis sdig pa'i las byed par mi 'gyur te/ de
240b7(mdo sde): nas sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa de sangs
241a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bar du spyod pa mthun par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mang po dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra
241a2(mdo sde): ste| yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du bsam pa thams cad 'grub ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcod par byed/ bde 'gro'i
241a3(mdo sde): sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo rnams ni 'byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par
241a4(mdo sde): 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pas mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa dag mnyan zhing
241a5(mdo sde): mchod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nyid kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar te bde 'gror bkod par 'gyur na/ gang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir gzhug
241a6(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yon tan de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur na/ de'i bsod
241a7(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i yon tan de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par brjod par sla ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen
241b1(mdo sde): po| de lta bas na yon tan 'di dag la ltos la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /bshad par bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad
241b2(mdo sde): pa mi phyed par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag tu mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ /'khor ba las
241b3(mdo sde): yid skyo zhing bag yod pa dang / 'khor ba skad cig mar yid la byed pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /yang rgyal po chen po/ 'dod pa la brten pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
241b4(mdo sde): mar sdug bsngal ba/ skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i sdug bsngal dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
241b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang / bcad pa dang / gzhom pa dang / brdung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ 'du
241b6(mdo sde): byed thams cad yongs su spangs te 'gro dgos pas/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba gtso bor bya ba dang / chos dang /thar ba 'dod par bya'o/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
241b7(mdo sde): 'khor de dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'jam dpal la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /chos kyi char bab pas bdag cag tshim par
242a1(mdo sde): bgyis/ rangs par bgyis/ byang chub la rab tu bzhag pas bag yod par bgyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ltad
242a2(mdo sde): mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par
242a3(mdo sde): ston pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba po dang / 'chang ba po dang / klog pa po de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos
242a4(mdo sde): dang | rgyan rnams kyis mchod na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
242a5(mdo sde): bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs
242a6(mdo sde): pa la dad pas bcangs pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bstan na des yon tan chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad
242a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ gang dag 'jig rten na nad dang / gnod pa de dag de la thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang / gang 'jig rten na gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang /
242b1(mdo sde): sha za mdangs 'phrog pa de dag thams cad byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gshed byed dang / byad dang / sngags dang / ro langs gzhan gyi gnod pa de dag
242b2(mdo sde): de'i lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
242b3(mdo sde): ma thams cad de la dga' zhing mgu bar gyur nas de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro
242b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rjes yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su skye zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan chen po de brgyad
242b5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mchod pa dang / mngon sum du mchod pas lo 'bum gyi bar du mchod par 'gyur
242b6(mdo sde): ro| |gang yang dzam+bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pas gang bar byas te/ lha'i phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
242b7(mdo sde): me tog dang / mar me dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / sil snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te rjed cing mchod pa bas gang
243a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab
243a2(mdo sde): tu bstan na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
243a3(mdo sde): brgyad pa la gzhog cing / bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar rjed cing mchod pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi sa rnam grangs 'di las
243a4(mdo sde): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la rgyas par byed na de bas 'di ches bsod
243a5(mdo sde): nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /zhing stong
243a6(mdo sde): bye ba gzhan du gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mkhas pa mtha' yas bye ba dag /sems can rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing / /ngan 'gro las ni sems can thar bar
243a7(mdo sde): mdzad/ /stir med las la gnas shing sbyin byed dag /las byas nas ni ngan 'gror song ba rnams/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir chos 'dod pas/ /de bzhin gshegs
243b1(mdo sde): pa 'di dag mchod par bgyi/ /ri mor mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs byos/ /gser dang dngul dang de ltar lugs rnams dang / /'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni byed bcug nas/ /
243b2(mdo sde): mchod pa sna tshogs kyis ni mchod par gyis/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang / /mar me sil snyan dri dang spos kyis mchod/ /shes rab che bas bsngo ba dag kyang gyis//
243b3(mdo sde): mdo sde bshad cing 'dir yang bzhugs par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs dang mdo sde'i gzi brjid kyis/ /sdig pa'i las las sems can de thar gyi/ /bla med byang chub
243b4(mdo sde): reg par gyur bar du/ /dag pa'i gnas su skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing / /dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed mi 'gyur/ /mi yi
243b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di/ /bshad pa des ni bsod nams mang du thob/ /de ni lha rnams kun gyis bsrung bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus 'di la ni nad mi 'byung / /de
243b6(mdo sde): yi rgyal srid kun la gnod mi 'byung / /khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod ni rtag 'dzin
243b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gang zhig mchod cing rjed dang 'drir 'jug dang / /las gzhan med par nyan du 'jug pa ni/ /des ni sangs rgyas yang dag mchod par 'gyur/ /des ni myur
244a1(mdo sde): du byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces
244a2(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni 'di la the tshom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lus 'dis rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bsgrubs nas slar yang sdug
244a3(mdo sde): bsngal bsgrub par 'gyur ram/ 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe skyo bar mi 'gyur ram/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
244a4(mdo sde): dang | sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams myong bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gum/ ji ltar 'tsho/ ji ltar bde ba sgrub par 'gyur/ ji ltar sdug bsngal
244a5(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ltad mo can/ 'di ni las
244a6(mdo sde): kyi rkyen yin par blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'di la gang yang skye ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'tsho ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la rga ba dang / 'chi ba med kyi/ 'tsho
244a7(mdo sde): ba'i khams ni rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so/ /yang las kyi rkyen dang / las kyi gzhis skye ba sna tshogs su 'ongs shing 'phos nas bde ba dang / sdug bsngal
244b1(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur te/ bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa la bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug
244b2(mdo sde): b sngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i 'du shes skyed mod kyi lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du gyur gyi bar du skyo
244b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gos sar pa gyon te/ des de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dang /
244b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal yang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dus gzhan zhig na gos de rnyings shing mugs te dri ma can mthar bshad par gyur ba dang / des de bor ba'i chos can du
244b5(mdo sde): shes nas bor ro/ /bor nas yang gos sar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsal te gyon no/ /des gyon nas kyang las byed cing bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur nas
244b6(mdo sde): d on dam pa'i gos sra zhing brtan la mi shigs shing mi chod pa gyon par ma gyur bar du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'di lta bus bskal pa du ma 'das kyang gos de bgos
244b7(mdo sde): so zhe'am/ bor ro zhes mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog gi /de ni lus kyi dbang du 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'tsho ba'i khams des lus 'jig pa dang /
245a1(mdo sde): 'gyel ba'i mthar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe lus de bor nas yang gsar pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/ de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas
245a2(mdo sde): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rang gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i gos de 'jam pa dang / sra ba dang / rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i
245a3(mdo sde): khams kyis bgo ba lta bu'i lus blangs te/ ji ltar rang gi las kyi rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa bzhin du lha dang / rgyal po dang / sems can dmyal ba dang /
245a4(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lus de'ang 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gro zhing 'tsho ba'i khams kyi yongs
245a5(mdo sde): su btang yang mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog go /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprul ni
245a6(mdo sde): las kyi rkyen gyis dus kyi mthar shun pa de bor nas rang gi lus kyi gzugs kyis 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang shun pa de mi rtog/
245a7(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog go /de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams ni sprul lta bur blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing lo ma dang / 'dab mar ldan par gyur pa
245b1(mdo sde): las| yang dus kyi rkyen gyis 'jig pa dang / ltung bar mthar 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur nas phyis yang dus kyi rkyen gyis myu gu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / me
245b2(mdo sde): tog dang / 'bras bu rnams len te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang / 'gag par blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe
245b3(mdo sde): na sems can dag rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal mang ba dag 'byung ste/ srang dang / gzhal ba la g.yo byed par dga' ba/ 'dod chags
245b4(mdo sde): kyi rjes su spyod pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis sdig pa mang du byed par 'gyur te/ sdig pa mang du byas nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur
245b5(mdo sde): zhing rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes can dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba'i 'du shes can gyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/
245b6(mdo sde): byis pa'i blo can de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi tshol kyi/ gang de lta bu'i sems can de dag la chos ston pa de dag dgod cing kyal ka byed pa mang bar 'gyur gyi/ dad
245b7(mdo sde): par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed de/ de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni sdig pa spyod de/ de dag gis 'tsho ba'i khams des las kyi rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du myong bar 'gyur
246a1(mdo sde): ba'i bgo ba'i lus blangs nas sdug bsngal la dga' ba'i 'du shes bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bka'
246a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta ste/ 'di la su'ang 'chi ba med/ 'tsho ba med/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ las kyi rgyu las
246a3(mdo sde): kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang / 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dka' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mdzad
246a4(mdo sde): nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba yongs su btang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ sems can
246a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba la bkod do/ /de nas de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sa chen g.yos par gyur to/ /ji ltar lhags
246a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / gzhan yang mthu chen mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul chen po mang
246a7(mdo sde): pos lha'i na bza' lnga brgyas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par mchod nas lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin
246b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad nyes pa la nyes so zhes so sor bshags te bslab pa la yi dam bca' bar bya ste/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor
246b2(mdo sde): de dag gis 'di skad du smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba thams cad las slar log pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las sgrol ba/ grol ba thams
246b3(mdo sde): cad la phyag bgyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slan chad bdag cag skye ba'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal myong bar spro bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/

246b5(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ nan tan snying por byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dkon mchog gsum la lhag pa'i bsam pa
246b6(mdo sde): dang ldan par byos shig / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing sgyu ma lta bur shes par byos shig /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la spro bar byos shig /mchod pa dang /

247a1(mdo sde): bskyed par byos shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla mar 'du shes bskyed par byos shig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bya ba dang /

247a5(mdo sde): gcig yud tsam bzung bas kyang sems can rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol zhing bde 'gror 'gro ste ngan 'gror mi 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang dag dgod
247a6(mdo sde): pa dang / ku re dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo rnams yid kyis yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchog tu mos pas rim gro byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pas
247a7(mdo sde): zhugs te/ 'phags pa'i nye bar gnas pa yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas nas gso sbyin yang dag par blangs te spyod pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing bde 'gror
247b1(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / mi'i bde ba myong nas sdug bsngal mthar byas te/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
247b2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ bud med kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa la la zhig nyin gcig gam/ nyi ma phyed dam/ yud tsam yang
247b3(mdo sde): rung ste/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yang dag par len cing bslab pa 'dzin par byed na de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
247b4(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par bzlog te/ /sdug bsngal mthar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
247b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi yi dam 'cha' ba dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa yang dag par len par byed pa ni yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dang ldan pa yin na/ byis pa
247b6(mdo sde): dag gis ni de mi shes so/ /de nas de'i tshe na bar snang las sgra chen po byung bar gyur pa dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis e ma'o/ /e ma'o zhes dam pa'i sgra byung nas me tog dang /
247b7(mdo sde): dri'i char chen po rab tu phab bo/ /sems can 'bum tshang ba rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
248a1(mdo sde): bkod do/ /gzhan yang / sems can bye ba rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba yid la byed cing sems dang

248a4(mdo sde): cag dbugs phyung ste/ bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams thos te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos smra ba dang /

248b5(mdo sde): skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bud+d+ha d+harma a tsi na t+ya ni rde shA/ bod skad du/
248b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de na
248b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
249a1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam las byung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab

249a7(mdo sde): thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen pas byang chub sems
249b1(mdo sde): dpa' ut+pa la'i snying po la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shugs su gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas snang
249b2(mdo sde): bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis kun tu khyab par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la gnas par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'jug cing 'bab pa

249b5(mdo sde): ut+pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa rtogs shing shes nas/ yid la chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
249b6(mdo sde): spyod pas chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su rtogs shing sangs rgyas
249b7(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po bgos nas sems can thams cad la lta zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yi dam
250a1(mdo sde): gyi dkyil 'khor brtsams pa dang / skad cig ma'i mthar song ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / mi zad pa mthong ba
250a2(mdo sde): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du bya ba dang / gzungs thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa rtogs nas ut+pa la'i snying po byang chub sems
250a3(mdo sde): dpas sangs rgyas kyi mthus pad+ma'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dpag tu

250b4(mdo sde): med pa rnam par dag cing ma brnyogs pas thams cad du 'gro ba spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i spyan mtha' dang
250b5(mdo sde): dbus med pas spyan mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chags pa med pa'i snyan mtha' dang dbus med pas

250b7(mdo sde): kyi mnga' mchog brnyes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags che zhing srab pa mtha' dang dbus med pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings su sgra dbyangs kyis 'gro ba
251a1(mdo sde): dang | sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' dang / dbus med pas las kyi lhag ma ma lus shing sems can gyi khams thams
251a2(mdo sde): cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa ston cing dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yid kyi las mtha' dang dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings
251a3(mdo sde): kyi sku dbyer med cing dus gsum la ma chags pas rjes su 'gro ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas
251a4(mdo sde): pa mtha' dang dbus med pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / cho 'phrul mi zad pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
251a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa mtha' dang / dbus med pas brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs shing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa
251a6(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ye shes kyis
251a7(mdo sde): rnam par rol ba dang / chos kyi yongs su rdzogs shing ye shes kyis rnam par rol ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa ste/ kye rgyal pa'i
251b1(mdo sde): sras| 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu'o/ /kye
251b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams
251b3(mdo sde): thams cad du mngon par dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe ston pa dang / skad cig
251b4(mdo sde): la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par byung bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing mngon par byang chub
251b5(mdo sde): par ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas
251b6(mdo sde): kyis sems can rnams ji ltar smin zhing 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas mgu bar mdzad pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems
251b7(mdo sde): can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i dmigs pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du brjod
252a1(mdo sde): du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan zhing / khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten
252a2(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad du thams cad rnam par dag pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
252a3(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung ba dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus dang / dad pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa'i rim pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs mngon par mkhyen pa ston pa
252a4(mdo sde): ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs
252a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus las mi 'da' ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
252a6(mdo sde): las mi 'da' ba dang / dus de rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yang dag par dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par smin pa las mi 'da' ba
252a7(mdo sde): dang | sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
252b1(mdo sde): dus mkhyen nas sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du cho 'phrul ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can rnams ji ltar dad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas
252b2(mdo sde): kyi sku'i byin gyi rlabs ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas
252b3(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas ji ltar rab tu dang pa'i sems can rnams rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs
252b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas nyon mongs shing gdul dka' ba'i sems can la mi btsams pas 'dul ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen
252b5(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus de nas dus las mi 'da'
252b6(mdo sde): ba'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ skyil mo krung gcig gis 'jig
252b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig
253a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang ba dang / sku gcig gis sku thams cad du ston pa dang / phyogs gcig gis gnas dmigs pas
253a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku dang / ye shes gcig gis chos thams cad bsgribs pa med par chud pa dang / dus mkhyen nas sems
253a3(mdo sde): gcig bskyed pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyis ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing gom pa gcig la de kho na nyid ston pa dang /
253a4(mdo sde): dus gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pas khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'dre zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
253a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gcig ste/ gnyis su med par spyod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi
253a6(mdo sde): khyab pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la
253a7(mdo sde): mi gnas par 'jug cing smon lam mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / lus med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad gnyis su med pas
253b1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / sems can bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad
253b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul thams cad ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang / 'gyur
253b3(mdo sde): ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / yul thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed cing las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du med
253b4(mdo sde): pa'i dbyings su mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'ang ma yin par mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad skye
253b5(mdo sde): ba med pa la skye zhing 'god pa'i mtshan nyid rkyen dang / 'du ba tshogs te byung ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas
253b6(mdo sde): kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ dus gsum
253b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
254a1(mdo sde): su gtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / gzungs dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
254a2(mdo sde): su gtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang //
254a3(mdo sde): snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par
254a4(mdo sde): gzigs shing rtag tu mnyam pas phan par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad 'dul ba sangs rgyas
254a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings la mi chags par gnas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / skad cig
254a6(mdo sde): la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / nyi ma gcig la dus gsum
254a7(mdo sde): gyi bskal pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
254b1(mdo sde): su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdud kyi rgol
254b2(mdo sde): ba bcom zhing gtor ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang / gzhan mur 'dug dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod
254b3(mdo sde): pa shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang / sems can thams cad 'dul zhing tshim par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i
254b4(mdo sde): chos kyi bla bre chen po dang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka'
254b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu phigs shing mkhyen pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang /
254b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par phye ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin
254b7(mdo sde): tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i
255a1(mdo sde): gnas dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / sems can gti mug med cing dang ba'i sems can thos pas 'dul ba shin tu bzod par
255a2(mdo sde): dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig bzhin du ba spu'i khams thams cad nas rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam
255a3(mdo sde): pa de snyed gshegs pa gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gnas 'di bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra
255a4(mdo sde): ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems can 'byin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
255a5(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas gcig gi rab tu phra ba'i rdul la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
255a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rang bzhin gyis 'tsher bas chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing sems can 'dul ba rgyun mi gcod la gtong ba med kyang gnod
255a7(mdo sde): pa med cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang gnod pa med de/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul de rgyas par byas pa'ang med/ 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur byas pa'ang med pa
255b1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs shing mkhyen nas gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po'o/ /mun pa med pa'i
255b2(mdo sde): dbyings su de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mun pa dang bcas pa snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab rib med pa/ rnam par rab rib med pa'i
255b3(mdo sde): gnas la sems can pha rol 'dzud pa dang / de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rjes su song ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
255b4(mdo sde): shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos kyi bla bre chen po bcu'o//
255b5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
255b6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi che ba shin tu bsgrubs te/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs sngon nas mtho bas 'das
255b7(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
256a1(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa la mi gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha' ma'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
256a2(mdo sde): kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la gnas pa bcom zhing dus gsum la mi gnas par
256a3(mdo sde): spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sna tshogs kyi blang ba med pas sangs rgyas
