256a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyan gcig pa'i ngo bo ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs
256a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams zad mi shes pas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang
256a6(mdo sde): ldan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi dbang gis
256a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs dang / kha dog mtha' med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chags pa med par bzhugs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
256b1(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig pa med pa bzhi brnyes te/ bag tsha ba med par gnas nas
256b2(mdo sde): khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ stag chen po ltar rgol ba rnam par gnon cing / me mar lta bu'i kun tu rtog pas chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che
256b3(mdo sde): ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/ 'on kyang
256b4(mdo sde): ming mang po rnam par rigs pas sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas sbyong ste/ ji ltar zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de srid du yun ring po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyang rung
256b5(mdo sde): ste| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin gnas bskrun pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma
256b6(mdo sde): tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las ring ba'i 'jig rten
256b7(mdo sde): gyi khams na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran na sku ston par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
257a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
257a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi che ba ste/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam
257a3(mdo sde): par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi smon lam shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs par
257a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ma chags pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
257a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad phung po las byung ba'i mdzad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
257a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yog 'khor shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
257a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku
257b1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
257b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa dang / rnam par gnon par mdzad pa dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
257b3(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom
257b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas ston pa dang / dus thams cad
257b5(mdo sde): du sems can shes kyi sems can la chos ston pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas la sems rab tu dang ba'i sems can la tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
257b6(mdo sde): dus thams cad du chos mi 'gyur ba'i lam du 'das pa'i sems can la ye shes rtogs par mdzad pa dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
257b7(mdo sde): pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags par bzhud pa dang / dus thams cad du sems can thams
258a1(mdo sde): cad la thugs rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs pa dang /
258a2(mdo sde): dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas sna tshogs su sprul par bzhugs pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs
258a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
258a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i
258a5(mdo sde): tshul mi zad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
258a6(mdo sde): 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pa brnyes pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul gyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs
258a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i ye shes
258b1(mdo sde): kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog gi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pas sngon gyi mtha' nas smon
258b2(mdo sde): lam spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mthar 'gro ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang
258b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can ma lus pa'i ris thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad
258b4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi gnon pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
258b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di
258b6(mdo sde): ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin cing mngon par byung ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams
258b7(mdo sde): cad mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad la thugs rje che ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
259a1(mdo sde): 'das rnams tshad med pa'i stobs bcu thams cad dang ldan pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa'i
259a2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar zhugs pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs
259a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
259a4(mdo sde): pas 'dul ba'i sems can la 'dul ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med par spyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la dbang
259a5(mdo sde): ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sems can btul te smin par mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'i phyir sangs rgyas
259a6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs
259a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la mtha'
259b1(mdo sde): yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can
259b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la gdams pa rjes su bstan pa mtha' yas
259b3(mdo sde): par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams rnam par spyod pa'i nan tan mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
259b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gdams pa mtha' yas pa bstan pa la 'god pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rim pa'i khyad par bzhin smon
259b5(mdo sde): lam gyis 'byung ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la sdud pa dang / 'gyur ba mtha' yas par
259b6(mdo sde): ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa bzhin ston pa'i sgo
259b7(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bskal
260a1(mdo sde): par 'byung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthus bsdus nas yongs su snang zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rig
260a2(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom
260a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku bstan pas kyang sems can rnams la
260a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas
260a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi 'dzin pas
260a6(mdo sde): kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gis kyang sems can rnams
260a7(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi yul gyi dbang gis brtsam pa'i yul thams cad kyis kyang sems
260b1(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan gyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
260b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing rtsom pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
260b3(mdo sde): su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
260b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom
260b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing smon lam brtan pa dang / gnyis su med par bshad pa ji ltar smras
260b6(mdo sde): pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dang po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson zhing ma zhum par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par 'gro zhing
260b7(mdo sde): yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gnyis so/ /brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dul
261a1(mdo sde): bar 'os pa'i sems can gcig gzigs na'ang mi bzhugs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs te/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi
261a2(mdo sde): snying po gsum mo/ /sems can gyi sems mi 'phrog pa la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa dang / sems can sems rab tu dang ba la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa ste/ 'di ni
261a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bzhi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ gang
261a4(mdo sde): n as bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
261a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems mi 'jig ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyis snying po lnga'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar 'jug
261a6(mdo sde): cing 'jig rten gyi phyir mi spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po drug go /thog mar sems kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rjes su lus
261a7(mdo sde): kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las la slob ste/ thams cad mkhyen par bsngo zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod par ma yin pas bla na med pa
261b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bdun no/ /mtha' yas par 'od thams cad kun tu snang
261b2(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba thams cad mtshungs pa thams cad mtshungs par thams
261b3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po brgyad do/ /'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad spong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba
261b4(mdo sde): la mi 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i smon lam thams cad mtshungs par 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig
261b5(mdo sde): cing spros pa thams cad med pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dgu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul la dad pas dka' ba dang / dka' thub kyi sems bskyed do/ /sangs
261b6(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam par sdug bsngal thams cad rig pas rig cing stobs dang / sa bcu'i bar gyi mthar byung
261b7(mdo sde): ba ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu'o/ /kye rgyal
262a1(mdo sde): ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
262a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na
262a3(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na 'chag bzhengs bzhugs pa'ang mi chags
262a4(mdo sde): par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na chos ston pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
262a5(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / dga' ldan gnas su gshegs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos
262a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
262a7(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sems can ma lus
262b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par gzigs shing sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la cho 'phrul gsum ston cing sems can 'dul ba'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig gis tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa chen po spyod pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang /
262b2(mdo sde): sangs
262b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sems can tshad med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad la ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
262b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas bsdus pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
262b5(mdo sde): mi chags par spyod pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs
262b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
262b7(mdo sde): yan lag drug cu mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing gsung gi yan lag brgya rtsa lnga yongs su bzung ba brgya stong du mas brgyan pa mtha' dang / mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam
263a1(mdo sde): par dag pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / don tshig 'bru rab tu dang ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa chen pos mi 'jigs shing bag tsha
263a2(mdo sde): ba med par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can thams cad la thos pa dang / snang ba dang / shes par mdzad pa dang / sems can
263a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs kyi rim pa so sor slong zhing 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog
263a4(mdo sde): dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yid kyi las stobs bcus brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin chen pos rgyas shing sangs rgyas kyi
263a5(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan te chags pa med pa'i yul gyi spyod yul ba/ chos kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
263a6(mdo sde): cad kyi yan lag brnyes te chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi dus gsum ma lus pa dang / chos
263a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbyings dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan
263b1(mdo sde): dam pa mchog bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa'i 'od bye ba khrag khrig rab tu btang nas/ 'od zer brjod du med pa gcig nas gcig tu 'od
263b2(mdo sde): zer gyi dra bar bskor cing zhing med bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad du snang bar byas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa'i rigs ston pa/ 'dzums pa ston pa'i
263b3(mdo sde): z hal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs du ma kha dog brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa byung bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa ma lus
263b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams la snang bas shes par byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral
263b5(mdo sde): zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gdon mi za ba phyir mi ldog pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bzhugs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas dga' ba med par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni
263b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhan du lung ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa
263b7(mdo sde): med par mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab rib med pas 'jig rten thams cad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /tshad
264a1(mdo sde): med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku sgrib pa med cing rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la ma chags pa/ mtha' med
264a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dbus med par chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten thams cad de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ 'jig rten thams
264a3(mdo sde): cad 'jig rten las 'das par spyod par 'jug pa'i tshig gi lam chad cing brjod du med par chud pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs
264a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od tshad med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams
264a5(mdo sde): cad dbyer med pa'i 'od/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan kha dog sna tshogs du ma'i rkyen kun nas mi phrog pa'i 'od/ 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i 'od/
264a6(mdo sde): tshad med pa sgrib pa med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod thams cad khang pa ltar gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan bla na med pa mchog
264a7(mdo sde): dam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi kha dog mtha' yas pa/ kha dog 'tsher ba/ kha dog rang bzhin gyis 'tsher ba/ kha dog tshad med pa/ sems can ma lus pa thams
264b1(mdo sde): cad kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par byed pa'i kha dog ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi zlog pa'i kha dog dang / kha dog thams cad kyi mchog brnyes
264b2(mdo sde): pas de las gzhan pa'i kha dog dang / khams gsum gyi kha dog thams cad khyab pa zil gyis mnan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog
264b3(mdo sde): dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba shin tu rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs dge ba rin po che
264b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma smad pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang / de bzhin
264b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rigs sgribs pa med cing rigs rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung zhing 'dus pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
264b6(mdo sde): kyi rigs dang / gdung rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis brgyan pa shin tu dang zhing rnyog
264b7(mdo sde): pa med pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sku'i 'du byed nyam rangs pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba blta bas mi ngoms pas/ thugs rje chen po'i thugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin gnas dang /
265a1(mdo sde): skyabs med kyi mchog bla na med pa so sor 'dzin pa rnams la thugs brtse zhing phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes chen po'i
265a2(mdo sde): byin gyis rlob pa bsod nams chen po 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams mtha' yas pa'i zhing / sems can thams cad la yon tan dang / ye shes kyi phung po thams
265a3(mdo sde): cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams kyi mtha'i rgyan mchog
265a4(mdo sde): dam pa bla na med pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// //'phags
265a5(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po dbang gi chos bcu ste/
265a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi bdag po dbang gis chos thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang / mtha' med pa'i tshig dang / 'bru la spobs
265a7(mdo sde): pa chags pa med pas chos ma lus pa thams cad yongs su ston pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dang po'o/ /
265b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos ji ltar sems can gnas pa'i 'dul zhing yongs su smin pa de ltar smon lam dang / chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i chos
265b2(mdo sde): gnyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kyang sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa med pa/ tshad med
265b3(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa dang / sad pa dang /
265b4(mdo sde): 'phen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig dang / phyogs gcig nas gcig tu 'jog kyang sems can gyi khams kun nas gti mi mug cing the tshom med de/ 'di ni
265b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos gsum mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ye
265b6(mdo sde): shes kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ rgyan sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhab lhub dang / rgyan ston pa dang /
265b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i bskal par 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa med pa'i lus su ston cing lhab lhub dang / rgyan thams cad kyi kha dog mi zad par ston pa dang /
266a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu kun 'brang bar byin gyis rlob pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
266a2(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bzhi'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs nas sems
266a3(mdo sde): can gcig gi phyir brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par skyil mo krung mi 'jig pa gang zag de la dgongs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / thugs la
266a4(mdo sde): skyo ba mi mnga' zhing 'dul ba'i dus su de las mi 'da' ste/ ji ltar gang zag re re la'ang de bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar
266a5(mdo sde): tshe la dbang ba byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga'/ skyo ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma
266a6(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi phyir rim pas rab tu skyong ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang
266a7(mdo sde): gi chos lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'brang zhing gshegs
266b1(mdo sde): nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur ba rgya mtsho med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu thams cad byin gyis brlabs
266b2(mdo sde): pa dang / phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dra ba bzlog cing tshad med par gshegs te/ chos kyi dbyings ston pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
266b3(mdo sde): to| 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos drug go / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma la
266b4(mdo sde): s ems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i phyir sems kyi skad cig ma la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang 'di ltar mngon du
266b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/ mngon du rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ slob
266b6(mdo sde): pa'i sa la gnas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgribs par med par rtogs shing rigs pa'ang med de/ sems
266b7(mdo sde): can 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa chen po'i yul rgyun mi gcod cing dpag tu med pa'i ye shes brnyes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
267a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bdun no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos gang spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
267a2(mdo sde): pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas
267a3(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de sku'i skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang sku'i skye mched kyis sangs
267a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de'i bar gyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad
267a5(mdo sde): du sna tshogs su rtsom zhing 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par phye ba brnyes te/ de bzhin du rtsom pa re res sgrub cing sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
267a6(mdo sde): rtsom pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du rtsom pa ma lus pa thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos
267a7(mdo sde): brgyad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang pos rang gi sku'i ba spu gcig gi pu gar sems can re re'i lus kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
267b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ltar che ba'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bcug cing nang du 'dus par mdzad de/ de la sems can re res kyang bskal pa grangs med par gnas
267b2(mdo sde): kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa'ang med/ kun tu gnod pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu gom pa gcig gis
267b3(mdo sde): gshegs te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gis sangs rgyas byung zhing sangs rgyas byung ba dang / de dag gis brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das te/ de'i dbang gis
267b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi snying pos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shes so/ /de la ba spu'i bu ga'i sems can brjod du med pa dag gcig nas gcig
267b5(mdo sde): tu sangs rgyas su gyur te/ gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston/ gcig nas gcig
267b6(mdo sde): tu 'das pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu ma 'ongs pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu da ltar byung ba brjod du med pa snang bar byed/ mtha' dang / dbus
267b7(mdo sde): med pa'i nam mkha'i khams skabs byed pa ston/ sems can thams cad 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / thams cad skye ba'i skye mched dang / bsgribs pa med pa dang / 'dod
268a1(mdo sde): chags la yongs su spyod par 'jug pa mkhyen te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dgu'o/ /
268a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag pos chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan te pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i gdan la de bzhin gshegs
268a3(mdo sde): pa re re bzhugs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / sku dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
268a4(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa ston te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pa de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par sems can gyi snying po re
268a5(mdo sde): re sems kyi skad cig ma la byin gyis rlob bo/ /sems kyi skad cig ma gcig ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i le'u
268a6(mdo sde): dang | rnam par dag cing mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
268a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rtsom pa sna tshogs kyi rim pa dang / med bcu rdul
268b1(mdo sde): yab brjod du med pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa dang / sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs med pa dang / rigs med bcu rdul yab tshad med pa dang / grangs med
268b2(mdo sde): pa'i dus 'gyur ba dang / mi chags pa ston pa dang / tshad med pa'i blo rgyas pa'i dad pa dang / skad cig ma sna tshogs dang / gnas med pa dang / skad cig ma bsam gyis mi khyab
268b3(mdo sde): pa dang / tshad med par gshegs pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma dang / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la thams cad ston te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod du mdzad
268b4(mdo sde): pa ni mi mnga'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
268b5(mdo sde): kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu
268b6(mdo sde): ste| bcu gang zhe na/ gang gis bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan mtshan re re nas yongs su dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
268b7(mdo sde): rgya ste| 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
269a1(mdo sde): rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
269a2(mdo sde): dang | sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon
269a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par
269a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bdag po 'gro ba thams cad gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang
269a5(mdo sde): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
269a6(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
269a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad gti mug med par ston pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
269b1(mdo sde): dang | sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs
269b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
269b3(mdo sde): kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la
269b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen nas spros pa med pa dang / dge ba dang / sangs
269b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston cing snang bar mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
269b6(mdo sde): kyis chos thams cad bltar med pa dang / phan tshun shes par mi rung ba dang / ma bcing ba dang / ma grol ba dang / gzung du med pa dang / reg par mi rung ba dang / ma byung
269b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na dang / ma nor
270a1(mdo sde): pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i chos thams cad dang / bdag med pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i chos rnams kyi de kho na'i mtha' la
270a2(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i dbang du gyur pa de la dbang gis chen po bslabs te/ bslab pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing chos thams cad la gzigs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
270a3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral zhing mtshan ma thams cad
270a4(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa/ mtshan ma mngon par mkhyen pas mi chags pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid smra ba'i tshul gyis rjes su song ba/ grangs med pa'i gzugs
270a5(mdo sde): kyi mtshan pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi zhing thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang / spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad par ston pa/ mun pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po yang dag
270a6(mdo sde): par rab tu 'chang ba mun pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sgron ma chen pos snang ba ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas
270a7(mdo sde): pa gsum pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / chos kyi
270b1(mdo sde): dbyings la mi gnas pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba snang bar mdzad pa/ brjod du med par bstan
270b2(mdo sde): pa| de ltar tshad med pa'i rigs kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyir lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul kun tu gzigs pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
270b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ blang ba med pa dang /
270b4(mdo sde): rgya med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu song ba ma nges pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod dang / grangs kyi spyod pa las log par tshogs mtha' yas pa
270b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang / sna tshogs kyi rim pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'i rjes su song ba/ bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lta ba tshad med
270b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams 'dul zhing rnam par rig par byed pa ste/ 'di ni
270b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa lnga pa'o/ /chos thams cad bltar med pa dang / sna tshogs med par song ba de ni rim pa med par song
271a1(mdo sde): ba| ma byung bar song ba/ mtshan nyid med par song ba/ sna tshogs med par song ba/ rgyan med par song ba/ blang ba med par song ba/ ngo
271a2(mdo sde): bo nyid med par song zhing chos thams cad mkhyen te/ chos kyi klong las nges par 'byin pa rab tu mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'gal bar mdzad pa/ yang dag
271a3(mdo sde): pa'i ngo bo nyid med par lta ba/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ ye shes kyis ma lus par gzigs pa/ chos thams cad dbang gis snang bar mdzad
271a4(mdo sde): cing de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi 'pho ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /dus gcig tu mtshan ma
271a5(mdo sde): gcig phan tshun rtogs shing mkhyen pa de chos gsha' mar 'jug pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa rnam par dag pa/ chos gsha' ma nyid dang / dus
271a6(mdo sde): thams cad du mi gnas pa de la nyi ma gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya dang / bskal pa sdud pa dang 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'ang ma yin/
271a7(mdo sde): ldog pa'ang ma yin/ tshad med pa'i dus dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gyi dus dang / snga dro dang / nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang / phyem red dang / srod dang / nam gyi gung
271b1(mdo sde): dang | tho rengs kyi dus dang / nyi ma dang / grangs su gtogs pa'i dus dang / zhag bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus dang / zla ba gcig dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya'i dus dang /
271b2(mdo sde): bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ brjod du med pa'i dus dang / phyi ma'i dus kyi mtha'i bar du chos ston te/ chos kyi 'khor lo la
271b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'ang med/ ldog pa'ang med/ rgyun kyang mi gcod/ sbyor ba'ang med/ mtshams su'ang mi 'gyur/ mi 'dor/ mi 'pho/ mi g.yo/ ring ba'ang ma yin/ de mtha'
271b4(mdo sde): la'ang gnas pa ma yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis thabs la mkhas pa bdun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
271b5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / tshad med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa
271b6(mdo sde): dang | so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gnas pa med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par
271b7(mdo sde): rig pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa kun nas gzung ba med pa dang / de kho na nyid so so yang dag par rig pa dang / tshig dang / tshul dang / rtog pa so so'i yang dag par
272a1(mdo sde): rig pa dang / chos thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ji ltar bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang po dang / ji ltar btags
272a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams dang / chos kyi gzhung gi mtshams ston pa dang / de dang de dag tu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi thog ma
272a3(mdo sde): dang | bar ma dang / tha ma'i mdo yang dag par rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /ming med
272a4(mdo sde): pa dang / ming dang / rigs dang / 'byung ba'ang chos thams cad kyi ming dang / 'byed pa dang / khams 'bar ba dang / mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
272a5(mdo sde): 'das pa med pa'i ming dang / ma 'ongs pa med pa'i ming dang / da ltar byung ba med pa'i ming dang / sems can med pa'i ming dang / zhing med pa'i ming dang / chos
272a6(mdo sde): med pa'i ming dang / yon tan med pa'i ming dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa'i ming dang / grangs
272a7(mdo sde): med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang / ma byung ba'i ming dang / mi 'gog pa'i ming dang / med pa'i ming dang / med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang / gcig ma yin pa'i ming
272b1(mdo sde): dang | rnam pa thams cad ma yin pa'i ming rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni phyogs ma yin/ brda ma yin/ ngag gi lam gyi sgra dang bral ba/ sgra byung ba
272b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis ma bsgrubs pa/ ma bskyed pa dang / sna tshogs su bskyed pa dang / rnam pa gcig ma yin pa dang / rnam pa mang po ma yin pa dang / smra ba thams cad brjod
272b3(mdo sde): du med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ kun tu mi rtogs pa'i yul mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ rtog pa dang / kun tu rtogs pa dang / yongs su rtog pa
272b4(mdo sde): thams cad 'gags pa/ smra ba thams cad la mi gnas pa gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa dgu'o/ /gzugs
272b5(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad ma skyes par mkhyen te/ tshor ba ma yin/ spros pa ma yin/ grangs ma yin/ 'du shes kyi spyod pa ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ len pa ma yin/ rnam par
272b6(mdo sde): shes pa ma yin te/ rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu mkhyen/ skye mched med par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'jigs
272b7(mdo sde): pa dang / chos thams cad ldang ba med do/ /rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ chos thams cad dben pa/ las ma yin pa/ spyod pa med pa las byung ba/ ma skyes
273a1(mdo sde): pa| ma byung ba/ grangs med par rtogs pa/ yod pa ma yin pa med pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
273a2(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba ma yin/ ming med pa/ gsha' ma ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa/ yongs su mi gnas pa/ yongs su smin pa ma yin pa/ dul ba ma yin pa/ sems can med
273a3(mdo sde): pa| sems can med pa ma yin pa/ srog med pa/ srog med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen med pa/ rkyen med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang / 'du ba med pa ma yin par chos thams cad
273a4(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ tshogs gsum pa rnam par gnas pas nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par
273a5(mdo sde): nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
273a6(mdo sde): yul chen po ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
273a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs yangs pa/
273b1(mdo sde): tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung par mi nus pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /
273b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' dang / chos
273b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' med pa dang / kha dog tshad
273b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / gzi brjid tshad med pa dang / snang ba tshad med pa dang / dbyings tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshang med pa dang / sgra sgrogs pa rnam par rig
273b5(mdo sde): pa tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi yul tshad med pa dang / mtha' dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa rjes su 'dzin pa dang
273b6(mdo sde): bdud du bcas/ tshangs par bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / skye dgu dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa/ mi
273b7(mdo sde): 'phrogs pa'i byams pa chen po'i sbyod yul ba/ snying rje chen po la phyogs pa'i mtha' la phyogs pas sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/ gzhan mtho ris su skye ba'i sems can
274a1(mdo sde): rjes su 'dzin pa/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyi dbang po phun sum tshogs pa dbang po rnam par dag pa dang / sems can shes yongs su dag pa'i
274a2(mdo sde): sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin
274a3(mdo sde): pa| 'gro ba thams cad las 'byung ba'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdzogs
274a4(mdo sde): pa'o| |dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho zhing yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe dang / bdag gi lus su skye ba dang / sgyu ma lta bur spyod pa dang /
274a5(mdo sde): sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la thug pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i rnam par rig pa dang / yul nam mkha' ltar tshad med par song ba/ 'dod pa lta bur skye ba la ma chags pa
274a6(mdo sde): smig rgyu dang mnyam par snang ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la 'brang ba/ gnas med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam
274a7(mdo sde): par dag pa/ bla bre dang / rgyan chen po'i mdzod bdag gi lus skye ba'i mtha' yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po
274b1(mdo sde): ches mchod pa'i gnas chen po la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yid la byed pa chen po'i byin gyi
274b2(mdo sde): rlabs kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rnam par sprul pa chen po'i mdzod ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil
274b3(mdo sde): 'khor gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ma las skyes pa de la gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yul chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu brnyes
274b4(mdo sde): pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
274b5(mdo sde): chen po la rnam par spyod cing mnyam par 'jog pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de dang / de dag las bzhengs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad
274b6(mdo sde): pa dang / thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tham dang / spyod pa dang po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i mtha'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sa 'di
274b7(mdo sde): nas gnyis kyi bar du thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas phyis 'jig rten gyi grangs la shes par ston pa dang / gzi brjid sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas
275a1(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpar gyur
275a2(mdo sde): pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig
275a3(mdo sde): rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
275a4(mdo sde): dang | sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten kun dang / phyogs thams cad du rgya mtsho'i rgyun
275a5(mdo sde): dang | rigs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / zhing dang / dus ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / las kyi
275a6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
275a7(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang / rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sprul pa chen po dang / rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang /
275b1(mdo sde): chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gnyis pa'o/ /dge bar spyod pa las
275b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba thams cad dang / ye shes dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba bstan pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can 'dul zhing rjes su chud par
275b3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la dogs pa'i slas ston pa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags
275b4(mdo sde): dang bral te gnas la gnas pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar so sor rtog pa dang / srid pa thams cad dang / mi dang / srid par 'byung ba
275b5(mdo sde): la rtog pa dang / dngos po thams cad ye shes su 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos slas ltar 'gro
275b6(mdo sde): ba la rnam par lta ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems yul la so sor rtog pa dang / dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten las mngon par dga' ba shes par byed pa dang / btang
275b7(mdo sde): snyoms chen pos sems la dbang bsgyur zhing 'jug par byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bdag la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa
276a1(mdo sde): thams cad du lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / thams cad du gnas pa med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / g.yog 'khor thams
276a2(mdo sde): cad rnam par dag par nan tan byed pa dang / chos ston cing smra ba rjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po smad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa rtogs pa ji ltar spyod pa'i
276a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ston pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa
276a4(mdo sde): dang | ji ltar yongs su smin pa 'dul ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa grangs med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa las mi ldog par ston pa dang / spyod
276a5(mdo sde): pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyi chos snang bar byed pa dang / gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa byed pa dang / snying rje chen po skyes pa'i chos kyi sprin
276a6(mdo sde): mngon par 'bebs par byed pa dang / sbrang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pa la 'jug cing cho 'phrul gsum yongs su 'bebs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la lta
276a7(mdo sde): ba rnam par rig cing slas kyi dbus na 'dug pa ston pa dang / de las mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa dang / ye shes chen po
276b1(mdo sde): la gnas pas gnon cing sgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs mkhas pa ste/ lus kyi las shin
276b2(mdo sde): tu rnam par dag pa dang / ngag gis mi 'phro ba'i ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sems
276b3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o/ /mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas tshad med
276b4(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ 'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing 'jig rten gnas pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten mngon par chags par 'gyur bar byed
276b5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi grangs mi rtog go zhes shes par byed pa dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par chags pa zlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba'i sred pa gcod
276b6(mdo sde): pa dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'jig rten spyod du 'jug pa dang / don thams cad rjes su dran par byed pa dang / 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir 'brang bar byed pa dang / khyim pa'i mtshan
276b7(mdo sde): ma yongs su gtong bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i
277a1(mdo sde): yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa dang / ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor so sor rnyed par byed cing sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i
277a2(mdo sde): rab rib la lta ba dang / bdag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar khrid pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'du zhing sangs rgyas las
277a3(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye dgu thams cad la bsngags pa dang / bdag ye shes kyi don mthong ba'i ston pa dang / sems can rnams la rnam par dag pa'i sgo brjod pa dang / sems
277a4(mdo sde): can rnams la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgo sgrub tu 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang / mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal
277a5(mdo sde): mtshan kun sgreng bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o/ /mdzad pa dang / ye shes du ma dang rab tu ldan pas byang
277a6(mdo sde): chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin nas byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad thugs su chud de/ bdud kyi
277a7(mdo sde): stobs rab tu bcom zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus ba thams cad du khyab par byed pa dang / byin gyi rlabs mi zad pa'i
277b1(mdo sde): mthas mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang / tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang / thams
277b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du spras pa'i gdan yongs su gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus
277b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rig par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog rab tu bsnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa'i 'khor gyi
277b4(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / yang dag pa'i khyad par gyi smon lam la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la dgongs pa dang / zab mo'i byang chub
277b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' la chos zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rtsom pa dang / brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang
277b6(mdo sde): zhing sna tshogs kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi yul
277b7(mdo sde): du byas pa dang / sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dbyer med pas 'byung ba'i sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
278a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas shing yon tan thams cad kyi khyad par ma lus pa'i mtha' rab tu rnyed de 'dug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
278a2(mdo sde): du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
278a3(mdo sde): cad du 'gro ba dang / yongs su smin pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'dul ba thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol par 'gro ba dang / 'gro
278a4(mdo sde): pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par chud par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
278a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon
278a6(mdo sde): par shes par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / ma lus pa thams cad du ma lus par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po'i tshul gyis
278a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod dang / mun pa med pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyi sgo snang ba'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / nam mkha'i ngos ltar chags pa
278b1(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgribs pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / sems
278b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos snang bar byed pa'i dus gsum
278b3(mdo sde): du 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gcig tu snyug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis 'khor
278b4(mdo sde): lo dang / de la sogs pa grangs med pa rnams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo
278b5(mdo sde): bskor ro/ /'di ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
278b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa drug pa'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can
278b7(mdo sde): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / dri za'i
279a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lto 'phye
279a2(mdo sde): chen po'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / sha za'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
279a3(mdo sde): mdzad de/ gang 'di grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g.yo zhing 'od zer gyi snang bas long ba rnams ni so sor mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni so sor sgra thos/ smyon pa rnams
279a4(mdo sde): ni so sor dran pa rnyed/ gcer bu rnams kyang so sor gos rnyed/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni so sor bde ba thob/ sil snyan dang / brdung ba rnams ma brdungs par yid du 'ong
279a5(mdo sde): ba'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang / brdung ba ma brdungs pa dang / 'phyang 'phrul rnams 'phyang ba dang / brdungs pa'i sgra dang / bram ze sna tshogs mang po rnams kyi sgra skad yid
279a6(mdo sde): du 'ong ba dang / lta bas mi ngoms shing mi mthun pa med pa gzugs kyi sku ston pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
279a7(mdo sde): dang | mtshan dang / dpe byad bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / kun tu gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / brkyad
279b1(mdo sde): ba dang / bskum pas kyang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / bzhugs pa dang /
279b2(mdo sde): gzims pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / chos 'chad pa dang / cang mi gsung bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom
279b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas
279b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa grangs med
279b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub sems
279b6(mdo sde): dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'byung zhing skye ba dang / smra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
279b7(mdo sde): pa mthong ba dang / smra ba shin tu dkon pa dang / dkar po'i chos thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang / sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
280a1(mdo sde): pa kha dog mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
280a2(mdo sde): sems can gyi chogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhing thams cad la gzigs shing 'jug pa dang / 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
280a3(mdo sde): cad nye bar spyod pas kyang 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de dag dad pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i
280a4(mdo sde): las dang / rjes su ston pa dang / tshig tu 'byin pa dang / yang dang / yang du yid la byed pa dang / mngon par lta ba dang / mngon du dran pa dang / sems dang bas sangs
280a5(mdo sde): rgyas la sdug par sems pa'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems can
280a6(mdo sde): rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
280a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i ro dang / sangs rgyas 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa
280b1(mdo sde): la lta ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dad pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
280b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog dang / dbyibs sna tshogs tshad med pa la lta ba'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
280b3(mdo sde): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra thos pa'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa mdzad de/ de la sogs pa'i mtha' med bsam gyis
280b4(mdo sde): m i khyab brjod du med pa'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems
280b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba las mi 'da' ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la 'jig rten thams cad 'dzud de/
280b6(mdo sde): yul las phyir mi ldog cing thugs rje chen po gtong ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam la mi skyo ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad la rtog pa
280b7(mdo sde): dang | sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la gnas shing dge ba rgyas pa tshad med pa brnyes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdun
281a1(mdo sde): pa'o| |dgon pa na bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs pa dang / sangs
281a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la bzhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas shing bzhugs
281a3(mdo sde): pa na gcig pur dgyes pa na bzhugs pa dang / sku bltar mi snang bar bzhugs pa dang / ye shes zab mo la gnas shing bzhugs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas
281a4(mdo sde): kyi yul gyi stobs la bzhugs pa dang / sku'i spyod pa bltar med pa la bzhugs pa rgyun mi gcod pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa la 'jug
281a5(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas lha yongs su
281a6(mdo sde): 'tshol zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas klu yongs su 'tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas nam mkha' lding
281a7(mdo sde): yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi'am ci yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba yongs su 'tshol ba dang / sangs
281b1(mdo sde): rgyas mi dang / mi ma yin pa yongs su 'tshol ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas yongs su 'tshol bas kyang sangs
281b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs
281b3(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam gcig tu bsdus pa dang / byang
281b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gcig gi spyod pa rnam par phye ba dang / spyod pa'i rim pa'i mthu dang / 'jig rten gyi yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /
281b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi yul gyi mthu dang / yul ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin par dang / zla ba phyed
281b6(mdo sde): dang | lo gcig dang / bgrang bar gnas na bzhugs pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas na bzhugs pa'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
281b7(mdo sde): 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brgyad pa'o/ khang pa lta bur gyur pa dang / dge
282a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par sbyangs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnams dad par gyur pa dang / mos par
282a2(mdo sde): gyur pa la sems 'jug cing sgrub par gyur pa dang / dbang po rnams 'dul bar gyur pa dang / sems can dang / skye dgu thams cad la dang bar gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams
282a3(mdo sde): cad 'byung bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskur bar gyur pa dang / rtog pa la gnas shing ye shes snang bar gyur pa dang / gzhan dring la mi 'jog
282a4(mdo sde): pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das pa ston cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / 'jig rten mi
282a5(mdo sde): rtog par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang bar mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / byas pa'i dgos pa'i mtha' bsdus pa dang / ngo bo ma tshang pa med pas chos la 'jug pa
282a6(mdo sde): snang par byas pa dang / rtsa ba bcad pa la srid pa'i mig snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams la skyo ba ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang mthun
282a7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la tshe'i mtha' ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi mngon par mi dga' ba nye bar ston pa dang / sems can rnams ma
282b1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bltar mi snang ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing rnam par chud par mdzad
282b2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten spro ba snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas sems rtsom pa dang ldan pa dang / ldan par 'jog pa dang / su de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing lta ba rnam par
282b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i yongs su rtog pa'i sems can rnams la sems can rnams slong bar mdzad pa dang / dbang po skyo ba zlog cing yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mngon par
282b4(mdo sde): dga' ba thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang / skyo ba rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis rlob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi brtse bar
282b5(mdo sde): dgongs pa'i rkyen brnyes pa dang / lus gyes pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sems can 'khrugs pa dang / myos pa
282b6(mdo sde): rnams sdom pa la 'jog par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgu pa'o/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das nas
282b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang / ngu ba dang / mya ngan slos pa dang / mchi ma byung bar 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya
283a1(mdo sde): bya ba dang / thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba dang / ded dpon chen po zhes pa dang / thugs brtse ba zhes ba dang / lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa dang /
283a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa dang / skyabs su gyur pa dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'das par gyur ces pa dang / sangs rgyas
283a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar dga' ba zhes pa dang / rnam pa 'di lta bur smre sngags 'don/ mya ngan slos shing sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams tshad med
283a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dang / de dag tu sems can gyi bsam ba dang / yid la byed par yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
283a5(mdo sde): kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
283a6(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dul ba dang / ji ltar dang ba bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ rang gi sku bor nas
283a7(mdo sde): nas tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob cing / gang 'di'i sems can rnams kyi sems
283b1(mdo sde): dang ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi dad pas mchod pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su
283b2(mdo sde): smin pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su
283b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par rtsom pa'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi rgyan sna tshogs yul dang / ljongs
283b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i dbang dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bgos shing 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod rten du byas shing yul dang / phyogs
283b5(mdo sde): der lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i
283b6(mdo sde): gnas dang / 'bar ba'i gnas su sku gdung dang / ring bsrel mchod par 'gyur/ sku gdung dang / ring bsrel dang / dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas
283b7(mdo sde): bzhugs par mchod rten brtsigs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ chos kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la dad pa so sor rnyed
284a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ yul dang / phyogs de dang / der gnas shing rgyun mi chad par mchod par bsam pas gnas nas/ sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams
284a2(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur te/ de dang / de dag mtho ris kyi yongs su dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ rigs chen po so so rnyed par 'gyur/ longs spyod chen po dang / g.yog 'khor
284a3(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa so sor myong bar 'gyur/ ngan par mi ltung ba'i nan tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de dag sangs
284a4(mdo sde): rgyas byung ba na gti mug med pas sgrub par 'gyur/ dkar po'i chos la gnas pa so sor rdzogs par 'gyur/ khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs
284a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ ji ltar theg pa la dad pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de dang / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba so sor rnyed par
284a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ phyir 'brang ba dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
284a7(mdo sde): 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin gnas sbyong ste/ bsod nams yongs su mi gnas pa'i sbyin gnas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
284b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skye ba 'di lta bu'i rnam pa mang por sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
284b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yangs pa/ dpag tu med pa /
284b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par gzhan 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyi lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar
284b4(mdo sde): mi nus/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas kyang 'jug par nus pa ma yin no// //'phags pa
284b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po gsum pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo chos kyi dbang po'i
284b6(mdo sde): chos mi gnyis par 'gro ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad lung ston te/ mi gnyis par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
284b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang / bsam pa sna tshogs med bcu rdul yab brjod du med par gshegs pa mi gnyis pa dang / chos kyi don
285a1(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad las rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sku mi gnyis pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo dang /
285a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / 'byung ba'i skad cig ma'i mtha'i ye shes mi gnyis shing thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar
285a3(mdo sde): byung ba gnyis su med pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi zhing gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang /
285a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gcig gi gsung dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba dang / rab tu phigs pa dang / rnam
285a5(mdo sde): par rig pa gnyis su med pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi chos nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gnyis su med pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
285a6(mdo sde): byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis su med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
285a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang po'i chos kyis mi gnyis par gshegs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
285b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad la nan tan gyis gnas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas pa la gnas
285b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji ltar smon lam gyis 'byung ba la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
285b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can yongs su mi gtong zhing 'dul ba la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngo bo med pa la rab tu gnas pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa dang / sangs
285b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das don med pa ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skal ba mnyam pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu sems
285b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa'i dbang po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems chags pa med par spyod pa la
285b6(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing mi 'jigs pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
285b7(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan la gnas pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
286a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa'i grangs
286a2(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par
286a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa dang / ngag thams cad kyi lam thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jug pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can
286a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ngo bo'i ye shes thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / sna tshogs
286a5(mdo sde): rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsam pa tshad med pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed
286a6(mdo sde): ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen dang 'dus pa tshogs par khong du chud pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
286a7(mdo sde): cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mthong ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba ltar thams cad mngon
286b1(mdo sde): par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom
286b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang / stobs dang / stobs tshad med pa dang / stobs kyi bdag nyid che ba dang / bzod par dga' ba'i stobs dang / yongs su mnyams
286b3(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dang / snying po'i stobs dang / mi phyed pa'i stobs dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa'i
286b4(mdo sde): stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang / 'tsho
286b5(mdo sde): ba'i dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing dug gis mi 'jigs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'tshig pa'i me'i bskal pas mi 'tshig pa dang /
286b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang / 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'chi ba dang / bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi stobs
286b7(mdo sde): dang | klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i
287a1(mdo sde): stobs dang / sha za dang / 'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmag gi stobs kyis mi tshugs pa dang
287a2(mdo sde): ri rab lhun po'i ri dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i char 'bebs pa dang / gzhan yang / 'khor yug chen po'i ri dang mnyam pa dang / gzhan yang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad kyi
287a3(mdo sde): rdo rje'i char babs te/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'ang mi 'gul/ bag tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/
287a4(mdo sde): bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba'i spyod lam spang pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ yul gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun
