287a5(mdo sde): tu ji tsam du bzhed pa kun tu de tsam du ma bab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la'ang gtses par ma gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can la'ang gtses
287a6(mdo sde): par ma gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi 'khrugs pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos
287a7(mdo sde): dang po'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhed na chos thams cad kyi dbyings mchog ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /
287b1(mdo sde): ri rab lhun po'i ri dang bcas/ kho ra khor yug dang / khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho'i ri dang / nags stug por bcas pa dang / sems can gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs
287b2(mdo sde): dang | 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu bcug ste tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mtha' bzung na/ de bzhin gshegs
287b3(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi brlabs ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so/ /'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu
287b4(mdo sde): gar bcug nas tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par bzung ste/ bzhengs pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dang / bskal par gshegs kyang de bzhin gshegs
287b5(mdo sde): pa'i thugs la skad cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur/ skyo ba mi mnga' ste/ stobs dang / mthu yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ spyod lam la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal
287b6(mdo sde): ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te/ 'bying ba ma yin/ zhum pa ma yin /
287b7(mdo sde): 'phel ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ rnam pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu 'jig rten gyi
288a1(mdo sde): khams ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor ba'i sems skye ba gcig kyang mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
288a2(mdo sde): 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gom pa gcig gi spyod pa'i sangs rgyas
288a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
288a4(mdo sde): rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gom pas spyod do/ /du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang
288a5(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i bskal par gshegs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems bskyed pa bzhin du bskal par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams
288a6(mdo sde): cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gnas shing tshad med pa dang / khor yug chen po'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur
288a7(mdo sde): ba dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa 'das shing ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gag par 'gyur te/ ji ltar ba spu'i bu ga gcig pa de
288b1(mdo sde): ltar sku'i spu'i bu ga thams cad de sems can thams cad ji snyed pa ba spu'i bu gar gyur la/ de ltar sems can thams cad lci bar gyur la/ sems can de dag thams cad de
288b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'dzin te/ ji ltar sor mo gcig gis dang por 'dzin pa de ltar sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mos 'dzin
288b3(mdo sde): kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsnyel ba'ang mi mnga'/ thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phra rab gcig tsam yang
288b4(mdo sde): mi skye'o/ /de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / rgya mo'i phyogs thams cad du gshegs shing
288b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / de ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar 'jug pa dang / skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi khams thams cad du
288b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / skra rtsa re re'i mtha' tshad kyi grangs kyi nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi nam mkha'i khams su 'jug pa
288b7(mdo sde): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par zad cing 'das kyi bar du phyogs dang / phyogs na skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs shing
289a1(mdo sde): yongs su longs spyod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bzhi
289a2(mdo sde): pa'o| |gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / dbu du mar gyur la/
289a3(mdo sde): dbu gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ljags su gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
289a4(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams la go bar byed pa dang /
289a5(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i mdo sde dam pa rab tu bshad la/ mdo sde re
289a6(mdo sde): r e la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'brang la chos bstan pa re re la sangs rgyas kyi
289a7(mdo sde): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa rnams kyi brjod pa 'gro ste/ ji ltar gang gi phyir chos ston pa de
289b1(mdo sde): ltar chos thams cad ston te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston cing sangs rgyas kyi
289b2(mdo sde): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs su zad nas/ yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
289b3(mdo sde): med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston te/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la/
289b4(mdo sde): gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad
289b5(mdo sde): cing 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de lta ma yin te/ chos thams cad 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing chos thams cad shes rab kyi ston te/ brda sprod
289b6(mdo sde): cing the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / chags pa med pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo
289b7(mdo sde): skor ba dang / sems can mtha' yas par tshim par byed pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyan
290a1(mdo sde): gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad la ye shes
290a2(mdo sde): kyi sgron ma chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig
290a3(mdo sde): gi sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po'ang dpe thams cad kyis dper bya ba ma yin te/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
290a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mthar nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
290a5(mdo sde): pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang / sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang / ji srid du mtha' ma'i
290a6(mdo sde): b skal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun tu brjod pa
290a7(mdo sde): bzhin du dbu re re la/ de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang / sku dang / gsung 'jug ste/ chos
290b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde rnams 'chad de/
290b2(mdo sde): mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa'i brjod pa 'gro ste/ chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa re
290b3(mdo sde): r es chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzer
290b4(mdo sde): ba'ang med/ nyams pa'ang med/ zad pa'ang med/ dmas pa'ang med de/ de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ 'di ni sangs
290b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi
290b6(mdo sde): be'u'i rgyun dang ldan zhing / rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can
290b7(mdo sde): gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa/ mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul
291a1(mdo sde): par byed do/ /byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin
291a2(mdo sde): pa| skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'joms pas/ 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing
291a3(mdo sde): drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te/ gzigs nas mi bsnyengs/ bag mi tsha/ spu 'ga' yang mi g.yo/ gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'ang
291a4(mdo sde): mi mnga'/ sems phra mo'ang mi mnga' bar gnas te mi g.yo/ mi bskyod mi 'gyur rnam par mi rtog / shin tu rab tu zhi/ bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin tu mi mnga'/ 'dod
291a5(mdo sde): pa dang / khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba/ dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa/ bag
291a6(mdo sde): mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi dngangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde mang po
291a7(mdo sde): sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bzung nas zil gyis gnon/ bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'phrul
291b1(mdo sde): gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
291b2(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyis khams ma
291b3(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang / de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra de ri la thogs
291b4(mdo sde): pa med de/ ri rab lhun po la mi thogs/ rin po che'i ri la ma yin/ khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la ma yin/ lha'i gnas la ma yin/ klu'i gnas la ma yin/ gnod sbyin
291b5(mdo sde): gyi gnas la ma yin/ dri za'i gnas la ma yin/ lha ma yin gyi gnas la ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin/ mi'am ci'i gnas la ma yin/ mi dang / mi ma yin
291b6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na'ang mi chags te/ 'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang
291b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas brjod pa'i sgras bsgribs par 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna bas rnam par
292a1(mdo sde): rig ste/ gang 'di rna bas rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang / 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra/
292a2(mdo sde): lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang /
292a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med /
292a4(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med pa dang / bdag gi med pa'i chos thams cad la gnas pa/
292a5(mdo sde): nang dang / phyi dang ldan pa ma yin/ ma skyes pa la brtsam pa thams cad rnam par phye ba/ zhi ba/ gnas med pa/ rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa/ ngo bo thams cad rnam
292a6(mdo sde): par rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas pa 'gag pa/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ rtsom pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs
292a7(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral zhing dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba/ chos kyi dbyings
292b1(mdo sde): kun tu mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba/ 'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang / tshad dang / tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gags
292b2(mdo sde): pa dag gis lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu'i rgyan dang / chos thams cad
292b3(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa/ thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad dang / ston pa 'gal ba med pa/ dus gsum du dbyer med pa /
292b4(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol tu song ba/ chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod
292b5(mdo sde): kyi khyad par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti mug pa zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang / rgya mo'i phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo/ med bcu rdul yab la mi
292b6(mdo sde): gnas pa/ brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba/ ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/ zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa/ sems rnam
292b7(mdo sde): par grol ba/ shes rab rnam par grol ba/ shin tu rnam par grol ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa/ rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa/
293a1(mdo sde): dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa/ sems kyi skad cig ma la dus gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa
293a2(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
293a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sku dang / lus gcig tu 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / yul tshad med pa mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs
293a4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa'i sku/ khams gsum gyis mi gos pa'i sku/ rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin gyi rlabs kyi sku'i tshogs ston pa/ mi
293a5(mdo sde): bden mi rdzun zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa/ 'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku/ mtshan nyid gcig
293a6(mdo sde): dang | mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku/ tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku/ sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par
293a7(mdo sde): sprul pa'i sku/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku/ sku thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/ sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa/ chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba/ mtha' yas par
293b1(mdo sde): snang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku/ bya ba sna tshogs med pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la
293b2(mdo sde): khyab par gsal ba'i sku 'dus pa/ mi g.yo/ /mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag pa/ med pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang / tshul dang / tshul ma yin pas phye ba'i sku/ sems can thams cad
293b3(mdo sde): kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku/ 'gags pa dang / 'gags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng
293b4(mdo sde): ba'i sku/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / de bzhin nyid bsdus pa'i sku / rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku/ thogs pa med pa'i
293b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ chos kyi dbyings dag pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i sku/ brtsam pa las mi ldog pa/ sangs
293b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal
293b7(mdo sde): gyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu pa'o/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chad pa de bzhin gshegs
294a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/ spyod pa las mngon par byung ba/ smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang
294a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa| byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/
294a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa/ smon lam chen po dang / spyod pa mi
294a4(mdo sde): chung ba/ spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dka' ba ma yin pa/ spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad las byung zhing spyod pa thams cad rnam par
294a5(mdo sde): dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyad pa mi 'bri bar spyod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thams cad la gnas pa/ spyod yul mtha'
294a6(mdo sde): yas pa lam thams cad ston pa/ lam ma yin pa'i yul dang / lam thams cad la zhugs pa/ ye shes mchog gi stobs kyi chog shes pa/ 'dzem pa med par chos kyi
294a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'bebs pa/ dge ba 'dri ba dang / mi 'dri ba dang / btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin tu yongs su dag pa/ lus dang /
294b1(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sgo ma rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / sangs rgyas
294b2(mdo sde): kyi ye shes dang / mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa/ tshad med par ston pa dag gnas pa/ rtsa ba med cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa
294b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ye shes 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi
294b4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi mthong ba dang / phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i ye shes/ dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa/ 'jig rten
294b5(mdo sde): gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang / ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams
294b6(mdo sde): cad dang ldan zhing / phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku/ grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos yi ge med par rab tu rtog pa/ brjod du med pa'i ye shes
294b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed/ ye shes kyi dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim
295a1(mdo sde): pa| sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes ji ltar 'os pa dang / sems can thams
295a2(mdo sde): cad kyi lus dang / ji ltar skye mched kyi chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa/ 'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus pa
295a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig
295a4(mdo sde): m a gcig la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i
295a5(mdo sde): yul ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag par sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi mtshams su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas
295a6(mdo sde): pa| sems can gyi sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa/ dus gsum gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas shing
295a7(mdo sde): mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
295b1(mdo sde): khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas khyu mchog thams cad du 'gro ba dang / khong du chud pa ma lus
295b2(mdo sde): ba thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dag ma lus pa thams cad las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnam par chud pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi gtong
295b3(mdo sde): ba| sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs te/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang / dbus med par gnas pa/ sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi sku mtha'
295b4(mdo sde): dang / dbus med par gnas pa/ sems chags pa med par gnas pa/ mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i snying rje chen po sbyor ba la gnas pa/ dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos
295b5(mdo sde): ston par gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal dang / ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
295b6(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bcu ste/ sems can thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
295b7(mdo sde): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mi zin pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
296a1(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshe ji tsam par dga' ldan na bzhugs shing tshe zad nas 'pho bar
296a2(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zla ba bcur bzhugs pa'i tshe ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon bar 'byung zhing 'byung bar bzhed
296a3(mdo sde): pa'i thugs kyis bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs
296a4(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig ma gcig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
296a5(mdo sde): nas bzhugs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sprul par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
296a6(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston
296a7(mdo sde): te brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
296b1(mdo sde): rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skad cig la sems can thams cad kyis dri ba dris
296b2(mdo sde): pa rnams skad cig la brda sprod cing bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas
296b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can ngan par 'gro pa'i
296b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu de dag myur du zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par
296b5(mdo sde): lhag par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
296b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du mtho ris su skye ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can
296b7(mdo sde): gzigs ma thag tu myur du nem nur dang / yid gnyis 'joms par nye bar gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can
297a1(mdo sde): gzigs ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa'i phyir myur du gshegs shing sems rgya chen po la dad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro
297a2(mdo sde): ba byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gsha' mar zhugs
297a3(mdo sde): pa gzigs ma thag tu dmigs par lta ba dang / gsha' mar 'jug pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams gzigs ma thag
297a4(mdo sde): tu myur du sems can rnams kyi dbang po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsgribs
297a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad zad par mdzad du gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du snang ba so sor rnyed cing zhum pa med de/ mi
297a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa la spobs pa rtsom par mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin du gzigs pa'i chos bcu'o/ /
297a7(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs ba rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
297b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'ang rjes su dgongs
297b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
297b3(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrubs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi tshangs par spyod pa dang / byang
297b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo'ang rjes
297b5(mdo sde): su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi lus tshad med mtha' yas pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin /
297b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / rnam par sprul pa tshad med mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/
297b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
298a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa
298a2(mdo sde): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems
298a3(mdo sde): gcig gi spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba ldog pa sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las rnams dang / las
298a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam pa dang / rim pa dang / las rnams kyi 'phel zhing gsog pa'ang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen
298a5(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi ris gcig dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta
298a6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /
298a7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis
298b1(mdo sde): mtshan mar bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dad
298b2(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du skad cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
298b3(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs
298b4(mdo sde): rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bston par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma
298b5(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro zhing sems kyi skad cig ma la de dang / de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan tan mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la
298b6(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos
298b7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang / gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas
299a1(mdo sde): pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad
299a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med
299a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la
299a4(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad la snyoms par
299a5(mdo sde): 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
299a6(mdo sde): 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa
299a7(mdo sde): dang | sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / zhing thams cad la rtag
299b1(mdo sde): tu snyoms par zhugs shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha'
299b2(mdo sde): yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings
299b3(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing / sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas
299b4(mdo sde): mdzod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
299b5(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams
299b6(mdo sde): cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig
299b7(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ba ste/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mi gcod cing
300a1(mdo sde): sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub pa
300a2(mdo sde): m ed pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
300a3(mdo sde): pa rnyes pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
300a4(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe
300a5(mdo sde): na| rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med
300a6(mdo sde): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can
300a7(mdo sde): 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar
300b1(mdo sde): pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das
300b2(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung zhing brje ba rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
300b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can
300b4(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam
300b5(mdo sde): par thar pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu'o/ /snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las/ sangs
300b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dI paM ka ra byA ka ra Na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
300b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
301a1(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis
301a2(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas te
301a3(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la so sor brtag pa nyid kyis
301a4(mdo sde): bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ ngas sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la zhes dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas kyang sangs rgyas
301a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nga sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi/ gang gi tshe ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthong nas
301a6(mdo sde): ut+pa la lnga phul ba de'i 'og tu nga chos bdag med pa nyid la mos par gyur cing mi skye pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bas na khyod dge ba'i rtsa bas
301a7(mdo sde): chog shes par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam
301b1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
301b2(mdo sde): pa zhig byung ste/ kun dga' bo/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra de la grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ skyed mos tshal phun sum tshogs pa/
301b3(mdo sde): rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos
301b4(mdo sde): gang ba sha stag go / kun dga' bo/ ma skyes dgra de la rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can zhe bya ba zhig yod de/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra de de na gnas so/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mdun
301b5(mdo sde): na 'don bram ze gling ldan zhes bya ba snying du sdug cing mthong na mi mthun pa med pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rigs bzhi'i mi thams
301b6(mdo sde): cad bsdus nas bram ze gling ldan bkug ste/ cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /bram ze/ khyod rang gi yul du song ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang byos
301b7(mdo sde): la ming yang pad+ma can du thogs shig / kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rang gi yul du rgyal po'i pho brang byas te/ ming yang pad+ma can du btags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de
302a1(mdo sde): ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po gnyis rgyal srid byed de/ gcig ni ma skyes dgra'o/ /gcig shos ni gling ldan no/ /kun dga' bo/
302a2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa khang bzang gi yang thog na bde bar nyal zhing 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi
302a3(mdo sde): 'phos nas glang po che'i phrug gu thal kar du bsgyur te/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing ma'i glo g.yas par zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe btsun mo dam pa des rgyal po gling
302a4(mdo sde): ldan la skabs 'di smras so/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dang / mchod sbyin mkhan rnams bsdus te rmi lam
302a5(mdo sde): gyi skabs 'di bsnyad pa dang / bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ khyod kyi sras sems can rin po che zhig
302a6(mdo sde): bltam par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po gling ldan rmi lam bstan pa 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba
302a7(mdo sde): skyes te/ rgyal po gling ldan de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/
302b1(mdo sde): bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ spos dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / byug pa dang / gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gang ci dang / ci 'dod pa thams cad byin no/ /kun
302b2(mdo sde): dga' bo/ de nas zla ba bcu 'das pa dang / rgyal po gling ldan gyi bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/
302b3(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu lus las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin
302b4(mdo sde): rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas gzhon nu gang na ba der stong ste phyin nas gzhon nu de la shis par brjod pa byas te/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /'di btsas ma thag tu lus
302b5(mdo sde): las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming mar me mdzad du btags so/ /de nas gzhon
302b6(mdo sde): nu'i ming mar me mdzad mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po gling ldan dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
302b7(mdo sde): te| yang de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas 'dod pa rnams las ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams
303a1(mdo sde): la ni bzhon pa/ spos dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / byug pa dang / gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gang ci dang / ci 'dod pa thams cad
303a2(mdo sde): byin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bkug ste/ cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te 'di skad ces kyang
303a3(mdo sde): smras so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod song la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dug cing rtses shig /dga' bar gyis shig /dga' dgur spyod cig /kun dga' bo/ de
303a4(mdo sde): nas re zhig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas bzhon pa chen po la zhon te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas skyed mos tshal
303a5(mdo sde): gyi gnas su song ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag gcig gis bdag cag nyid rgas shing 'khogs pa dang / nad kyis btab pa dang / shi ba'ang bstan te
303a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong zhig kyang der bzhag pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad kyis mthong nas kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye kha lo sgyur ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba
303a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ci yin/ kha lo sgyur pas smras pa/ gzhon nu/ 'di dag ni rgas pa zhes bgyi ba dang / na ba zhes bgyi ba dang / shib zhes bgyi ba lags te/ gzhon nu/ ji srid du
303b1(mdo sde): chos nyid gdags pa mchis pa de srid du rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i chos rnams mchis te/ gzhon nu khyod dang / 'o skol yang de lta bu lags te/ 'khor ba na gnas pa kho na
303b2(mdo sde): lags so/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mgro bregs te ngur smrig gyon la zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba 'di su zhig /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ gzhon
303b3(mdo sde): nu| 'di ni dge slong ste/ sdig pa thams cad spangs pa thar pa la mngon par dga' ba'i 'du shes skyes nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba lags so/ /gzhon nus smras pa/
303b4(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba/ legs so/ /legs so/ /dge slong 'di'i lam 'di ni 'dod pa yin no zhes smras nas phyir log ste khyim du song ngo / /kun dga' bo/ de nas re zhig na rgyal bu gzhon nu
303b5(mdo sde): mar me mdzad yang skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ngo / /de skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / de na sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos bsten pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mthong
303b6(mdo sde): ngo| |kun dga' bo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad kyis byang chub kyi snying po de mthong nas skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs thams cad ha cang thag mi ring bar
303b7(mdo sde): bor nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ des byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba dang / lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub kyi snying po der skyil mo krung bcas
304a1(mdo sde): te 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad 'dug ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe de nyid kyi mtshan mo'i skya rengs dang bo shar ba'i dus na de bla na med pa
304a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
304a3(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas
304a4(mdo sde): khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
304a5(mdo sde): mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas sgra 'di skad ces kyang bsgrags
304a6(mdo sde): so| |kye ma'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'di 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'di ltar de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad do/ /de
304a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lo lnga bcu'i bar du byang chub kyi snying po de na bzhugs kyang tha na sems can gcig tsam yang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
304b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
304b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams
304b3(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan pas ha cang bag med par gyur gyi/ ngas de rnams cung zhig yid byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
304b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon
304b5(mdo sde): par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyi nang du bai DUR+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po/ blta na sdug pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang la/ mi
304b6(mdo sde): de dag kyang lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag cig mngon par sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
304b7(mdo sde): ba'i mi rnams bai DUR+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis spa gong bar ni gyur na gang yang skyo bar ni ma gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
305a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams
305a2(mdo sde): ha cang bag med pa dang ldan par gyur pa ngas yang cung zhig skyo ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
305a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis yang 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad
305a4(mdo sde): pas bai DUR+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po de la me chen po 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu de la me 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe sems
305a5(mdo sde): can de dag dang / grong khyer chen po de yongs su zad cing mthar thug pa dang / zhig par gyur nas sems can de dag kyang tshul ma yin pa mthong bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /kun
305a6(mdo sde): dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyis bai DUR+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po rgud par mthong nas dngas skrag par gyur cing skyo bar
305a7(mdo sde): gyur nas spu zing zhes byed de/ de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /gang gi phyir grong khyer de yongs su zad cing mthar thug pa dang / zhig par gyur pa la na ring po mi thogs par bdag
305b1(mdo sde): cag kyang de lta bu'i mi rtag pa'i gnas skabs su 'gyur na su zhig bdag cag gi skyabs su 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
305b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi 'di rnams yongs su smin pas ngas chos bstan pa kun shes par nus shing skal ba dang
305b3(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / mthu yod par gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis mi de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis
305b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po de nas bzhengs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i brang ga la ba der gshegs
305b5(mdo sde): so| |kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad byon ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis chos bstan pa dang po'i tshe srog chags nyi khri rab
305b6(mdo sde): tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /chos bstan pa gnyis pa'i tshe srog chags su ma khri rab tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad
305b7(mdo sde): kyang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /chos bstan pa gsum pa'i tshe srog chag bzhin khri rab tu phyung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang chos rnams
306a1(mdo sde): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / chos bstan pa bzhi pa'i tshe srog chags lnga khri rab tu phyung ste/ de dag thams
306a2(mdo sde): cad kyang len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

306a5(mdo sde): 'tshal na bdag gi thad du gshegs par gsol zhes spring ngo / /de nas pho nya des rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang gal ba dang / rgyal
306a6(mdo sde): po gling ldan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phrin de skad smras so/ /de nas rgyal po gling ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar
306a7(mdo sde): me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas skabs de gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

306b5(mdo sde): su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te thabs gcig tu gshegs so/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de rim gyis rgyal po'i pha brang pad+ma can ga la ba

307a1(mdo sde): sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags dang / bstan bcos dang / cho ga shes pa ji snyed pa thams cad la mkhas pa
307a2(mdo sde): zhig yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bas mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mkhan po/ bdag grong dang /

307a4(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ gang gis bstan bcos dang / rig byed dang / gsang sngags thams cad lobs pa des mkhan po la zod lnga brgya dang / ras zung gcig dang / 'khar ba dang /
307a5(mdo sde): ril ba rnams sbyin dgos so/ /bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bdag la pags pa dang / 'khar ba dang / ril pa ma gtogs par ci'ang ma mchis pas

307a7(mdo sde): khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du zhugs so/ /de'i tshe na grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na bram ze sa ga bzang po zhes bya
307b1(mdo sde): ba zhig gnas te de la bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de'i phyir nyi ma re
307b2(mdo sde): re zhing bram ze bzhi khri la zan sbyin par byed cing / de rnams kyi nang na thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la bdag gi bu mo sbyin no snyam pa dang / gnas gtsang
307b3(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam bstan no/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mchod sbyin gyi gnas ga la ba der
307b4(mdo sde): song ste phyin to/ /bram ze'i khye'u sprin mchod sbyin gyi gnas der phyin ma thag tu de'i tshe bu mo des rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di'i mtshan ma ji ltar gda'

307b6(mdo sde): dang | gsang sngags dag gis khyad par du 'phags so/ /de'i tshe na mchod sbyin gyi gnas der bram ze dum bu byin zhes bya ba zhig rgan gral du 'dug ste mchod sbyin byed do/ /de nas

308a1(mdo sde): nyid rig byed dang / gsang sngags dang / bstan bcos dag gis khyad par du 'phags so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis bram ze dum bu byin la
308a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye bram ze/ bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi chos nyid ni gang gis bstan bcos thams cad rtogs shing khong du chud pa de stan mchog la 'dug pa yin no/ /

308a4(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ nga stan 'di las ma bslang zhig dang / kho bos zong lnga brgya thob pa khyod la byin no/ /smras pa/ kho bo la mi dgos so/ /de ma langs
308a5(mdo sde): pa dang / de'i mgrin pa nas bzung ste bslang ngo / /de nas bram ze dum bu byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis kho bo stan 'di las bslangs nas
308a6(mdo sde): mtho btsams shing dngangs par byas pas khyod gang dang / gang du skyes pa'i skye ba thams cad du sbyin pa'i bar chad bya'o zhes dam bcas so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin seng
308a7(mdo sde): ge'i khri de la 'dug go / de nas bram ze sa ga bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ gser gyi 'khar pa dang / ril ba dang / ras zung gcig
308b1(mdo sde): dang | zong lnga brgya khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u'i sprin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag long zhig /de nas bram
308b2(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u sprin gyis zong lnga brgya dang / ras zung gcig dang / 'khar ba dang / ril pa rnams blangs te bu mo de ma blangs so/ /'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /bud med 'dis ci
308b3(mdo sde): zhig bya/ bud med ni spre'u dang 'dra ste/ rgod pa/ 'phyar ba/ dge ba'i bar chad byed pa yin la/ kho bo ni dgon pa dang / rab tu dben pa rnams na gnas pas 'di kho bo la mi dgos
308b4(mdo sde): so| |rigs kyi bu/ bdag la snying brtse ba'i phyir long zhig /des ma blangs so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nas song ste/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ga la ba der song
308b5(mdo sde): ngo| |de nas bram ze sa ga bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan la smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod khyim thabs kyi phyi bzhin ci'i phyir mi 'gro /des de'i tshig mnyan te mnyan nas ri'i rgyal po
308b6(mdo sde): gangs ga la ba der longs su 'phags so/ /de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu zhig gis ri'i rgyal po gangs su 'gro ba'i lam mi snang bar byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang
308b7(mdo sde): pad+ma can du gang nas 'gro ba'i lam bstan cing / gang du bram ze'i khye'u sprin dro 'debs pa der bu mo bzang len ldan yang dgongs 'debs so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des
309a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can dar gi lda ldi bres pa/ me tog bkram pa/ bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod dang ra ba mthong nas des dris pa/ grong khyer chen
309a2(mdo sde): po 'di ci'i rgyus mngon par brgyan par gyur/ de nas rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces
309a3(mdo sde): smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis ma thos sam/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig
309a4(mdo sde): rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po ma skyes dgras spyan drangs nas de 'dir byon pa'i phyir grong khyer chen po mngon par brgyan to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di snyam du sems te/
309a5(mdo sde): bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi nang na gang bstan bcos thams cad la spyod pa gsal zhing mkhas pa'ang dkon na/ sems can rin po che 'di ltar 'jig rten du byung ba lta smos
309a6(mdo sde): kyang ci dogs kyi/ bdag gis zong lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya gor ma chag snyam nas des phan tshun me tog btsal na gang nas
309a7(mdo sde): kyang ma rnyed pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams na re/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis ma thos sam/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras bka' stsal
309b1(mdo sde): te| me tog thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mchod pa bya dgos kyi/ 'di ltar su'ang me tog nyor yang mi gnang / 'tshong du'ang mi gnang ngo / /gang zhig gis
309b2(mdo sde): nyos sam/ btsongs na ngas de chad pa chen pos bcad do zhe'o/ /de me tog tshol ba na bu mo bzang len ldan mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ ci tshol
309b3(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ me tog 'tshol lo/ /de nas bu mo bzang len ldan me tog phreng brgyud mkhan zhig gi khyim ga la ba der stong ste phyin nas me tog phreng brgyud
309b4(mdo sde): mkhan de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo la me tog byin cig /kho mo'i khyim thab la dgos so/ /me tog phreng brgyud mkhan gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis ma thos
309b5(mdo sde): sam| 'di ltar rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ me tog thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mchod pa bya dgos kyi/ 'di ltar su'ang me
309b6(mdo sde): tog 'tshong du'ang mi gnang / nyor yang mi gnang ngo / /gang zhig gis nyos sam/ btsongs na ngas de chad pa chen po bcad do zhe'o/ /lan gsum gyi bar du bslangs pa dang / de bzhin
309b7(mdo sde): bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo bzang len ldan gyis bum pa bslangs nas ut+pa la bdun bcug ste/ grong khyer du song nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mthong ba dang mdun du 'dug ste/
310a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ ci tshol/ bu mo/ me tog tshol lo/ /smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u ci bya/ smras pa/ bu mo/ bskyed par bya'o/ /
310a2(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ ut+pa la btogs zin pa gang dag yang skye bar 'gyur ba ni kho mos nam yang ma thos ma mthong ngo / /smras pa/ bu mo/ gang la bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba'i
310a3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu la bskyed do/ /des smras pa/ gal te kho mo gang dang / gang du skyes pa'i skye ba thams cad du khyod kho mo'i khyim thab tu 'gyur bar dam 'cha' na de'i
310a4(mdo sde): phyir ut+pa la sbyin no/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni dgon pa dang / rab tu dben pa na gnas pa yin la/ bud med ni rgod pa/ 'phyar ba/
310a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i par chad byed pa yin pas bud med 'dis ci zhig bya snyam mo/ /lan bdun gyi bar du smras pa dang / de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas de'i tshe
310a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'di skad ngas thos sngon srid na/ /sangs rgyas mar me 'jig rten byung / /'khor ni mang po bdun stong dang //
310a7(mdo sde): pad+ma can du de phyin to/ /de yi phyir ni rgyal mtshan bsgrengs/ /rnga ni brgya khrag de phyir brdungs/ /grong khyer thams cad kun sbyangs shing / /lam srang bzhi ni de phyir brgyan/ /grong khyer
310b1(mdo sde): brgyan pa de mthong nas/ /bram ze'i khye'us dris pa ni/ /gang gi phyir ni rgyal mtshan sgrengs/ /gang phyir rnga ni brgya phrag brdungs/ /grong khyer thams cad kun sbyangs shing / /gang phyir lam srang bzhi
310b2(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i/ /bsam pa de ni lung ston cig /rig byed shes khyod ma thos sam/ /sangs rgyas mar me 'jig rten byung / /'khor ni mang po bdun stong dang / /pad+ma can du de byon te/ /
310b3(mdo sde): de yi phyir ni rgyal mtshan bsgrengs/ /de phyir rnga ni brgya phrag rdung / /grong khyer thams cad kun sbyangs shing / /de phyir lam srang bzhi brgyan to/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra thos nas/ /sangs rgyas
310b4(mdo sde): yon tan gyis mgu ste/ /rings par myur du song ba dang / /rgyang nas bram ze'i bu mo mthong / /pad+ma ut+pal g.yo ba'i mig /chu skyes thogs shing sgo na 'dug /de yis bram ze'i khye'u
310b5(mdo sde): mthong nas/ /snyan par smra bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ka la ping+ka rma bya'i sgra/ /yid 'ong ngang mo khu byug sgras/ /sgra chen spangs nas tshangs pa'i sgras/ /bram ze'i khye'u la bu mos smras/ /khye'u ci
310b6(mdo sde): nags kyi nang na de/ /sbyin sreg byed cing rig 'don la/ /rgyal po'i dmag gis ma gtses sam/ /'khrugs shing lam srang dag tu rgyu/ /bu mo nga khyim gnyen 'dun med/ /yongs
310b7(mdo sde): su bzung ba'ang nga la med/ /'dod pa'i yon tan nga mi 'dod/ /bu mo rgyal dmag nga mi gnod/ /nga de dag las zan mi za/ /chos gsos gos kyang mi len te/ /shes bzhin rdzun ni
311a1(mdo sde): mi smra na/ /bu mo rgyal dmag nga mi gnod/ /'bras bu rtsa bas nags na gnas/ /bu mo rgyal dmag nga mi gnod/ /seng phrug dag gis ma gtses sam/ /'bras
311a2(mdo sde): rtsa nags na med dam ci/ /ci'i phyir khyod ni brtan par 'ongs/ /seng ge'i phrug gus ma gtses te/ /nags na 'bras bu rtsa ba yod/ /bzang mo ut+pal dgos pa'i phyir/ /de phyir
311a3(mdo sde): nga 'di grong khyer 'ongs/ /gal te shed bu lang tsho yis/ /dregs lus brgyan phyir bram ze'i khye'u/ /bdag gi ut+pal 'tsham pa yin/ /bdag gi phreng phyir mi nyo la/ /ut+pal
311a4(mdo sde): bsnams phyir 'dod pa min/ /brtse ldan mar me mdzad kyi phyir/ /bzang mo bdag ni ut+pal slong / /bde bar pha rol 'gro ba na/ /gang du pha las zan zos tshe/ /bslang ba'i tshig
311a5(mdo sde): smras mi dran nas/ /'dzem med ci phyir me tog slong / /bzang mo ut+pal rin du dbyig /lnga brgya 'di byin dge mas gnang / /sangs rgyas yon tan tshol ba la/ /bzang mo bgegs
311a6(mdo sde): ni ma byed cig / bzang mo bdag gi gzhi byas nas/ /slong ba rnams kyi bgegs su 'gyur/ /gzhan lta zhog gi bram ze'i khye'u/ /gal te slong la bdag byin na/ /bdag ni
311a7(mdo sde): khyod kyi bgegs mi byed/ /bdag smon 'dir gyur gzhan du min/ /de gnyis smon lam btab nas ni/ /bram ze'i khye'us ut+pal blangs/ /de dag ut+pal thogs nas kyang / /
311b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ /gal te bdag lus skams gyur cing / /bdag gi rus pa skams gyur kyang / /byang chub lung ma bstan par du/ /bdag ni de ring mi ldang ngo / /
311b2(mdo sde): bdag smon der gyur gzhan du min/ /de nas bu mo bzang len ldan gyis ut+pa la lnga blangs te bram ze'i khye'u sprin la byin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u/ ut+pa la 'di dag long la rang gi ming
311b3(mdo sde): gis skrun cig / bram ze'i khye'u/ ut+pal 'di gnyis kyang kho mo'i ming gis skrun cig /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ut+pa la de dag khyer nas/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de
311b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mdzes pa/ dad par bya ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ mchog tu dul ba/ dang
311b5(mdo sde): zhing zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ dul ba dang / zhi ba'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ glang po chen po dbang po bsrung zhing thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnam par dang la rnyog pa med pa/
311b6(mdo sde): gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ dpal gyis brjid pa/ gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mthong ngo / /sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo
311b7(mdo sde): brgya phrag du ma dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang
312a1(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'ong
312a2(mdo sde): ba'ang mthong nas/ yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
312a3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par bdag gis thos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la ni mtshan sum
312a4(mdo sde): cu zhig snang ste/ mtshan gnyis ni mi snang bar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
312a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon
312a6(mdo sde): par 'du mdzad pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/ bram ze'i
312a7(mdo sde): khye'u sprin gyis de mthong nas yang bram ze'i khye'u sprin dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas pags pa de bting ba dang / de nas rgyal po'i
312b1(mdo sde): pho brang pad+ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi de dag gis pags pa de blangs nas/ phan tshun du bor te bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ ma smyos
312b2(mdo sde): sam| gang du rgyal po'i na bza' gding ba der khyod kyis pags pa btsog pa 'di gding bar byed/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis pags pa blangs nas lam las bzur te /
312b3(mdo sde): lam gol bar 'dug nas bden pa'i tshig 'di byas so/ /bden pa dang / bden tshig gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/
312b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba yin na/ shul las bzur te bdag gi ral pa la zhabs 'jog par gyur cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
312b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhal phyir gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gang du nga'i zhabs gnyis 'jog pa der khyod kyis gzhag par mi
312b6(mdo sde): bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i ral pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
312b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad shul las bzur nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gang na bar gshegs te byon pa dang / zhabs gnyis ral ba'i steng der bzhag
313a1(mdo sde): g o |de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin sa'i steng de nas langs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
313a2(mdo sde): mar me mdzad la ut+pa la de dag gtor to/ /gtor ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thad du ut+pa la'i khang pa brtsegs pa grwa bzhir ka
313a3(mdo sde): pa bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba zhig gnas par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de na'ang de bzhin gshegs
313a4(mdo sde): pa'i sku snang ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
313a5(mdo sde): to| |bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
313a6(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi
313a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu
313b1(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /de bzod pa thob nas steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas
313b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin drug stong mngon du gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mngon du gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin par snang las babs te/ bcom
313b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang / dge slong gi dngos po gsol to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u
313b4(mdo sde): sprin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na kun dga' bo de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i
313b5(mdo sde): dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bar der gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som
313b6(mdo sde): nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ kun dga' bo/ de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya bar gyur
313b7(mdo sde): to| |kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dum bu byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang rgan gral du 'dug ste sbyin sreg byed pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du som nyi 'am/ yid
314a1(mdo sde): gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ kun dga' bo/ de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi gti mug can lhas byin de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dum bu
314a2(mdo sde): byin du gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa bas chog shes par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
314a3(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
314a4(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sid+ha
314a5(mdo sde): dang | lo tsA ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la
314a6(mdo sde): phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya brah+ma shrI byA ka ra Na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa
314a7(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
314b1(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang / chos
314b2(mdo sde): gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol na byis pa phal po che dag sa
314b3(mdo sde): rdul gyi khyim dang / sa rdul gyi ra ba dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing 'khod pa las byis pa phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das
314b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang lhag par dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te rtse dga' zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u
314b5(mdo sde): de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gang na khye'u de dag rtse zhing 'khod pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs so/ /de nas byis pa de dag gi nang nas khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
314b6(mdo sde): zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byis pa de dag la 'di
314b7(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byis pa/ khyod 'di na ci byed/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khye'u de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
315a1(mdo sde): 'das/ bdag cag 'di na sa rdul gyi khyim dag dang / sa rdul gyi ra ba dag dang / sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing mchis lags so/ /de nas bcom
315a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di bzhes su gsol
315a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba'i sems thugs su chud nas thugs brtse ba'i phyir sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs
315a4(mdo sde): pa de bzhes so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de dang / yud tsam de la sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig
315a5(mdo sde): tu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug par gyur te/ de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su ni gser gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ lho phyogs kyi ngos
315a6(mdo sde): su ni dngul gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ nub phyogs kyi ngos su ni bai DUR+ya'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ byang phyogs kyi ngos su ni shel gyi ka
315a7(mdo sde): ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas lhag par yang ches dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba
315b1(mdo sde): rgya chen po skyes par gyur to/ /da nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /kye ma 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /rdzu 'phrul shin tu rgya chen bstan/ /
315b2(mdo sde): bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rdzu 'phrul bstan/ /drang srong che la bdag gis ni/ /sa rdul khang brtsegs phul ba de/ /rin po che las grub par gyur/ /kye ma sangs rgyas
315b3(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab/ /kye kye zhing ni 'di 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bla med dang / /mig med mig ni nyams pa dang / /shes rab chung ngus mi shes so/ /rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i zhing / /'di
315b4(mdo sde): ni bdag gis rnyed pa dang / /dal ba rab dkon thob pas na/ /byang chub tu ni smon lam gdab/ /bdag kyang 'dren pa khyod kyi ni/ /yon tan rjes su slob par tshal/ /bla med byang
315b5(mdo sde): chub thob nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bdag gis bgyi/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna
315b6(mdo sde): tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo / /de dag byung nas
315b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/ /
316a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal mchog 'dren pa 'gro ba'i gtso bo rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis
316a2(mdo sde): par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /thugs rje ldan pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ /deng 'dir ci phyir 'dzum mdzad bdag la gsungs/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
316a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong
316a4(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / sems kyi smon pa 'dis ni bskal pa sum stong nyis brgya'i bar
316a5(mdo sde): du nam yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des byang chub bsgrubs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig
316a6(mdo sde): rten las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas la
316a7(mdo sde): ni dad pa yis/ /bsod nams chung ngu skye mi 'gyur/ /chos mchog thos dang dge 'dun la/ /gus par byas pa'ang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad pa la/ /byang chub thob par dka' ba
316b1(mdo sde): med| |de phyir byang chub 'dod pas 'dir/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mchod par bya/ /kun dga' khye'u 'di rkang gnyis kyi/ /mchog ste dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten
316b2(mdo sde): gyi ni 'dren par 'gyur/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te/ /bsam mi khyab la dad pa yi/ /rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
316b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal
316b4(mdo sde): lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sid+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra

322a6(mdo sde): su yin pa dang / ga las 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig ces de skad ces smras na ji skad du lan 'debs par 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe/ cung zad kyang lan gdab tu med do/ /

322b1(mdo sde): 'byor la 'dri ste/ ci khyod so so'i skye bo yin nam/ 'on te slob pa'am/ dgra bcom pa yin zhes de skad smras na lan ji skad gdab/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems pa la
322b2(mdo sde): zhugs te/ che zhe/ 'di'i lan ji skad gdab par bya snyam mo/ /de nas bar snang las btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyi cung zad ci thob pa'am/ rtogs pa'am/ mngon sum du byas pa'am/ mngon
322b3(mdo sde): par rtogs pa gang gis dgra bcom pa yin par shes pa de che zhe 'di la ston cig ces sgra byung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bar snang de las sgra byung ba thos nas bud med de la
322b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe/ bdag ni so so'i skye bo'ang ma yin/ slob pa'ang ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'ang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bdag gis ji ltar gzung
322b5(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i gdags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag la zungs shig /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ni dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad
322b6(mdo sde): pa| nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang / yon gnas zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /smras pa/ che zhe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams
322b7(mdo sde): mchog dang / yon gnas ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes bzhin gyi rdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhe/ gal te bdag zag pa zad pa/ nyon
323a1(mdo sde): mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang / yon gnas yin par 'dzin par gyur na ni de ltar na bdag rdzun smra bar 'gyur na gang gi phyir
323a2(mdo sde): bdag de ltar mi 'dzin pa de'i phyir bdag ni yang dag par smra ba yin gyi rdzun du smra ba zhes mi bya'o/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ sgo khang 'dir lha bden pa mthong
323a3(mdo sde): ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa rnams la slu bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhe/ bden pa mthong ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni slu bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ btsun
323a4(mdo sde): pa| rab 'byor gyis bden pa rnams gzigs sam/ smras pa/ mthong ngo / /smras pa/ gal te bden pa rnams mthong du rung na ni de dag bden pa ma lags par 'gyur
323a5(mdo sde): ro| |de ci'i slad du zhen/ bden pa rnams ni sus kyang mthong bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe/ bden pa mthong zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla
323a6(mdo sde): dwags yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /
323a7(mdo sde): bden pa mthong zhes bgyi ba de ni phyin ci log yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /smras pa/ che zhe/ khyod kyis gang las bsams te de skad smras/ smras pa/
323b1(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor/ phyin ci log gis nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba gang lags pa de ni bden pa mthong bas skye bar 'gyur te/ des na phyin ci log yang dag par mthong bas bden
323b2(mdo sde): ba mthong zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas sgo khang der chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha 'dus pa de dag gis gnas brtan rab 'byor la rags pa'i lus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa
323b3(mdo sde): rab 'byor/ khyod kyis che zhe 'di'i spobs pa thos pa de ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /sems can gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos na mos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa
323b4(mdo sde): legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /gang dag mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mos pa mang ba rnams ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med
323b5(mdo sde): do| |mos pa mang ba la ni 'ching ba med pas na de ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do/ /de nas bud med des yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
323b6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor/ bsod snyoms la rgyur mi bzhud ngam/ bshos bcad de ci bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe/ bdag gi zas ni 'di yin te chos mnyan pa 'di lta bus chog go /
323b7(mdo sde): che zhe/ gang chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi phyir yid mi bde ba skye ba de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no/ /gang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa de ni chos
324a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa ma yin no/ /gang lus dang / srog dang / bsod snyoms 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no/ /gang tha na legs so zhes bya ba 'dod pa
324a2(mdo sde): de chos 'dod pa ma yin no/ /smras pa/ che zhe/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag chos 'dod pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang 'dod pa la mi sred
324a3(mdo sde): pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/ /gang mig dang / gzugs mi 'dod pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos mi 'dod pa
324a4(mdo sde): de ni chos 'dod pa'o/ /gang chos ci la'ang mi brten pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang / gang dag phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi 'dod
324a5(mdo sde): pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/ /gang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/ /gang dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa mi 'dod
