324a7(mdo sde): med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ dper na/ sa'i khams la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang gi sems sa dang 'dra ba de la
324b1(mdo sde): ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ chu la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal pa de bzhin du gang gi sems chu dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo//
324b2(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor/ me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du gang gi sems me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod
324b3(mdo sde): pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang
324b4(mdo sde): gi sems gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byis pa rnams la bzod pa gsol

324b6(mdo sde): ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/ gang dag la mi skye ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol ma 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ dper na/ me 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi 'tshal

325a1(mdo sde): dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces

325a3(mdo sde): so| |gang dag ci'ang mi 'dod pa de dag ni seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la/ gang la dmigs

325b1(mdo sde): bdag kyang de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'jug pas zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe/ theg pa'i rnam pa

326a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du gang dang / gang du mchis

327a6(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /theg pa de ni ma dad pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o/ /theg pa de ni sdang ba rnams byams par bgyid

329a6(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bgyid pa mthong nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa skye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngo mtshar
329a7(mdo sde): che ba nas rmad du byung ba'i bar gyi chos dang ldan no snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

329b4(mdo sde): rab tu byung zhing bsod snyoms la rgyu zhes grag ste/ des kyang 'di ltar nga rgyal bcom na/ kye ma/ bdag cag gis kyang nga rgyal gzhom par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis
329b5(mdo sde): de lta bu mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de

329b7(mdo sde): byin che ba gzi byin che ba rnams kyis dgongs pa la bltas nas/ 'di skad du/ 'di la ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i gnod pa'ang med la/ lus nyam chung ba'ang med

337b6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du sman pas sman mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba las mod pa dang / rin chung ba gang lags pa de dag stsol bar bgyid
337b7(mdo sde): de| des kyang bdag bde ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du de dag bsten par bgyid do/ /de dag bsten pas nad chung ba'i slad du nad de las thar bar 'gyur ba de bzhin

345a1(mdo sde): de khyod kyis kyang bzod pa gyis shig / de nas lha des 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal gyi/ sems can
345a2(mdo sde): su'i tshod kyang ma 'dzin cig / sems can su la'ang rung ste bsam pa ma brtags par chos ma 'chad cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ma thos pa ni

345a4(mdo sde): de lta ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma thos pa ni sla yi/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas nyan thos kyi theg pa thos pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de

346a1(mdo sde): du mdzad pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rgyu la ma brten par rnam par grol bar gyur pa dang / ming dang / gzugs su sgro ma btags par khams

346b1(mdo sde): nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig / gal te btsun pa rab 'byor nyid 'di nas kyang med par gyur la pha rol tu'ang mi skye na de lta na bsod

352b2(mdo sde): pa chen po pa rnams ni ci la'ang mi gnas te/ ma rig pa zad bar bgyi slad du de dag mi gnas pa nas/ rga shi'i bar du zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag mi gnas
352b3(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du mi zad pa'i slad du'o/ /des na de dag ni skye ba'i chos can yang ma lags/ 'gag pa'i chos
352b4(mdo sde): can ma lags so/ /gal te skye bar gyur na ni de las zad par 'gyur na gang gi phyir mi skye ba de'i phyir mi zad do/ /de bas na zad pa'ang ma mchis/ skye ba'ang ma mchis so/ /
352b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi chos ni mi skye ba'i chos can no/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
352b6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe/ khyod ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas phyag bya ba'i 'os
352b7(mdo sde): yin na tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang zag
353a1(mdo sde): gis gang zag la tshod 'dzin pa su zhig mchis te/ che zhe 'di ni 'di ltar rgyan gyis legs par brgyan la 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum
353a2(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni rgyan gyi spobs pa ma lags so/ /smras pa/ 'o na gang gi spobs pa yin/
353a3(mdo sde): smras pa| btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ brgyad pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan lags te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi
353a4(mdo sde): brjed pa'i rgyan dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyan dang /
353a5(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol ba la chog mi shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa rnams la tshul bzhin du
353a6(mdo sde): so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges
353a7(mdo sde): pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan dang / rgyan de'ang sangs rgyas
353b1(mdo sde): kyis byin gyi rlabs dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan te/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ brgyad po de dag ni rgyan dag lags te/ rgyan de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
353b2(mdo sde): ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ che zhe 'di gang
353b3(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes lags/ de nas bud med des bdag nyid kyi lus ci 'dra ba de kho na 'dra ba'i bud med dag gcig tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du
353b4(mdo sde): sprul to/ /sprul nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis bud med 'di la ga las shi 'phos te 'dir skyes zhes dris
353b5(mdo sde): shig / gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bud med 'di ni sprul pa yin te/ sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba med do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
353b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan
353b7(mdo sde): nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni 'chi 'pho'am/ skye ba 'dri bar mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA
354a1(mdo sde): ri'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
354a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba nas shi 'phos nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
354a3(mdo sde): d pa' bud med 'gyur ba 'dis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
354a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas bud med kyi gzugs nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
354a5(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa'i bar dang / bdag gi
354a6(mdo sde): bud med kyi lus ma mchis par gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su ma gyur gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs las mi ldang lags so/ /bud med lnga brgya po de
354a7(mdo sde): dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bud med kyi rang bzhin las gyur te skyes
354b1(mdo sde): pa'i rab bzhin du ma gyur gyi bar dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi bar du bdag cag mi ldang lags so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
354b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das kyi
354b3(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma sna tshogs/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta
354b4(mdo sde): bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug ste/ phyir log
354b5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom
354b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni
354b7(mdo sde): rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
355a1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba bud med lnga brgyas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs
355a2(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub
355a3(mdo sde): s ems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'di bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
355a4(mdo sde): te| 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ des byang
355a5(mdo sde): chub thob pa na bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud
355a6(mdo sde): med 'gyur ba 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan bstan pa gang ngag yin pa'i rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te/ byang chub
355a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /
355b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'byor zhing rgyas la/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang / skye bo
355b2(mdo sde): ma 'phos gang bar 'gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming tsam yang med par 'gyur te/ sems
355b3(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad pad+ma'i snying po las rdzus te skyes nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la gtsang zhing tshangs bar sbyod pa dang / rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par
355b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba de dang / bud med lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga'
355b5(mdo sde): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ de'i mod kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to/ /de
355b6(mdo sde): dag bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor phyag gis byugs so/ /de nas de dag thams
355b7(mdo sde): cad kyis de'i tshe gzungs dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
356a1(mdo sde): bo| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi
356a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod
356a3(mdo sde): kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zungs shig / bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
356a4(mdo sde): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de
356a5(mdo sde): dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
356a6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
356a7(mdo sde): pra dz+nyA warma dang / shI len+d+ra po d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/
356b1(mdo sde): AR+ya tsan+d+rot+ta rA dA ri kA byA ka ra Na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang /
356b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa
356b3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
356b4(mdo sde): byas pa| khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems
356b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes
356b6(mdo sde): pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang
356b7(mdo sde): ldan pa| tshig thogs pa med pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba/ zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos
357a1(mdo sde): zab mo la bzod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa

357a3(mdo sde): gnyer med pa/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba la mkhas pa/ sems yongs su ma gtugs pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid
357a4(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/ tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gcig
357a5(mdo sde): tu ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig sgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang /

357a7(mdo sde): mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur mos pa/ shes rab dang / ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/
357b1(mdo sde): sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ sems thogs pa med pa chos la sred pa dang bral ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ chos

357b4(mdo sde): dang / bag la nyal sna tshogs spong ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa
357b5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu
357b6(mdo sde): chen po thob pa dang / 'byung dka' dang / spos kyi glang po dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / spos kyi 'od
357b7(mdo sde): zer rab tu gtong ba dang / 'brug sgra dang / gser 'od rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /

358a6(mdo sde): po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /
358a7(mdo sde): sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / zhabs 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim
358b1(mdo sde): bdag rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
358b2(mdo sde): gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na li tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ longs spyod mang
358b3(mdo sde): ba| mdzod dang / bang ba mang ba zhig gnas te/ de la chung ma dri med ma zhes bya ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod
358b4(mdo sde): de| zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / de las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad legs par rdzogs pa zhig btsas
358b5(mdo sde): so| |bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyi rol gyi sgo khang gi wa dag las
358b6(mdo sde): kyang mar khu dang / 'bru mar dag rab tu 'dzag cing zhan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa gang yin pa dag ci bder yongs su spyod de/ /
358b7(mdo sde): yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na/ rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ma brdungs par sgra 'byin par
359a1(mdo sde): gyur cing me tog gi char chen po dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur/ khyim gyi grwa bzhir yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'i gter chen po bzhi
359a2(mdo sde): byung zhing kha bye ste kun tu snang bar gyur to/ /bu mo de btsas ma thag tu du skad mi 'byin cing mchi ma mi blog la lhag par yang sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs
359a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sdig las byas pas 'dir ni gtsang ma yi/ /lus su mi skye yid du 'ong bar min/ /sdig las byas pas 'dir ni longs spyod dag /
359a4(mdo sde): 'byor pa'i khyim rnams su yang mi skye'o/ /sbyin dul yang dag sdom dang bag yod cing / /gus dang bcas pas bla ma bsnyen bkur ba'i/ /gya nom rang bzhin las
359a5(mdo sde): kyi rtag tu ni/ /longs spyod bdag nyid chen po'i khyim du 'grub/ /'dren pa rgyal ba 'od srung bsod snyoms phyir/ /yangs pa can gyi grong du zhugs pa na/ /bdag gis
359a6(mdo sde): khang bzang steng nas mthong gyur cing / /mthong nas der ni bdag yid dang ba dran/ /de tshe bdag yid rab tu dang gyur nas/ /bdag la me tog med cing byug pa med/ /phye
359a7(mdo sde): ma spos med zas dang skom med pas/ /ston pa 'di la cis mchod bya snyam sems/ /de nas bdag gis sgra thos sangs rgyas ni/ /'gro ba dgrol phyir zang zing med spyod
359b1(mdo sde): cing / /'jig rten brtse phyir thugs rje skyes nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bsod snyoms slad du 'jig rten brgyan/ /gal te rgyal ba de dag mchod 'dod na/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod
359b2(mdo sde): kyis smon lam thob/ /byang chub sems bskyed brtan gyur gang yin pa/ /de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med/ /bar snang sgra thos de nas bdag gis ni/ /mtshan
359b3(mdo sde): mchog spras pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid skyes nas/ /khang pa de nas rang gis lus mchongs te/ /bar snang ta la srid la 'dug nas
359b4(mdo sde): ni| |phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba 'od srung de yi sku/ /rin chen ri dang lhun po 'dra ba mthong / /rgyal ba'i mthus ni bdag gi
359b5(mdo sde): lag mthil du/ /man+dA ra ba'i phur ma che byung zhing / /de dag bdag gis 'od srung gtor ba dang / /me tog gdugs gyur nam mkha' la ni gnas/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i
359b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa/ /mtshan gyis sku brgyan de dag bltas na yang / /ji ltar 'od srung steng na 'dug pa ltar/ /de dag la yang me tog gdugs nyid snang / /mkha'
359b7(mdo sde): la gnas bzhin bdag gis tshig smras pa/ /bskal pa chu rdul snyed du spyad bya zhing / /byang chub ma thob bdag phyir mi ldog go /bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang gnyis
360a1(mdo sde): gtsor gyur cig / bdag gis seng+ge'i nga ro de thos nas/ /de tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba yi/ /lha mi lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams//
360a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la yang dag zhugs/ /thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lhar skyes shing / /las bzang byas pa chud zar ma gyur pas/ /de nas shi 'phos 'dzam
360a3(mdo sde): gling 'dir 'ongs kyi/ /de phyir skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams byos/ /gang tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyur pa/ /de tshe bdag gis rgyal ba shAka thub mchod/ /bdag ni 'dod
360a4(mdo sde): dang longs spyod lus mi gnyer/ /rgyal ba yang dang yang du mchod par bya/ /bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing / /nyin gcig 'dra ba tshe rabs brgya
360a5(mdo sde): yang dran/ /bdag 'dir skyes pa'i dpal yang 'di 'dra na/ /mkhas pa su zhig rgyal la gus mi skyed/ /de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas cang
360a6(mdo sde): mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu mthun pas lus la lha'i gos rin po che dag gyon bzhin du byung bar gyur nas/ de'i
360a7(mdo sde): lus las zla ba las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer gser gyi mdog tu snang ba dag kyang byung ngo / /de nas pha ma dag gis de'i ming zla mchog ces bya
360b1(mdo sde): bar btags so/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog de skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam cig gis/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu mo lo brgyad lon pa lta bu'i na tshod du kun tu
360b2(mdo sde): snang ngo / /des sa'i phyogs gang dang / gang dag tu 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / mal bcas par gyur pa dang / de dag tu 'od zer gser gyi mdog lta bu
360b3(mdo sde): dag snang bar gyur to/ /de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i dri dag dang / kha nas kyang ut+pa la sngon po'i dri rang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas yangs pa
360b4(mdo sde): can gyi grong khyer gyis tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa rigs che ba rnams dang / rigs mtho ba dag gis bu mo zla mchog
360b5(mdo sde): gi lus kyi gzugs dang / kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems shin tu dkris par gyur cing so so nas 'di
360b6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ de bdag gi chung mar gyur na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas skye bo phal po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyir sems brtson par gyur te/ de dag las
360b7(mdo sde): kha cig ni li tsa bI dri ma med par gags pa la bsnyen par byed/ bsten par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed par gyur to/ /kha cig ni nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
361a1(mdo sde): rdo rje dang / bai DUR+ya dang / spug dang / an+da rnyil dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru bye ba snyed dag sbyin zhing 'dod pa skyed par byed do/ /kha cig ni nor
361a2(mdo sde): dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / longs spyod dang / kha zas dag stobs par byed do/ /kha cig ni bran dang / bran mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag las bsad pa
361a3(mdo sde): dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa la sogs pa dag gis 'jigs pa ston par byed do/ /kha cig li tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces zer te/ gal te khyod kho bo cag
361a4(mdo sde): la bu mo zla mchog 'bul bar mi byed na/ de'i phyir khyed la des sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya zhing khyod la gnod pa chen po'ang bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas li tsa bI dri ma med par
361a5(mdo sde): grags pa 'di snyam du ma la dpung dag lhags nas bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bu mo'ang phrogs la bdag kyang srog dang phral bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ skrag cing
361a6(mdo sde): dngangs la sgyid lug cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ de dran pa nyams shing bzhin gyi sro shi la rab tu du zhing mchi ma blags te/ mig mi 'dzums par bu mo zla mchog la
361a7(mdo sde): lta'o/ /bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha ngu zhing yi shi la gdong mchi mas yog cing yul yul por gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ ci'i
361b1(mdo sde): slad du 'di ltar bshums shing bshums mo dag rab tu glog par mdzad lags/ de nas li tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/
361b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar khyod 'phrog cing khyod kyi phyir grong khyer thams cad du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dag kun tu 'byung bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ de'i phyir dpung dag lhags shing bcom ste/
361b3(mdo sde): khyod phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas des na mchi ma byung ba yin mod/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te dzam gling sems can thams
361b4(mdo sde): cad dag / sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur cing / /de dag mtshon thogs bdag slad rgyug gyur kyang / /de dag rnams kyis bdag gzhom rngo mi thogs/ /byams sems ldan
361b5(mdo sde): la dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/ /ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa gzhan mi 'byung / /byams sems tha ba zhe sdang ma mchis pas/ /byams pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi
361b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /yab bdag 'jig rten dag la byams pa che/ /ngan bu bdag bzhin 'gro la dga' bar gnas/ /nam yang gzhan la sdug bsngal ma bgyis pas/ /de phyir ngan bu
361b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab/ /chags bral nam yang 'dod chags ma mchis shing / /byams pa yongs bsgoms zhe sdang ma mchis lags/ /bdag la chags sdang gti mug
362a1(mdo sde): ma mchis te/ /de phyir ngan bu gzhan gyis mi thub yab/ /yab dang yum la byams pa mchis pa ltar/ /'gro ba kun la rgyun du bdag de
362a2(mdo sde): bzhin/ /yab gang 'jig rten dag la de 'drar byams/ /de ni nam yang gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /nam mkha' dog sa 'dzin par bgyid gyur ram/ /lhun po yungs
362a3(mdo sde): 'bru'i nang du gnas gyur tam/ /rgya mtsho chen po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang / /bdag 'joms bgyid par rngo thogs ma mchis yab/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis
362a4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum/ de'i slad du 'di ltar deng nas dgung bdun na bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung
362a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang rang gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyi/ der khyod cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mde'i
362a6(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad kyang rgyan dag gis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i tshogs dag gis kyang byi dor
362a7(mdo sde): gyis shig ces shul po che dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo thams cad du dril dkrol zhing sgra bsgrag tu gsol/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gi pha ma gnyis rang gi
362b1(mdo sde): khyim nas byung ste/ 'di skad du/ deng nas zhag bdun na bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang bu mo gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par gyur gyi/ der

362b4(mdo sde): phal po che rnams 'di ltar rang rang gi lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs dag brgyan par bya ba la brtson par gyur cing / sems la 'di snyam du ci
362b5(mdo sde): nas kyang bu mo zla mchog ni bdag la 'dzin gyi/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin grang snyam du sems te/ de dag phan tshun 'gran pas rang rang brgyan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshong
362b6(mdo sde): dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / zhang blon dang / bram ze dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / las mi'i bar dag kyang shin tu khrus byas shing lus legs par byugs te/ gos bzang
362b7(mdo sde): po bgos shing rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan nas rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams la khyed cag sgrims shig / gal te bu mo zla mchog 'u bu cag gi gan du rang mi
363a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba blta na/ de phyir de mthus drangs la phrogs shig ces skul bar byed do/ /de ltar zhag bdun 'das pa dang / skye bo phal po che dag ngo
363a2(mdo sde): mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog nyi ma drug pa la zla ba nya ba'i tshe gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa
363a3(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs te mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na steng gi khang bzang gi thog na 'chag cing 'dug go / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas
363a4(mdo sde): par pad+ma sdong bu ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai DUR+ya/ snying po ni rdo'i snying po las byas pa 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ blta na sdug pa/ 'od gsal ba
363a5(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur to/ /pad+ma de'i snying po'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ sku mdog gser 'dra la gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/ skyes bu
363a6(mdo sde): bzang po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs mdzes par byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa zhig
363a7(mdo sde): kyang byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis khyim de thams cad snang bas gsal bar gyur to/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis pad+ma de mthong zhing de

363b2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di 'dra'i dpal dang ldan pa khyod/ /ci lags lha 'am 'on te klu/ /lha min gsang ba mi 'am ci/ /su lags dris pa nges par gsungs//

363b5(mdo sde): bzhin mdzes 'phags pa/ /ji ltar bzung zhing rab tu gnas/ /gang nas 'dir byon gang du gshegs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des bu mo zla mchog la phyir
363b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha min klu yang min/ /mi 'am ci min gnod sbyin min/ /sangs rgyas shAkya seng+ge yis/ /nga ni khyod kyi gan du btang / /nga ni lha
363b7(mdo sde): min gnod sbyin min/ /klu min mi'am ci mi min/ /chos byung nga deng khyod kyi phyir/ /lha mi 'dul bas bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bu mo zla
364a1(mdo sde): mchog gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba/ /de mdog ci 'dra 'dir gsungs la/ /de yi rtags dang dbyibs
364a2(mdo sde): gsungs dang / /de thos bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur/ /khyod 'dir sangs rgyas mtshan gsungs na/ /de mdog rtags dang dbyibs mi gsung / /sangs rgyas rung spyod gang dang
364a3(mdo sde): mthun/ /mi mnyam mdzod spobs 'dir gsungs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des/ bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ de ni sku mdog
364a4(mdo sde): gser 'dra zhing / /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga'/ /sems can kun gyi mchod rten de/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /byed ldan sems can rnams kyi ni/ /

364a6(mdo sde): zad med/ /ye shes kun gyi pha rol byon/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /des ni sems can kun gyi sems/ /thugs gcig gis ni rtogs gyur kyang / /kun gyi
364a7(mdo sde): sems la nam du yang / /rlom pa mi mnga' gzhan du na/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa sbyin pas 'phags/ /tshul khrims spyod pas mthor 'phags shing / /bzod dang brtson
364b1(mdo sde): 'grus mngon 'phags la/ /bsam gtan shes rab yang dag 'phags/ /bzo rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas/ /des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med/ /byams dang thugs rje phun

365a1(mdo sde): bltar mi mthong / /spyan lnga dag dang ldan pa dang / /stobs dang dbang po lnga mnga' zhing / /byang chub yan lag lam la gnas/ /dang tshul bzang zhing

367a1(mdo sde): dbus su byung ba mthong ba dang / bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyug go /de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi grong

367a6(mdo sde): brkam med na/ /me mdag 'obs 'dra rab 'bar 'dod spong zhing / /dbang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdams pa dang / /gang dag tshangs spyod rnams spyod dag pa dang / /
367a7(mdo sde): gang dag gzhan gyi bud med rnams mthong na/ /ma sring snyam du 'du shes skyed byed na/ /de dag mdzes shing shin tu blta sdug la/ /rtag tu mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur//
367b1(mdo sde): gang gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byed la/ /bdag gis spu yi khung nas byung ba'i dri/ /'dod chags sems kyis bdag gis de ma bsgrubs/ /de ni sbyin dang dul ba'i 'bras bu
367b2(mdo sde): yin| |kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ /'dod chags bral la chags pa ma skyed cig /ji ltar smras bden nam yang rdzun min te/ /mdun gyi thub dbang 'di
367b3(mdo sde): ni bdag gi dbang / /sngon chad khyod cag kho mo'i phar gyur la/ /kho mo'ang khyed kyi pha dang phu nu dang / /sring mo'am mar yang yang dang yang gyur pas/ /su zhig ma la 'dod chags
367b4(mdo sde): sems skyed byed/ /sngon chad kho mos khyod kun bsad gyur cing / /khyed kyis kho mo'ang sngon chad bsad gyur pas/ /thams cad phan tshun dgra bo gshed yin na/ /khyed cag ji
367b5(mdo sde): ltar 'dod chags sems skyed byed/ /chags pas gzugs dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing / /chags sems can dag bde 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /chags pa'i sems
367b6(mdo sde): ldan mya ngan mi 'da' bas/ /de phyir 'dod chags yongs su spang bar bya/ /'dod pa'i gzhi las dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags las ni yi dwags dud 'gror
367b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gang dag 'dod chags dkris pa'i sems ldan pa/ /grul bum lha min gnod sbyin sha zar 'gyur/ /'dod chags las ni zhar ba theng po dang / /lce med gzugs
368a1(mdo sde): mi sdug pa dag tu 'gyur/ /gang dag 'dod chags ngan pa'i spyad spyod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skyon gyi snod du 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur
368a2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang / /sum cu gsum pa'i dbang phyug brgya byin dang / /tshangs pa dbang ldan dbang sgyur gang yin pa/ /de ni tshangs spyod yangs pa spyod pa yin/ /rtag
368a3(mdo sde): tu 'dod pa dag la brkam pa rnams/ /dmus long 'on pa glen pa khyi phag dang / /rnga mo bong bu spre'u dang glang po dang / /stag dang gnag rta phye leb sbrang bur 'gyur/ /gang
368a4(mdo sde): dag tshangs spyod yangs pa spyod byed pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug dga' ba rnams dang ni/ /tshong dpon khyim bdag blon por gyur nas ni/ /bde zhing yid bde zhi bar 'gro bar
368a5(mdo sde): 'gyur| |rang rgyal rnams dang de bzhin dgra bcom dang / /sangs rgyas mtshan gyis spras pa gsal gyur cing / /bla med byang chub zhi ba rtogs gyur nas/ /sems can tshogs
368a6(mdo sde): chen rnams kyi don mdzad 'gyur/ /'dod pas 'khor ba dag na bsreg pa dang / /yang na du bas bdug cing bsad pa'am/ /bcing dang de bzhin brdeg bsdigs mgo dang
368a7(mdo sde): ni| |rna mig sna dang rkang pa gcad par 'gyur/ /'dod spyod nyes pa gcig tu ma zad de/ /'dod rnams mi mthun nyes pa mtha' yang med/ /gal te myur du de nas thar 'dod
368b1(mdo sde): na| |tshur shog rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar 'deng / /lha mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/ /rten dang dpung gnyen gzhan dag yod min zhing / /rgyal ba 'byung ba bskal pa brgyar
368b2(mdo sde): dkon gyi/ /thams cad lhan cig 'grogs te 'dong bar bya/ /bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod las chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing /
368b3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra chen po 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu byung ste/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/
368b4(mdo sde): sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rab tu gsil to/ /skye bo phal po che de dag kyang shin tu yid byung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas 'ga'
368b5(mdo sde): yang phyin chad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / 'thab pa dang / 'chab pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang
368b6(mdo sde): sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral la lus rab tu sim zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog de la ma dang / sring mo dang / ston pa lta bur sdug par gyur
368b7(mdo sde): cing phyag byas te ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa de dag gis kyang mngon par gtor to/ /gtor ma thag tu sangs
369a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus de nas de'i mod la me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad phyed tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang
369a2(mdo sde): thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog par snang de las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyis sa la ma reg par nam mkha' la 'chag bzhin du yangs pa can
369a3(mdo sde): gyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ngo / /de'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang / bteg pa thams cad du sa chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad
369a4(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong tham pa'ang bu mo zla mchog song ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe
369a5(mdo sde): sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu
369a6(mdo sde): mo zla mchog skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po
369a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po/ bu mo zla mchog 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/ bdag cag gis 'di ci bzod pa thob pa
369b1(mdo sde): zhig gam/ 'on te ma yin zhes shes par bya yi/ dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su dri bar bya'am/ zhes nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dge slong de dag dang lhan cig tu bu mo
369b2(mdo sde): zla mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ khyod gar 'gro /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di skad du bu mo khyod gang
369b3(mdo sde): 'gro zhes gsung ba ni gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchis lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni yangs pa can du 'jug la khyod ni yangs
369b4(mdo sde): pa can nas 'byung na/ 'o na khyod/ 'di skad du/ gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchis lags so zhes zer ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa
369b5(mdo sde): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ khyod zhabs gang nas 'deg cing gang du 'jog par mdzad lags/ shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo ni rkang pa nam mkha' las 'deg cing nam
369b6(mdo sde): mkha' nyid la 'jog par byed do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bdag kyang sug pa nam mkha' las 'deg cing nam mkha' nyid la 'jog par bgyid de/ nam
369b7(mdo sde): mkha'i khams la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de'i slad du bdag gis/ 'di skad ces/ khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi
370a1(mdo sde): lags so zhes smras so/ /btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ khyod gar gshegs/ shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o//
370a2(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba lags pas bdag kyang der mchi ba lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa /
370a3(mdo sde): bu mo/ gal te chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin na/ 'o na khyod ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro /bu mos smras pa /
370a4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang / 'jig
370a5(mdo sde): pa'ang ma mchis la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ma gtogs par yang gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so/ /
370a6(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mchi ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
370a7(mdo sde): ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag
370b1(mdo sde): par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di skad du/ khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs
370b2(mdo sde): pa yin zhes gsungs pa ni/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de'i slad du de khyod nyid la zhu yi/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ khyod
370b3(mdo sde): kyis rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par zhugs pa zhig
370b4(mdo sde): lags sam/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags/ shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa'am/
370b5(mdo sde): spros pa 'ga' yang med la tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin/ sna tshogs nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de'i slad
370b6(mdo sde): du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang / tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ yongs su
370b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyi spobs pa ni ngo mtshar na/ gzhan yang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
371a1(mdo sde): pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di skad ces/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen
371a2(mdo sde): bkur byas zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed cig yin
371a3(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa ji snyed pa'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'ang ji snyed cig yin
371a4(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ sems can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa /
371a5(mdo sde): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod
371a6(mdo sde): kyis ci zhig lan btab pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan bdag gis btab lags so/ /shA radwa
371a7(mdo sde): ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bos ci zhig yongs su dris/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de dag nyid nges par bstan lags
371b1(mdo sde): so| |shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdags su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par bstan par mi nus so/ /bu mos smras pa/
371b2(mdo sde): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la'ang gang gis yongs su dris pa dang /
371b3(mdo sde): gang gis lan btab pa de gnyis ka'ang dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa
371b4(mdo sde): dag yod pa kho na yin pas khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA
371b5(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de'ang spros pa lags so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de'ang spros pa lags so/ /nye ba zhes bgyi ba'am/ ring pa
371b6(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba de'ang spros pa lags so/ /btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di skad ces/ khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
371b7(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ chad pa ma
372a1(mdo sde): mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don gcig pa ma lags pa/ don tha dad pa ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ brjod
372a2(mdo sde): du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas de la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis
372a3(mdo sde): lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ byang chub ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas
372a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song zhig dang / kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan
372a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir der 'dod ngo / /de nas gnas brtan shA radwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan 'tshal
372a6(mdo sde): ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par mdzad/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
372a7(mdo sde): shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang dag nyan par bgyid kyang dga' bar mi bgyid/ mngon par dga' ba mi bgyid pa rnams la'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ sems can mang po dag chos
372b1(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dag la chos ston par mi mdzad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de
372b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bdag cag la chos ston par
372b3(mdo sde): mdzad pa'o/ /'di ni chos te bstan par bgyi ba'o snyam du sems lags kyi/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ chos sam /
372b4(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bgyi bar sems pa ma mchis lags so/ /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos gnas brtan shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
372b5(mdo sde): pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na der ni chos bstan pa chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur bas bdag
372b6(mdo sde): cag zan bcad de phyir log na ni 'o bu cag la legs kyi/ bdag cag chos mnyan pa de lta bu las phyi rol tu gyur na ni ma yin no/ /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag phyir phyogs
372b7(mdo sde): te de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
373a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /
373a2(mdo sde): bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
373a3(mdo sde): mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /skye bo phal po che de dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
373a4(mdo sde): byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs rgyar dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/
