373b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ 'di ni sprul pa ste sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho'ang med la skye ba'ang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang
373b2(mdo sde): bzhin gyi chos thams cad la gang 'chi 'pho ba'am/ skye ba de ma mthong lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras
373b3(mdo sde): so| |bu mo/ bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus sgyur bar mi byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs
373b4(mdo sde): kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid lags pas stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang / 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'dzin
373b5(mdo sde): gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dis
373b6(mdo sde): gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa rtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyi chos kyis gtam la
373b7(mdo sde): spobs par gyis shig/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba dang / rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/ chos kyi dbyings ni yi ger bgrang
374a1(mdo sde): ba'ang ma lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar
374a2(mdo sde): chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i slad du steng du gzigs shig dang / bar snang ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci
374a3(mdo sde): 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra/ nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam
374a4(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta
374a5(mdo sde): ste| dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na de la rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig
374a6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ smras pa/ sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag gis kyang sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
374a7(mdo sde): dag la de ltar sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su bsngos pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thogs med sems kyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams
374b1(mdo sde): pas khyab par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can de dag ji lta ba kho na bzhin du'o/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/
374b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'das pa'ang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma lags la/ sems de'ang 'das pa'ang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma lags/
374b3(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'ang ma lags pas byams pa bsgom pa de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ bu
374b4(mdo sde): mo| khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma thob lags na chos kyi mig lta thob pa ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan
374b5(mdo sde): pas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yun ji srid cig nas
374b6(mdo sde): smig rgyu chu la yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid nas bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bu mo zla mchog la
374b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ khyod yun ji srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ yun
375a1(mdo sde): j i srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa so so skye bo'i sa las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur ba de
375a2(mdo sde): srid kyis lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar srid mo 'di gtso bo chen po/ go cha
375a3(mdo sde): chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cig yang dag par smra'ang 'jigs par mi bgyid/ dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas tshe
375a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ zhugs ni ji tsam du chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo
375a5(mdo sde): nyid lags pas ji tsam du nye bar len pa rnyed pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin
375a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pas tha dad kyi dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas de dag thams cad bdag dang / gzhan dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad
375a7(mdo sde): du nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ byang chub thob nas khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i
375b1(mdo sde): bu/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na gnas brtan shA radwa ti'i bu ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems can dman pa la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ gzhan gyi
375b2(mdo sde): don la mi lta ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gi ming yang grags par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu 'gyur lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo| gang khyod
375b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces/ chos kyi dbyings ni gcig go /de bzhin nyid gcig go/ zhes zer na 'o na ci khyod kyis nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid yin la ci sangs rgyas rnams ni lhag pa yin
375b4(mdo sde): par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ ba lang gi rjes kyi chab gang lags pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i chab gang
375b5(mdo sde): lags pa de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma
375b6(mdo sde): mchis lags so/ /btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba lags mod
375b7(mdo sde): kyi| 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /
376a1(mdo sde): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa dang / phyogs bcu'i
376a2(mdo sde): ' jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa'i nam mkha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis pa lags mod
376a3(mdo sde): kyi| 'on kyang yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams la ni phyogs bcu'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor
376a4(mdo sde): dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag rab tu mi gnas shing kun tu mi gnas la ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag kyang ma mchis/ rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma mchis lags so/ /btsun pa shA
376a5(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa gcig las nges par 'byung
376a6(mdo sde): ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad med pa grangs
376a7(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rdo mi thogs lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa
376b1(mdo sde): ma yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig go zhes gsungs pa ni skur
376b2(mdo sde): pa 'debs pa lags so/ /shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ ci'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de'i slad du de khyod nyid la yongs su zhu yi/ khyod kyis
376b3(mdo sde): ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ gang gi tshe btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe ji ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
376b4(mdo sde): lag mthil ltar mnyam par kun tu gnas par gyur lags sam/ ji ga shing ljon pa dang / ri thams cad kyis khyod logs su mngon par phyogs te btud/ mngon par btud/
376b5(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu btud lags sam/ ji ga ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags sam/ ji ga sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur lags
376b6(mdo sde): sam/ ji ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug
376b7(mdo sde): pa'i bar dag 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bus snang bas gyur lags sam/ ji ga lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ ji ga bdud kyis sa dang / nam mkha'
377a1(mdo sde): dpag tshad sum cu tshun chad dpung gis khyab par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ ji ga sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis
377a2(mdo sde): rnam par grol lags sam/ ji ga khyod byang chub pa dang dus gcig kho nar bdud thams cad nges par bcom lags sam/ shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis kho
377a3(mdo sde): bo la ji skad smras pa de dag las de'i rgyu gcig tsam yang ma byung ngo / /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po dam pa la gnas
377a4(mdo sde): pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan yang dpag tu ma mchis pa dag byung bar gyur pas na/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol
377a5(mdo sde): ba dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni de lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla mchog la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bu mo/ legs so/ /
377a6(mdo sde): legs so/ /bu mo/ khyod de skad ston pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
377a7(mdo sde): pad+ma la bzhugs pa byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de pad+ma'i gdan de las mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan
377b1(mdo sde): 'das nyid kyi sku lte ba'i khung du zhugs so/ /de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas
377b2(mdo sde): pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ sdong bu rnams ni gser/ 'dab ma rnams ni dngul/ snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /pad+ma de
377b3(mdo sde): dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa pad+ma la bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i
377b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu gshegs te sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu snang zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
377b5(mdo sde): chos ston pa de dag la 'dir kun tu grag go / de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid
377b6(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nas des lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur pa'i pad+ma gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de me tog gi khang pa
377b7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug
378a1(mdo sde): par gyur to/ khang pa brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan rkang pa rin po ches spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma bting ba zhig byung bar gyur
378a2(mdo sde): to/ khri gdan de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo / /des pad+ma
378a3(mdo sde): de 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de la gnas
378a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig
378a5(mdo sde): byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs
378a6(mdo sde): pa gnyis pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems
378a7(mdo sde): can rnams la 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig / yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des
378b1(mdo sde): de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di
378b2(mdo sde): skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
378b3(mdo sde): gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom
378b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad
378b5(mdo sde): ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi
378b6(mdo sde): mthus de'i lag par pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan
378b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa lnga dang
379a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig / yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa
379a2(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs
379a3(mdo sde): pa drug pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skye mched drug la brten pa'i sems can rnams la skye
379a4(mdo sde): mched drug yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig / yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang
379a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /
379a6(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par
379a7(mdo sde): shes pa gnas pa bdun yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig / yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /
379b1(mdo sde): des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa
379b2(mdo sde): dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa nyid brgyad nges par spang
379b3(mdo sde): ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig / yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs
379b4(mdo sde): so| |'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
379b5(mdo sde): bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i slad du chos ston
379b6(mdo sde): par gyur cig / yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bcu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma
379b7(mdo sde): thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan
380a1(mdo sde): 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan
380a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig / de nas pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i 'phang gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
380a3(mdo sde): n as bla ba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas lha'i bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus
380a4(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe
380a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
380a6(mdo sde): po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas
380a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub
380b1(mdo sde): po| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba
380b2(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/ mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyan
380b3(mdo sde): mnga' zhing / /chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam par brgal/ /'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam mthu mnga' ba/ /rgyal dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /khyod kyis mtha'
380b4(mdo sde): yas dus na sbyin pa byin/ /khyed khrims rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /khyod kyi bzod pa'ang mi g.yo lhun po bzhin/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /bsam
380b5(mdo sde): gtan brnyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa/ /gnod bral na dang rga las rnam par grol/ /rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo/ /thub chen ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu
380b6(mdo sde): mdzad/ /byams la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa po/ /thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas/ /'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal rab tu zhi/ /thub dbang ci
380b7(mdo sde): slad 'dzum par rab tu mdzad/ /khyod sgra gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams rnams su/ /nyi zla myur du mog mog rab mdzad de/ /
381a1(mdo sde): gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang stsol/ /'gro ba'i mgon cig khyod gsung rnam par dag /snyan cing yid 'ong yan lag drug cu
381a2(mdo sde): ldan/ /gang dag mnyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing / /nyon mongs thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang mchis pa'i/ /sems kyi
381a3(mdo sde): spyod pa du ma gang lags pa/ /de mkhyen de dag som nyi gcod pa po/ /rab byung ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /deng su'i sems ni byang chub slad du nges/ /su zhig
381a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs/ /khyab bdag gang gi yid bsams rab tu grub/ /thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /gang gis de ring bdud bzhi pham bgyis
381a5(mdo sde): shing / /nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi ba dag bdud chen dang / /gang gis phung po lha bu mang po'i bdud/ /pham par bgyis sam ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad/ /de ring su zhig
381a6(mdo sde): don chen yangs 'gyur zhing / /su zhig chos la legs bgyid mi'i seng+ge/ /de ring su yi sgra ni phyogs rnams mchi/ /thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /kun mkhyen
381a7(mdo sde): mi dge thams cad rab spangs pa/ /sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa po/ /g.yo ba kun dang log pa rnams spangs pa/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de
381b1(mdo sde): ring su zhig yangs pa chen po thob/ /deng su'i sems kyi smon pa legs 'grub cing / /deng su'i stobs bcu rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /dgra thul ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /
381b2(mdo sde): mkha' la gnas pa lha klu bye ba dang / /gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye cher bcas dang / /sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bud med rnams/ /dga' zhing lha mi dbang po zla ba lta/ /rdzogs pa'i
381b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mang po ni/ /dam chos 'tshal ba rgya mtsho lta bu dag /phyogs bcu dag nas lhags nas dgra thul ba/ /yongs dag thugs mnga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol//
381b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang gi rgyal ba'i cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas/ /byang chub phyir ni rgya chen
381b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed cing / /nga yi mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug pa/ /mdun gyi bu mo mthong ngam kun dga' bo/ /'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu yang / /rgyal ba sum brgya legs par
381b6(mdo sde): mchod byas shing / /ji ltar bdag ni byang chub mchog rig ces/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la mngon sum zhus/ /nam yang lan 'ga' ngan 'gror ma song zhing / /'di ni rtag tu lha mi'i
381b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyes/ /nam yang byang chub sems ni ma brjed cing / /'chi dus byas kyang rtag tu tshe rabs dran/ /rgyal ba 'od srung zhes bya mthong nas ni/ /khang bzang steng nas mdzes
382a1(mdo sde): pa'i lus mchongs te/ /rgya chen sems kyis 'od srung de mchod nas/ /de nas rjes mthun bzod pa thob par gyur/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces
382a2(mdo sde): mtshan gsol pa/ /de la na bza' dam pa phrugs phul bas/ /de phyir 'di yi lus mdog gser 'dra la/ /mdzes shing dge la zla ba 'dra ba yin/ /ston pa gser thub ces
382a3(mdo sde): bya gang yin pa/ /de la bdug pa spos mchog phul bas na/ /de phyir 'di yi kha dang spu khung nas/ /ut+pal tsan+dan dri ngad rab tu 'byung / /gtsug tor zhes bya rkang gnyis mchog
382a4(mdo sde): de la/ /'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtags gyur pas/ /de phyir 'di yi mig mdog mthon mthing la/ /'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur/ /tshe rabs lnga brgya dag
382a5(mdo sde): tu 'dod spangs shing / /tshangs spyod rnam par spyod pa dag byas nas/ /de phyir chags pas gdungs pas de mthong na/ /de tshe 'dod chags can dag chags bral 'gyur/ /sum cu
382a6(mdo sde): rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dir 'phos te/ /'dir li tsa bI khyim ni yangs par skyes/ /skye ba kun tu tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing / /tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i bya ba shes/ /pha
382a7(mdo sde): ma yongs su smin par bya ba dang / /de bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing / /la la byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed phyir/ /de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyes/ /
382b1(mdo sde): bud med skyes pa nye du mdza' bshes dang / /gzhon nu gzhon nu ma dag gdul ba'i phyir/ /de dag stong phrag drug cu 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la yongs smin byas/ /
382b2(mdo sde): 'di ni ring po mi thogs bud med kyi/ /lus bsgyur nga yi bstan la rab 'byung zhing / /tshangs spyod dam pa rgya chen spyad byas nas/ /shi 'phos lha yi 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha
382b3(mdo sde): gnas de nas shi 'phos phyir yang ni/ /dus mtha'i tshe na chos 'di srung 'gyur zhing / /'dir yang skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni/ /'di nas phyir yang dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur//
382b4(mdo sde): gang tshe mi pham dgra las rgyal ba po/ /dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe/ /de ni bzo don sgyu rtsal bya ba kun/ /shes shing mdzes la yon tan kun ldan 'gyur/ /srog chags pa rgya
382b5(mdo sde): phrag du mas mdun bdar cing / /zla ba gsum du rgyal ba mchod byas nas/ /de ni srog chags drug stong sum brgya dang / /lhan cig khyim gyis gnas nas 'byung 'gyur zhing / /rgyal
382b6(mdo sde): ba mi pham bzhugs dang 'das pa yi/ /chos kyi tshul yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i dpa' bo de nas shi 'phos nas/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro /blo ldan
382b7(mdo sde): des ni 'od dpag med pa dang / /gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bye mang gang+gA klung gi ni/ /bye snyed mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ /ting
383a1(mdo sde): 'dzin mngon shes brtson 'grus stobs thob cing / /bskal pa bzang la gang dag phyis 'byung ba'i/ /rang 'byung 'jig rten rnams la phan brtson
383a2(mdo sde): na| |'jig rten mgon de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed/ /bye mang bskal pa de dag mchod byas te/ /sems can bye mang yongs su smin byas shing / /bskal pa bye ba stong
383a3(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu na/ /rgyal ba zla ba mchog ces bya bar 'gyur/ /zla mchog rkang gnyis gtso bo mdzod spu nas/ /'od zer gser mdog shin tu yid 'ong ba/ /gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur
383a4(mdo sde): ba de dag gis/ /'jig rten khams de kun tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'od kyis 'jig rten de khyab pas/ /nyi zla med dang nor bu'i 'od rnams ni/ /snang bar mi 'gyur rgyu skar
383a5(mdo sde): tshogs min zhing / /nyin dang mtshan yang bgrang du yod ma yin/ /de tshe rang sangs rgyas dag yod min zhing / /nyan thos rnams med mu stegs can tshogs med/ /mnyam med de
383a6(mdo sde): yi dge 'dun rnam dag cing / /bud med rnam par spangs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mi rnams thams cad gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can blta na sdug
383a7(mdo sde): mngal na mi gnas 'dod pa mi bsten cing / /pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye zhing 'byung / /rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs 'byung gang yin pa/ /de ni bgrang bas rtogs par mi nus shing /
383b1(mdo sde): thams cad mngon shes thob pa dal spyod dang / /mi skye bzod cing mnyam med chags pa med/ /de na bud med dmigs can yod min zhing / /bslab pa 'dral med phyogs 'dzin
383b2(mdo sde): yod ma yin/ /'jig rten khams de dag cing dga' ldan gyi/ /nye bar spyod pa'i rnam pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gser dngul mu tig dam pa'i dri mchog gis/ /spras shing gtsang la dri med
383b3(mdo sde): yangs pa yin/ /rgyal ba de yi sku tshe lo grangs ni/ /stong phrag bye ba bdun cu gsum du 'gyur/ /ston pa de ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas/ /de tshe dam chos bskal pa gcig gnas
383b4(mdo sde): shing / /bzhugs bzhin mya ngan 'das na'ang de yi ni/ /dam chos mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /gal te rgyal ba dang ni zhing de yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa bskal par brjod
383b5(mdo sde): byas kyang / /rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs gcig bzhin du/ /dpe yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon
383b6(mdo sde): sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags ma thag
383b7(mdo sde): tu bu mo de bud med kyi lus sgyur cing skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten du sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab/
384a1(mdo sde): lha dang / mi'i sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sgra 'khrol bar gyur to/ /'jig rten kun tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to/ /de nas byang
384a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis bar snang de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ ri rab g.yo zhing nam mkha'
384a3(mdo sde): sar ltung ba/ /lha gnas skad cig tsam la 'jig 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtsho mi g.yo dgung zla lhung yang gda'/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sho be'i tshig mi gsung / /phyogs bcu'i
384a4(mdo sde): sems can lus rnams gcig 'gyur zhing / /zhugs ni chab gyur chab ni zhugs gyur gda'/ /mnyam med thub dbang yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'gro la phan bzhed log
384a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig mi gsung / /bar snang dogs kun tu 'dzin gyur zhing / /yungs 'bru'i nang du zhing brgya chud 'gyur la/ /gser ma zhags pas gzung bar rdo thogs gda'/ /rgyal ba
384a6(mdo sde): log pa'i tshig ni gsung mi 'gyur/ /de 'drar yang dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i/ /rgyal ba des bdag byang chub nges bstan cing / /gang phyir dogs kun tu rab g.yos pas/ /
384a7(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur gor ma bkum/ /sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pas na/ /rang 'byung gis ni ji skad gsungs de dang / /sngon chad bskal brgyar bdag
384b1(mdo sde): gis gang btsal ba/ /de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo bskor/ /lha mi lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dag /thams
384b2(mdo sde): cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi/ /bde gshegs 'gyur gyi som nyi ma byed cig /chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis longs spyod rmi 'dra zhing / /
384b3(mdo sde): bdag med gso ba shed bu 'ga' yang med/ /sems can srog med gang zag med par gsungs/ /gzod nas ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams kun/ /rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid
384b4(mdo sde): med pas/ /bdag sngon bud med rang bzhin gyur pa gang / /de ni dngos med gsog stong ya ma brla/ /phyi ma'i dngos de'ang stong zhing skad cig ste/ /dngos med mi g.yo gsog
384b5(mdo sde): dang ya ma brla/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bral gyur cing / /rtog 'gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin/ /gang zhig mnyam med byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing / /thul dka' bdud
384b6(mdo sde): kyang rab tu gzhom pa dang / /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams su ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam ba skor 'dod pa/ /des ni brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la/ /de bzhin
384b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rab tu mchod bgyis dang / /des ni myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /ston pa rgyal ba sdig med lam rtogs 'gyur/ /skyes bu rtsal 'phags gsung snyan mthar
385a1(mdo sde): byon pa/ /rgyal ba mi mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po stsol mdzad pa/ /thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas
385a2(mdo sde): dbang phyug bstod/ /bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde kun rab stsol ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs/ /bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog /
385a3(mdo sde): rang 'byung dbang ldan sred bral bstod par bgyi/ /bdag gis phyogs bcu bltas na de dag tu/ /sdig med sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong / /shAkya seng+ge ji lta
385a4(mdo sde): de lta bur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston/ /rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig /de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig /sems
385a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges pa/ /gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras
385a6(mdo sde): nas bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so/ /des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang
385a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
385b1(mdo sde): de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing bdag nyid lung bstan pa'ang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan
385b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
385b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u de'i phyir pha ma dag gnang bar byed du chug cig /de nas khye'u de'i pha ma dag gis cho 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing de mngon sum du lung bstan pa'ang
385b4(mdo sde): thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lags so/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag slad kyis thob par
385b5(mdo sde): bgyi lags so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas khye'u de rab tu byung ba dang / srog chags khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
385b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi khrag khrig phrag bdun chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
385b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag go / dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i dge slong ma nyis brgya dang /
386a1(mdo sde): srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
386a2(mdo sde): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad
386a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
386a4(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhus chen
386a5(mdo sde): gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya k+She ma ba tI byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags
386a6(mdo sde): pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
386a7(mdo sde): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyi khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
386b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang /
386b2(mdo sde): sham thabs gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod
386b3(mdo sde): snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags kyis bsod snyoms rgyu zhing rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang ga la ba der
386b4(mdo sde): gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma zhes bya ba khang bzang mchog gi steng na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas gshegs
386b5(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar gyur te/ khang bzang gi steng nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
386b6(mdo sde): pa'i gdan dar dkar rin che ba bting ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de
386b7(mdo sde): nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i zhabs la
387a1(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir zhes dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas
387a2(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la gzigs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir mkhyen bzhin
387a3(mdo sde): du rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la bka' stsal pa/ bde ldan ma/ gang lus la thogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta bu shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lha nger 'dug pa'i shing de'i ming
387a4(mdo sde): ci zhes bya/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gi 'bras bu khyod thogs pa//
387a5(mdo sde): shing de'i ming ni ci yin zhes/ /dpa' bo chen po mkhyen bzhin du/ /gang zag mchog gis smras pa ni/ /bdag gis sngon ni gang bskyed pa/ /bsod nams las byung
387a6(mdo sde): shing zhes bgyi/ /'dren pa bdag gis myong ba yi/ /'bras bu de dag de yi lags/ /ljon shing bshad pa de nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams la yod/ /sangs
387a7(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes 'thob 'dod rnams/ /byang chub phyir ni de la gnas/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims chab stsal bas/ /ljon shing de ni rnam par bsrung / /de ni rnam par 'khrungs
387b1(mdo sde): pa na/ /'bras bu bzang po rnams kyang 'byung / /bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus mthus/ /ljon shing bdag gis legs par bsrungs/ /de ni rnam par 'khrungs pa na/ /
387b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu dri med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing 'di blta na mdzes pa ste/ /bsam gtan shes rab me tog rgyas/ /'dren pa bdag gis de dag gi /'bras bu rnams ni myong ba
387b3(mdo sde): lags/ /ji ltar ri la brten pa yi/ /shing rnams yal ga lo ma dag /chu zheng gab par rgya che ba/ /'phel bar gyur te bskyod mi nus/ /de bzhin ljon shing che bzang 'di/ /sangs
387b4(mdo sde): rgyas chos nyid 'tshal bas na/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngon ni legs par bsrungs pa lags/ /'dren pa bsod nams ljon shing 'di'i/ /'bras bu gzhan
387b5(mdo sde): yang mchis lags te/ /bdag gis nyams su myong ba 'di/ /de yi me tog tsam du bas/ /de yi 'bras bu byang chub mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub bla med lags/ /de ni bdag
387b6(mdo sde): gis thob par 'gyur/ /smad pa bud med nyid spangs nas/ /skyes par bdag nyid 'gyur ba lags/ /sems can kun gyi dam pa mchog /chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin//
387b7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi nyen pa yi/ /sems can rnams ni bdag gis dgrol/ /'jig rten kun la snying brtse ba'i/ /skyabs su
388a1(mdo sde): bdag ni 'gyur ba lags/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la bka' stsal pa/ bde ldan
388a2(mdo sde): ma| gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi don dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams
388a3(mdo sde): la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas 'di skad
388a4(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / de bzhin gshegs
388a5(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
388a6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po 'di rnams ci las grub lags/ de bzhin du gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis
388a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams ci las grub lags/ de skad ces
388b1(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod pas na/ /sems can kun
388b2(mdo sde): la phan pa'i phyir/ /ngas kyang 'di ltar ljon pa'i shing / /sngon ni legs pa kho nar bskyed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /de bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan
388b3(mdo sde): bsags/ /yun ring dus nas ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab nges par bsten pa yin/ /sems can rnams la mi mnyam sems/ /ngas ni bsgoms par mi dran te/ /rtag
388b4(mdo sde): tu sems ni mnyam gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni ngas brnyes so/ /nga yi sems ni mnyam pa yi/ /rtag tu sdug dang mi sdug dang / /mdza' dang mi mdza' snyoms pas
388b5(mdo sde): na| |bsod nams shing ni rnam par bskyed/ /des na ljon shing chen po 'di/ /yon tan mang por gyur pa yin/ /'khor los bsgyur nyid ngas thob ste/ /brgya byin nyid kyang
388b6(mdo sde): byas pa yin/ /rnam mang dbang phyug chen po dang / /tshangs pa nyid kyang de las thob/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos/ /chos nyid dag kyang ngas rtogs so/ /de nas
388b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rab tu gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes
389a1(mdo sde): su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /ji ltar mi mchog dam pa po/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas/ /
389a2(mdo sde): sngon ni spyod pa shin tu bslabs/ /de ltar bdag kyang rjes su slob/ /yon tan mthar phyin khyod kyi ni/ /yon tan rnams ltar bdag slob ste/ /srid par sdug bsngal spangs
389a3(mdo sde): nas ni/ /bdag kyang 'di 'drar 'gyur bar bgyi/ /tshe rabs gzhan ni ma lus par/ /bdag gis sbyin pa gang stsal pa/ /mnyam med ye shes mthong slad du/ /de dag thams
389a4(mdo sde): cad yongs su bsngo/ /srid pa 'di'am gzhan dag tu/ /bdag gis tshul khrims gang bsrungs pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob slad du/ /de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo//
389a5(mdo sde): bzod dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab dge ba gang bsten pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyi phyir/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bsngo/ /lus dang ngag dang yid
389a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /las dge ba gang bdag gis bsags/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yon tan phyir/ /byang chub tu ni bdag gis bsngo/ /bud med lus 'di spangs nas ni/ /skyes pa
389a7(mdo sde): mchog tu bdag gyur cig / de ltar skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ /dam pa'i mchog tu bdag gyur cig /de ltar gyur nas bde gshegs kyi/ /'khor lo bla med bskor bar bgyi//
389b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i btson rar bcings pa yi/ /sems can bye ba dgrol bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad pa dag
389b2(mdo sde): gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshig 'di smras pa legs pa yin/ /sems ni rab tu sdom pa legs/ /khyod kyis bdud ni legs par mnan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su
389b3(mdo sde): khyod 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
389b4(mdo sde): dpa' byams pa bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang pos tshim par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bstsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la chos
389b5(mdo sde): kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas lung bstan te/ bde
389b6(mdo sde): ldan ma/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa du ma zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
389b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mchog tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par
390a1(mdo sde): ltung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ yid dang 'thad pa/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas yin te/ khyod
390a2(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
390a3(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / lha dang / mi'i skye dgu rnams kyis ni chos kyi snang ba thob par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
390a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dang / 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
390a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
390a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya shrI ya mahA de bI byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen po dpal lung bstan pa/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
390a7(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang po 'di
390b1(mdo sde): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang
390b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
390b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
390b4(mdo sde): chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
390b5(mdo sde): po dga' byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems
390b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten gsum 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa
390b7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
391a1(mdo sde): chen po dang / thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
391a2(mdo sde): phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / lha mo chen mo dpal yang
391a3(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i
391a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
391a5(mdo sde): brgya stong du mas brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod
391a6(mdo sde): cing bsngags pas lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
391a7(mdo sde): phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
391b1(mdo sde): ma'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i
391b2(mdo sde): bstod pa 'chad na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom
391b3(mdo sde): rkun dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel
391b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du'ang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di
391b5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshig 'di legs par bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang /
391b6(mdo sde): thos nas nyams su len pa gang lags pa de dag gi yon tan dang / phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
391b7(mdo sde): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed lags/
392a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
392a2(mdo sde): de| spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me
392a3(mdo sde): tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan
392a4(mdo sde): dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel
392a5(mdo sde): ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba
392a6(mdo sde): dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba
392a7(mdo sde): gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dul
392b1(mdo sde): zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
392b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi

392b4(mdo sde): pa tsan+dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
392b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag
392b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal
392b7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol
393a1(mdo sde): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
393a2(mdo sde): pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
393a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mdog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la
393a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs
393a5(mdo sde): kyi go cha ri rab kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag
393a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

393b6(mdo sde): cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i
393b7(mdo sde): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
394a1(mdo sde): mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstan to//

394a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /
