396a2(mdo sde): par gzigs shig / sgrol cig /thar bar mdzod cig /bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swAhA/ oM gaM ga sarba ti r+tha mu khi
396a3(mdo sde): swAhA/ oM sarba bi tri swAhA/ sarba maM ga la d+hA ra Nai swAhA/ tsa turbed sarba na k+Sha tra gra hA pa Na ga Na a d+hi mUr+t+yai swAhA/ brah+mA ya swAhA/ biSh+Na be swA hA/ ru dra ya swAhA/ bi shwa mu
396a4(mdo sde): khA ya swAhA/ oM kli ni kli ni sarba kAr+yA sA d+ha ni/ sa ni sa ni/ A ba ha de bi shrI/ bai shrA ba NA ya swAhA/ su bar+Na d+ha na d+han+ya/ A kaR+Sha N+yai swAhA/ sarba pUr+Na A kaR+Sha N+yai swAhA/
396a5(mdo sde): shrI ha ma ba tI A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ sarba pA pa nA sha n+ye swA hA/ sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka tA yai swA hA/ sarba de ba tA b+hi mu kha shrI ye swA hA/ A
396a6(mdo sde): yurba la bar+d+ha ka R+Sha yai swAhA/ sarba bi dwa maM ga la hastA ye swAhA/ saM haM ba hi nI yai swAhA/ pad+ma sam+ba d+hA yai swAhA/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka khorda bi nA sha n+yai swAhA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras
396a7(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug / gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams
396b1(mdo sde): cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
396b2(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo
396b3(mdo sde): dpal la'ang tsan+dan gyi bdug pa phul te/ bklags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ lha thams cad
396b4(mdo sde): kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang
396b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
396b6(mdo sde): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs
396b7(mdo sde): so|| ||rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dza ya ma ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
397a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
397a2(mdo sde): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dag dang thabs
397a3(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal ba'i blo gros/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
397a4(mdo sde): mo bsod nams 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/ /shes rab 'dod pas thos pa la brtson par bya'o/ /mtho ris 'dod pas tshul khrims bsrung
397a5(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /longs spyod 'dod pas gtong ba spel bar bya'o/ /gzugs bzang ba 'dod pas bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o//
397a6(mdo sde): gzungs 'dod pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o/ /ye shes 'dod pas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par bya'o/ /thar pa 'dod pas sdig pa thams cad
397a7(mdo sde): spang bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad bde bar bya bar 'dod pas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /skad snyan pa 'dod pas bden par smra bar bya'o/ /yon tan
397b1(mdo sde): 'dod pas rab tu dben pa la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o/ /zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med pa mang du bya'o/ /lhag mthong
397b2(mdo sde): 'dod pas chos stong par so sor brtag pa mang du bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dod pas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /lha
397b3(mdo sde): dang / mi'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'dod pas stong pa'i chos
397b4(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /yon tan thams cad thob par 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
397b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
397b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
397b7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a ba lo ki nI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
398a1(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
398a2(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
398a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam
398a4(mdo sde): par dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang / bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros
398a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
398a6(mdo sde): su dag go / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag
398a7(mdo sde): pa| rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ stobs
398b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa
398b2(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go / blo gros rnam par dag pa/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog
398b3(mdo sde): dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha'
398b4(mdo sde): rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i
398b5(mdo sde): mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin
398b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la yon phul ba'ang tshad med do/ /mtha' yas so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mtshungs pa med do/ /dpag tu med do/ /grangs med do/ /dpag gis mi lang ngo / /
398b7(mdo sde): brjod du med do/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa
399a1(mdo sde): dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya mtha' ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ring
399a2(mdo sde): bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag ste byang chub
399a3(mdo sde): tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang /
399a4(mdo sde): gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan
399a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa
399a6(mdo sde): skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
399a7(mdo sde): pa 'dzin pa dang / de'ang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas
399b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye par 'gyur te/ chos bzhi po de dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
399b2(mdo sde): kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs mtho zhing rigs che nga dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam
399b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag
399b4(mdo sde): pa| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
399b5(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/ /su zhig skor ba byed pa ni/
399b6(mdo sde): tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ /bsod nams ldan zhing 'jigs med 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas
399b7(mdo sde): na ni/ /tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/ /ngas ni gang dag bstan pa yi/ /mi khom brgyad po de dag
400a1(mdo sde): spong / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa/ /mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig /mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /mtshan gyis legs
400a2(mdo sde): par brgyan pa dang / /mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /le lo can du de mi 'gyur/ /de ni phyug cing nor cher 'gyur/ /bsod nams ldan zhing rdzi ba med/ /'jig rten sgron
400a3(mdo sde): ma mnyes byas nas/ /yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /bdag med stong pa'i chos thos na/ /de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur/ /myur du dad pa thob 'gyur zhing / /chos don
400a4(mdo sde): ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur/ /tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang / /phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /gtong ba btang zhing
400a5(mdo sde): ser sna med/ /dzam+bu'i gling na gang yang rung / /khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa/ /der ni brtan pa de skye ste/ /dma' ba dag ni rnam par spangs/ /mchod rten bskor ba
400a6(mdo sde): byas na ni/ /skye ba thams cad kun tu yang / /dbang cher grags pa'i khyim bdag dang / /dpal dang gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ /bram ze sA la che 'dra dang / /tshul khrims
400a7(mdo sde): ldan zhing mang thos dang / /rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra dang / /phyug cing nor cher ldan par 'gyur/ /ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi/ /sa kun la ni gang smon pa/ /gling bzhi
400b1(mdo sde): dag gi dbang phyug bla/ /rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas
400b2(mdo sde): la| |yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su/ /song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dad/ /lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug go /lha yi dbang po brgya byin
400b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang / /de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang / /lha dbang shin tu 'phrul dga' dang / /dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /mchod rten
400b4(mdo sde): bskor ba byas na ni/ /de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mchod
400b5(mdo sde): rten la/ /mi gang skor ba byed pa yis/ /bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang / /brjod pas zad par bya mi nus/ /su zhig byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /ston pa'i mchod
400b6(mdo sde): rten phyag 'tshal ba/ /de ni bskal pa bye bar yang / /nam yang long zhing 'theng mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/ /mngon du skor ba byed pa ni/ /bung ba sngon
400b7(mdo sde): po mdzes 'dra yi/ /rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob 'gyur/ /mchod rten skor ba byed na ni/ /de ni nges par rtag tu yang / /mthun pa'i don kun thob 'gyur zhing / /don min rnams
401a1(mdo sde): ni spangs par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ /mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni le lo med 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu bag yod ldan par
401a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ /brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan la/ /brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang / /de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur/ /me dang dug
401a3(mdo sde): dang mtshon gyis de/ /nam yang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa tshe ni rdzogs rdzogs su/ /zad par byas nas 'chi dus byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ /pho brang
401a4(mdo sde): 'khor dang yul 'khor dang / /grong rdal rnams su longs spyod dang / /gzugs kyis khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /de ni 'dod pa mi bsten
401a5(mdo sde): cing / /lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing / /gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yang dag par
401a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byang
401a7(mdo sde): d e| de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag gis lus kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces
401b1(mdo sde): de la mos pa skyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i
401b2(mdo sde): phyir ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
401b3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa bla na med pas kyang zad par bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
401b4(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i phyir te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
401b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen
401b6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am/
401b7(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa'am/ sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing ngam/ ri'am/ khung bu'am/ bu ga'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs
402a1(mdo sde): su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
402a2(mdo sde): ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab
402a3(mdo sde): tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes
402a4(mdo sde): mos pa bskyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis 'jugs dang / /su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba/ /de 'gro chan 'jig rten gsum
402a5(mdo sde): po 'dud pa byed/ /mi rnams gtso bo rang byung gang du 'gro byed pa/ /de logs su ni rtswa dang shing dang sdong dum dang / /sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu 'dab ma dang / /
402a6(mdo sde): yid 'ong dri ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus mo btsugs pa ni/ /de la mi yi dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur//
402a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lha yi rgyal po dang / /tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gtugs pa byed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs
402b1(mdo sde): phyag byas na/ /dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go char 'gyur/ /mthu che bla mar bya zhing thub par dka'
402b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur/ /de la sems can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed
402b3(mdo sde): de| |skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ /de la 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po rab tu 'dud/ /
402b4(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang mi dang lto 'phye chen po 'dud/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba//
402b5(mdo sde): gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba thob/ /'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs
402b6(mdo sde): rgyas gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya bgrangs zad 'gyur na/ /de ni ring por mi
402b7(mdo sde): thogs byang chub mtshungs med 'thob/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la/ /bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas bsti stang byed pa bas/ /gang zhig phyi dus mi zad bskal
403a1(mdo sde): pa 'di la ni/ /mchod rten phyag 'tshal de yi bsod nams ches mang ngo / /sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/ /spyod pa dam
403a2(mdo sde): pa spyad nas khyad par brnyes gyur pa/ /mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na/ /rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos
403a3(mdo sde): te| |me tog phreng ba byas nas su/ /mchod rten dag la su 'bul ba/ /de ni nam yang phongs mi 'gyur/ /mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
403a4(mdo sde): der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi/ /gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'di dbul na/ /khang bzang dag dang khang brtsegs pa/ /lha yi bu mos bsten pa rnams//
403a5(mdo sde): sum cu gsum du spyod par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing / /gser gyi bye ma brdal gyur pa/ /bai DUR+ya dang shel dag gi /lha yi rdzing bu thob par 'gyur/ /der ni
403a6(mdo sde): lha yi dga' spyad nas/ /mkhas pa tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi nang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ /mkhas
403a7(mdo sde): pa bag yod gyur nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te/ /rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs
403b1(mdo sde): shing | / zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/ /de ni nam yang rmongs mi 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis mchog la mchod byas na/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /chags pa med cing zhe
403b2(mdo sde): sdang med/ /brkam pa med cing dbang po bsngams/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa/ /kun tu bkur sti
403b3(mdo sde): byas par 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de ni 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur/ /
403b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na/ /lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dma' ba'i rigs ni rnams spangs
403b5(mdo sde): te| |der ni de skye 'gyur ma yin/ /phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang / /'jig rten dbang phyug de 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na/ /gzugs dang don dang longs spyod dang / /
403b6(mdo sde): kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang / /kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni che rabs dran 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams kyi skyon shes
403b7(mdo sde): shing / /changs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na/ /gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang / /ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing / /sdig pa'i las
404a1(mdo sde): ni byed mi 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa mchod byed na/ /de ni spos dang me tog gis/ /nam yang phongs bar mi 'gyur zhing / /dran ldan shes rab
404a2(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs la su mchod pa/ /de yi nor gyi phung po la/ /rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang / /me dang chus kyang reg mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po'i
404a3(mdo sde): mchod rten la/ /dar gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba/ /de ni skam dang mya ngan dang / /nad bu can du gzhar mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa/ /tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du//
404a4(mdo sde): mya ngan med cing gnod med dang / /'khor los bsgyur ba 'byor chen 'gyur/ /'dren pa mchod pa byas na ni/ /rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing / /yan lag rnam par dag
404a5(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ /gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed/ /gang dag 'jig rten rab dkon pa/ /rkang gnyis
404a6(mdo sde): mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/ /mchod cing bde la shes rab ldan/ /byang chub dam pa 'tshang yang
404a7(mdo sde): rgya| |'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /phreng ba'i khang pa byas na ni/ /de ni g.yog 'khor mi phyed cing / /rgyal po 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/ /'phags pa rnams kyis gang
404b1(mdo sde): spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi/ /dge ba'i las la sten par byed/ /lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam/ /'jig rten dag na gang
404b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ /de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang / /bsti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur/ /brtan pa de ni gar skyes pa/ /bsod nams gzi brjid rab tu brjid/ /yul 'khor dag
404b3(mdo sde): dang grong khyer dang / /rigs der bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog la su mchod pa/ /de dag mthu stobs che ba dang / /g.yog
404b4(mdo sde): 'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur/ /byang chub tu ni yongs bsngos te/ /phreng ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bsngags pa'i/ /'byor pa dag ni des
404b5(mdo sde): 'thob bo/ /de ni 'theng dang zhar ba dang / /dman dang ma rungs mi 'gyur gnas/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par 'gyur/ /sems can dbul
404b6(mdo sde): po rnams mthong na/ /de ni nor gyis sdud par byed/ /de ni nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /de ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /blo gros chen pos sa 'di kun/ /yongs su btang ba byas nas
404b7(mdo sde): kyang / /dman pa'i sems su mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni nam yang phongs mi 'gyur/ /gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa/ /de dag bu dang bu mo dang / /chung ma dge zhing bzang mo dag /
405a1(mdo sde): btang nas mya ngan byed mi 'gyur/ /de ni sngon du 'gro 'gyur zhing / /bkri ba med la mthong na dga'/ /phrag dog dang ni nga rgyal gyis/ /nam yang de
405a2(mdo sde): la gnod mi 'gyur/ /gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /de dag phrag dog med cing des/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /phan pa 'dod cing yon tan ldan/ /gang dag
405a3(mdo sde): byang chub mngon zhugs pa/ /'jig rten kun na de rin chen/ /de dag 'byung ba shin tu dkon/ /dmad pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur/ /sa 'di dag ni rim gyis su/ /bgrang
405a4(mdo sde): bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'/ /tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /dus gsum sems ni shes par
405a5(mdo sde): nus/ /de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'/ /tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag /skra ni bye ba stong gshags pa'i/ /skra yis zad par bya bar nus//
405a6(mdo sde): de dag yon tan zad mi nus/ /sa rnams thams cad phyer brlags pa/ /rab tu phra rdul shes par nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus/ /chu
405a7(mdo sde): klung thams cad rab 'bab pa/ /rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro yang srid/ /sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi /yon tan mtha' brjod de lta min/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /
405b1(mdo sde): sngon gyis lus rnams ji snyed pa/ /bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/ /sngon gyis lus rnams thams cad la/ /spu phreng ji snyed yod pa rnams/
405b2(mdo sde): bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba lnga por 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi spu rnams ni/ /bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag
405b3(mdo sde): yon tan zad mi 'gyur/ /sa 'di ji snyed thams cad pa/ /chu yi phung por gnas gyur kyang / /de ni bgrang zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag yon tan brjod mi nus/ /mar me mdzad
405b4(mdo sde): nas bzung nas ni/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa ji snyed pa/ /de yi bar du shing ljon rnams/ /ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams/ /de dag zad par shes
405b5(mdo sde): par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/ /brtson pa zhig gis de dag gis/ /sngags phreng yid du 'ong brjod kyang / /sangs rgyas sras
405b6(mdo sde): po de dag gi / yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po de dag la/ /mi gang mi dga' byed pa de/ /lha dang mi ni spangs nas su/ /de dag dmyal ba spyod yul 'gyur//
405b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /mi gang la la gnod byed pa/ /mig med pa'am long ba dang / /sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med
406a1(mdo sde): 'gro / de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs skrag 'gyur/ /lus ni chen por gyur nas kyang / /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs de dag de dag tu/ /de
406a2(mdo sde): lus dpag tshad tsam 'gyur te/ /de dag phrum ltar zlum gyur la/ /kun nas yongs su bza' bar 'gyur/ /de tshe lus la mgo bo ni/ /lnga stong yod par 'byung 'gyur zhing / /
406a3(mdo sde): mgo bo de dag re re la'ang / /lce ni lnga brgya tham pa yod/ /gcig la'ang thong gshol brgya dag gis/ /lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /mi
406a4(mdo sde): bzad chen por gshags par 'gyur/ /mnar med de nas shi 'phos nas/ /de ni tsha dang rab tsha bar/ /blo gros ngan pa tshor ba myong / /de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin/ /byang
406a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa/ /de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /dmyal ba'i sa ni dkon ma yin/ /tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams
406a6(mdo sde): dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrang bar/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing / /de ni bzang po nam mi mthong / /sangs rgyas sras po skyobs rnams la/ /gnod pa dag ni
406a7(mdo sde): byas gyur na/ /a la gar rta 'jigs pa yi/ /shin tu gdug pa'i sprul du skye/ /de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen/ /sdig pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /de ni zas kyang
406b1(mdo sde): ji rnyed de/ /nam yang 'grangs par za mi myong / /shi 'phos gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/ /de ni rtag par gtun du brdung / /dge slong dag la gnod byas pas/ /nam yang skabs
406b2(mdo sde): ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de nas shi 'phos dus byas te/ /mi yi lus ni thob gyur na/ /blo ngan de ni dmus long 'gyur/ /gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa med/ /de ni nyes par smras byas
406b3(mdo sde): te| |'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas/ /mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /ngan song dag tu myur du 'gro /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /ma bsdams gang zhig gnod
406b4(mdo sde): byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/ /nam yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams la/ /gang zhig chos bzhin srung byed pa/ /des ni ngan 'gro kun
406b5(mdo sde): spangs te/ /myur du bzang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang / /stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med/ /dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan/ /bde zhing ngo tsha khrel
406b6(mdo sde): las ldan/ /gang du 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni/ /yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
406b7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa yi/ /'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni/ /su zhig phyi phyir dad mi byed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas stong rnams dang / /brgya dang
407a1(mdo sde): bye ba bgrangs dag la/ /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de snyed bskal par bkur ba bas/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi/ /dam chos 'jig
407a2(mdo sde): tshe gang zhig gis/ /nyin dang mtshan du 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /
407a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa/ /nga la des ni mchod pa byed/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/ /ston pa'i bstan pa srung byed la/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /
407a4(mdo sde): de ni nam yang rgud mi 'gyur/ /lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing / /de ni nad kyis btab mi 'gyur/ /de ni yid du mi 'ong bas/ /nam yang 'phrogs bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ston
407a5(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa bsrung byas na/ /bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / /des dang gsal dang mnyen pa dang / /sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur/ /'jig tshe rgyal
407a6(mdo sde): ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /bde dang dga' 'thob mdzod ni mang bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi rim gro bya ba 'thob 'gyur zhing / /mi khom pa rgyad po ma lus zad par spong / /'jig
407a7(mdo sde): tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /dper na nam mkha' skar mas yongs gang ltar/ /rtag tu mtshan gyis go char byas pa dang / /rab tu tshig snyan yid 'ong dbyangs ldan/
407b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /gang na yid bde med cing rab sdug pa/ /rigs dman de ni de yis spang bar 'gyur/ /phyug cing shin tu bde la longs spyod
407b2(mdo sde): ldan/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung ba/ /mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan/ /mi dman pa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen
407b3(mdo sde): bkur byed/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs ldan shes rab ldan/ /mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur/ /rgyal po mkhas
407b4(mdo sde): pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /mchog tu gzugs mdzes blta na sdug pa dang / /skyes pa bud med lha rnams dga' ba
407b5(mdo sde): dang / /bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan/ /ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba lha yi lhas/ /gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad pa/ /mi de lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra
407b6(mdo sde): 'di/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed pa/ /ras 'di rtsig ngos 'dri 'am gser las byas/ /de yi chos kyi khyad par gang yin
407b7(mdo sde): pa/ /de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyi nyon/ /de ni blta min long bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /sgur por mi 'gyur yan lag mi sdug min/ /de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha dog ldan//
408a1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/ /lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob/ /spobs pa 'thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong / /shes
408a2(mdo sde): bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /de mthong sems can bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan/ /g.yo med mi rku rgyal po 'khrug
408a3(mdo sde): mi byed/ /mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grag par 'gyur/ /byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan/ /'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/ /de ni mchog
408a4(mdo sde): 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os/ /blo ldan phyug cing de nyid rgya cher ldan/ /dbang ldan 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/ /
408a5(mdo sde): lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa/ /lhun po'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur/ /bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid ston/ /de ni dran dang blo gros mi ldan min/ /de
408a6(mdo sde): ni rtogs mos shes rab tshangs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te/ /'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs/ /sems can snying po mtshungs
408a7(mdo sde): med mchod byas na/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/ /ngan 'gro gsum po ngas ni rnam spangs te/ /bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur/ /'dren pa'i
408b1(mdo sde): sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/ /dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te/ /mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan la dad par 'gyur//
408b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos ngad can/ /dzam+bu'i klung gser 'od byed dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /gzhal med khang mchog blta sdug
408b3(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ /de ni ded dpon stobs bcu ldan pa po/ /sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra med pa thob/ /kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal/ /gser stong rin chen bai
408b4(mdo sde): DUR+ya dang mtshungs/ /su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog blangs/ /dad skyes 'jig rten mgon la char du gtor/ /de ni mi yi 'jig rten bsod nams ldan/ /rgyal srid gnas nas
408b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/ /mya ngan bskams shing tha ba drir ldan lus/ /yan lag legs gnas mtshungs med thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo mang pos blta ba'i 'os yin te/ /dmyal
408b6(mdo sde): ba dgra rtsa 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur/ /spyad pa rnam par spyad tshe 'dod pa la/ /ngan skyugs khung ltar smad par shes par 'gyur/ /tshangs spyod dge ba khyad par 'phags la spyod/ /dga'
408b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod par 'gyur/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang du de kha nas/ /rab mdzes ut+pal bsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / /
409a1(mdo sde): tsan+dan lta bur dri zhim ngad kyang 'byung / /spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe khro ba dang / /tha ba dri skyon gti mug gnod mi byed/ /dman pa med pa'i sems
409a2(mdo sde): kyis dbugs phyin rnyed/ /bag yod lha yi nang na rgyal po 'thob/ /gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na/ /de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin/ /mi dman dga' ba'i sems
409a3(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa sbyin/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe/ /rab tu dga' bas ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin/ /des ni
409a4(mdo sde): chos mchog mdzes pa de spyad pas/ /gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhar mi 'gyur/ /gal te sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing / /nyon mongs med pa gser
409a5(mdo sde): mdog stobs bcur gyur/ /de dag bskal bye khrag khrig brgya stong du/ /rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus/ /'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las spangs
409a6(mdo sde): te| |dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gi las byas shing / /rlabs chen spyod tshe don ni legs byas nas/ /'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gang gis
409a7(mdo sde): spos chu yungs 'bru tsam blangs te/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bdug byed pa/ /de yi phan yon brjod kyi sems dang zhing / /rdul dang dri ma spongs la mnyan
409b1(mdo sde): par gyis/ /de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgyu/ /nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yod la/ /spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul/ /skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong /
409b2(mdo sde): rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/ /mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los bsgyur 'gyur te/ /gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi go cha can/ /'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri
409b3(mdo sde): ldan 'thob/ /de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med/ /spyad pa spyod tshe longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/ /phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang / /mya ngan med gyur 'jig rten kun
409b4(mdo sde): tu rgyu/ /skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags chos/ /tshig rab brjod cing the tshom sel bar byed/ /chos thos yid bde slar yang smra bar
409b5(mdo sde): byed/ /sdig pa'i las med blo rgya che dang ldan/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phags pa/ /dga' bar 'gyur la rtag tu mkhas byas te/ /mig kyang spyod cing mun pa
409b6(mdo sde): sel bar byed/ /'dod chags mi che zhe sdang che ma yin/ /mi yi 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin/ /de ni tshangs spyod dag pa mchog 'di spyod/ /mi yi don ni dpag tu med pa byed/ /
409b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spos bdug na/ /de la gnod par sems pa su yang med/ /de ni nam yang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/ /blta bar 'os shing nor chen ldan par
410a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnams su/ /sems ni rnam dag sdig pa rnam dag cing / /zhi zhing rab zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas/ /mi dman
410a2(mdo sde): sems kyis byang chub mtshungs med 'thob/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/ /mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing / /'khor lo mtshungs med 'jig
410a3(mdo sde): rten kun bskor nas/ /phyi nas nyon mongs rdul med mya ngan 'das/ /su zhig dga' mgu sems kyi gos kyis ni/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byas pa/ /
410a4(mdo sde): de ni gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig brgya grangs mtha' yas rtag tu rnyed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/ /de ni btsas ma thag tu gos
410a5(mdo sde): mchog 'thob/ /lha yi khyad 'phags dar gos rab bzang rnyed/ /btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde/ /gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang / /'dren pa mtshungs
410a6(mdo sde): med rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus 'thob ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas/ /bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyi dkris byas
410a7(mdo sde): na| |lag mthil nas ni mu tig phreng mdzes pa/ /sna tshogs dag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang / /gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung / /bcom ldan mchod
410b1(mdo sde): rten gos kyis dkris byas na/ /lha 'am klu'am mi 'am lto 'phye che/ /su yang de la ma dad skyed mi byed/ /rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyod/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
410b2(mdo sde): gos kyis dkris byas na/ /stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te/ /dzam klung gser gyis gser ni zil mnan bzhin/ /skye dgu don ni dpag tu med pa byed/ /gal te
410b3(mdo sde): rin chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis/ /stong gi zhing kun rab tu bkang ba yi/ /de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i min/ /
410b4(mdo sde): nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od rnams kyis/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ba/ /de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i min/ /'jig
410b5(mdo sde): rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/ /de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur/ /byang chub mchog spyod dam pa zhi ba spyod/ /
410b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/ /dag cing mchog gi lus ni 'thob 'gyur te/ /dper na gser ltar shin tu dgar 'gyur zhing / /lha yis bsngags la mchod cing
410b7(mdo sde): bla mar byed/ /de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /ras kyi gos dang la ba bzang rab dang / /du gu la dang ko shi ka rnams dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur/ /
411a1(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling na rigs mchog dam pa gang / /phyug cing che nyid bdag dbang nor mang ba/ /de dag tu ni rtag tu de skye ste/ /dman zhing mchog tu dbul ba rnam
411a2(mdo sde): par spangs/ /de la sems can su yang phrag dog med/ /sems can gnod par sems pa gzhar mi 'byung / /gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de smod de/ /rtag tu bag yod tshul
411a3(mdo sde): khrims rnam dag 'gyur/ /'dzin pa med cing ser sna med par 'ongs/ /gtong ba rab btang mya ngan med pa 'thob/ /de ni srog phyir gzhan la sbyin mi byed/ /phongs pa med byed rtag
411a4(mdo sde): tu bag yod 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon mthong nas ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyi gdugs dang ba dan dang / /mar me rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ /
411a5(mdo sde): byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni rtag par spyod/ /mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen bkur byed/ /lha nang lha yi dag dang mi yi gtso/ /yid 'ong spos mdzes blta na sdug pa dang / /nor
411a6(mdo sde): bu shel 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa 'thob/ /ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal/ /lha kun slob mar gyur nas mngon du 'dud/ /chos kyis de dag yid bde skyed par byed/ /de la dad
411a7(mdo sde): mchog gzha' gsang thob par 'gyur/ /de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rgyal po dam pa stobs ldan 'khor los bsgyur/ /de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed/ /skye bo
411b1(mdo sde): mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong 'gyur/ /rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul/ /ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur/ /shes rab mtha' yas mdzod ni mang ldan
411b2(mdo sde): 'ong / /sems chud mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur/ /longs spyod rnyed nas bgod cing bdag kyang spyod/ /de ni 'jig med yid mi bde ba med/ /rgyal po dga' nas grong
411b3(mdo sde): dang yul 'khor bgod/ /de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed/ /gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzad mang zhing / /khyim bdag rin chen sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur/ /rgyal
411b4(mdo sde): po'i bu'am de bzhin blon por 'ong / /rgyal por gyur na stobs ldan rdzi ba med/ /brnyas pa'i rigs dma' thams cad yongs su spong / /longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog
411b5(mdo sde): rnyed nas ni/ /rtag tu bag yod sems ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams ni ngan skyugs khung ltar spong / /khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams rab tu 'thob/ /khyad 'phags
411b6(mdo sde): rigs dang de bzhin dbang phyug nyid/ /de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyed 'gyur/ /skye bo mang pos mdun du bdar bar 'ong / /de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed/ /
411b7(mdo sde): sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan/ /de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/ /skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur/ /rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod/ /shes
412a1(mdo sde): bzhin ldan nas yid bde skyed par byed/ /'dzin pa med cing chags med sems dang ldan/ /chags med gyur nas de la mi mthun med/ /de
412a2(mdo sde): yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med/ /rnam dag sems ldan de ni bden par smra/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yid bde skyed/ /sems can rnams kyi skyabs
412a3(mdo sde): dang dpung gnyen 'gyur/ /de ni bdag don rgya chen byas nas su/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god/ /shing dbang shing mchog dam pa'i drung song nas//
412a4(mdo sde): mtshungs med mchog zhi byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na/ /'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /sangs rgyas zhing na 'dzam klung
412a5(mdo sde): gser gyis gang / /de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/ /bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na/ /de yi lus ni mdog ngan yongs mi 'gyur/ /gzugs mchog sra
412a6(mdo sde): zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra/ /snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ /gal te rgyal ba dam pa byung gyur na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur/ /nye dur 'gyur ram/
412a7(mdo sde): yang na bur yang 'gyur/ /de ni ye shes phung po myur du 'thob/ /gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing / /yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang 'gyur ba/ /bgrang ba dang ni
412b1(mdo sde): gzhal zhing brjod par nus/ /bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min/ /sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs med sbyin pa'i gnas/ /spyod pa mchog spyod khyad par brnyas gyur pa/ /mi
412b2(mdo sde): mchog de la mchod pa 'dir byas pa/ /rnam par smin pa dam pa gzhal yas 'gyur/ /gal te mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun/ /nor bu rin chen bai DUR+yas gang ba/ /zad
412b3(mdo sde): par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /ka ra Sha pa Na sa mi mjed 'jig rten khams/ /'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gang ba/ /
412b4(mdo sde): zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan+dan gyis/ /'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang ba/ /zad
412b5(mdo sde): par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ris kyi/ /gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur ba/ /zad
412b6(mdo sde): par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /klu dang lha min mi dang lto 'phye che/ /lha yi lha rdzas nor bu rin chen mang / /zad par bya nus sangs
412b7(mdo sde): rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yi spos/ /de dag mi mjed 'di kun gang gyur pa/ /zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten
413a1(mdo sde): la| |mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tshad ni shes par nus/ /nam mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes par
413a2(mdo sde): nus/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul ba'i/ /de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/ /sangs rgyas dam pa mi mchog bzhud pa'i tshe/ /'dren pa mtshungs pa med la
413a3(mdo sde): dad byas te/ /ston pa'i sku la nyi zer mi 'bab par/ /me tog ma li ka gdugs bcom ldan phul/ /de ni las mdzes dam pa gus byas pas/ /lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan
413a4(mdo sde): 'bum gyur/ /'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan gyur/ /stong
413a5(mdo sde): phrag bcu la dbang bar nga gyur te/ /nor chen rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur/ /khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur/ /bde gshegs mi mchog bye ba nyi shu
413a6(mdo sde): dag / ngas ni mnyes byas gzims cha na bza' yis/ /mi mchog dag la bla mar bsti stang byas/ /de dag gtsug lag khang la spos kyis bskus/ /nga yi kha dog ngan pa
413a7(mdo sde): kun med gyur/ /ngas ni tsha dang grang dang ngal ba spangs/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar dman med sems gyur cing / /de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod/ /rgyan gyis brgyan
413b1(mdo sde): ba'i gdugs mdzes blta sdug pa/ /su zhig bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa/ /de 'dir lus ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char
413b2(mdo sde): 'gyur| / gang gis rgyal ba'i sku ni rab 'bar zhing / /khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang sems 'dra dang / /'dzam klung gser ltar rab mdzes blta na sdug /mtshan gyi me
413b3(mdo sde): tog rgyas pas mngon du gang / /mngon par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags/ /byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod/ /de ni nam yang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur/ /
413b4(mdo sde): lhas kyang bsti stang bya zhing mchod par 'ong / /brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dka'/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod/ /yi dam bcas nas nags
413b5(mdo sde): dang nags 'dab song / /mngon shes 'thob cing khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba/ /ji lta bu yang byang chub sems mi 'dor/ /byams
413b6(mdo sde): la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyur/ /de yi shes pa rnams kyang nyams pa med/ /rol mo'i sgra yis mi mchog mchod byas na/ /mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong / /mi
413b7(mdo sde): yi 'jig rten yid 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur/ /de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par 'ong / /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /rna ba
414a1(mdo sde): rnam par dag cing sems kyang dga'/ /sna yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi lce ni rab mdzes blta na sdug /thog mar rab mnyen mdzes
414a2(mdo sde): shing sgra yid 'ong / /dper na lha yi rin chen byu ru 'dra/ /sgra skad yan lag bye ba dpag med 'byin/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /nam yang sbrul du mi 'gyur lce
414a3(mdo sde): med min/ /zhar ba sgur po ya yo can mi 'gyur/ /lus ni khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /lha'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye
414a4(mdo sde): che| |su yang de la ma dad skyed mi 'gyur/ /dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /de ni ma ning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /nam
414a5(mdo sde): yang mdze dang sha bkra mi 'byung zhing / /bsngags par 'os pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /lce ring 'gyur zhing lus kyang che bar
414a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gser gyi gzugs ltar kha dog 'bar ba 'ong / /ting 'dzin brtan zhing shin tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /lha nang bdag por
414a7(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing dbang phyug 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes na dga' bar 'ong / /brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na//
414b1(mdo sde): de la su yang yid mi bde mi skyed/ /de la su yang tshig rtsub smra ba med/ /phra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag smra/ /bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs te/ /bcom ldan mchod
414b2(mdo sde): rten gus par 'phyag byed pa/ /de ni smad cing mi gtsang lus mi 'gyur/ /ba spu khung nas tsan+dan dri ngad 'byung / /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag
414b3(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong du/ /yan lag ma smad khyad 'phags lus 'thob cing / /mdzes la mtshan gyis go char byas par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /lha yi tsan+dan
414b4(mdo sde): khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i/ /gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob/ /de ni de la gzhar yang sred mi skyed/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /yid 'ong
414b5(mdo sde): dri ldan mchog tu blta sdug pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing / /de ni de la nam yang chags mi skyed/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /skyed mos tshal
414b6(mdo sde): mchog yod pa'i rdzing bu ni/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chu gtsang mdzes gyur pa/ /me tog ut+pal las ni rgyas pa 'thob/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /de yi
414b7(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor rtag tu mthun 'gyur zhing / /mi dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos/ /lha mo rnams kyi glu dbyangs snyan sgra thos/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags//
415a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu skyes tshe bdag nyid kyis/ /'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / /mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar shes/ /bcom
415a2(mdo sde): ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /de ni lha la snyan pa'i gtam byas te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkod nas/ /shi ba'i dus byas dzam+bu'i gling du skye/ /
415a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /btsas ma thag tu bskal pa mtha' yas dran/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur ba dang / /de dag mtshan dang
415a4(mdo sde): yon tan chos kyang dran/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te/ /mos pa skyes nas mchod rten rtswa skyes sel/ /de yi phan yon de dag ngas bshad kyi/ /tha ba dri sol
415a5(mdo sde): dang ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /mthu chen skyes bu dam pa khyad 'phags pa/ /rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs dus na mthong / /de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod/ /de ni gzhar
415a6(mdo sde): yang dad pa dam pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon des mthong nas/ /'dren pa mtshungs pa med la mchod pa byas/ /mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas
415a7(mdo sde): su| |'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag lan yang ston/ /grong khyer yangs pa nyams dga' mchog gnas shing / /nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de dag phyi dus rab tu
415b1(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal mchog mya ngan 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur/ /mchod rten rtswa skyes sel bar byed ba ni/ /rgyal ba dam pa mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i/ /rgyu dang sa bon 'gyur ba 'di yin no/ /
415b2(mdo sde): 'dod dang dmyal dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas spong / /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mdo mchog 'di/ /phyi ma rab 'jig dus na 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha yi lha//
415b3(mdo sde): bsod nams khyad 'phags mtshungs med zhing du 'gyur/ /'di bshad tshe na gang dag 'dir mchod dang / /tshul 'di bshad pa gang dag thos pa dang / /gang dag mdo mchog 'di ni
415b4(mdo sde): 'dir bzung ba/ /de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dir 'di 'dzin/ /gang dag phyin chad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa/ /de dag rtag tu nga dang mthun pa'i sras/ /sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags
415b5(mdo sde): brjod kyang / /de dag bsngags pa mthar ni phyin mi 'gyur/ /gang dag phyi dus rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/ /bskal pa bye bar bzhugs
415b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gi / bsngags pa brjod kyang mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur/ /dri zhim yid 'ong spos kyi cho ga bzhin/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni su bskus pa/ /de ni thob rnyed 'jig rten kun
415b7(mdo sde): tu rgyu/ /de ni sa 'dir snying po blangs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tsha/ /dzam+bu'i gling du skye bar mi
416a1(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / /de ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnams/ /
416a2(mdo sde): rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas/ /de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'dir spyod/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris
416a3(mdo sde): lha dbang 'gyur/ /ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog /lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /gang gi tshe na mi yi 'jig
416a4(mdo sde): rten na/ /zhe sdang med sems 'jam zhing mnyen gyur ba/ /de'i tshe de na dzam+bu'i gling du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /khyad 'phags tshigs ldan sgra
416a5(mdo sde): dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur/ /de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /de ni ngan
416a6(mdo sde): song sa rnams ma lus spong / /de bzhin gshegs dang nye ba thob par 'gyur/ /dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /rgyal po
416a7(mdo sde): stobs ldan 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod nams ldan/ /chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis
416b1(mdo sde): mgu ba'i shugs bskyed de/ /bcom ldan 'das mchod rten nor bu'i dra ba 'bul/ /de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha can/ /mthu che bla ma 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /blta 'os mtshan gyi
416b2(mdo sde): go cha ldan gyur nas/ /gzhal med khang chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa/ /kha dog sna tshogs dpag med ldan pa dang / /rin chen khang bzang che 'os dag pa 'thob/ /rgyal po pho brang
416b3(mdo sde): khyad par 'phags gyur pa/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis gang ba dang / /mnyam zhing legs byas rab mdzes blta sdug pa/ /dra ba sna tshogs bde byed bde 'jug 'thob/ /rgyal mtshan
416b4(mdo sde): ba dan gsal bar mdzes byas shing / /gdugs bres shin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang / /mu tig dra ba phreng ba de 'dra ba'i/ /rgyal srid yon tan khyad 'phags gzhan yang 'thob/ /de
416b5(mdo sde): yi yul na gzhan nor 'jig byed pa/ /chom rkun g.yo ldan g.yon can gnas mi 'gyur/ /sems can rgya chen blo mchog ldan pa dang / /phan byed byams sems ldan pa de na gnas/
416b6(mdo sde): shi 'phos bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste/ /dkar gnag gang yin bdag cag ji ltar gnas/ /'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar mir skye zhes/ /blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur/ /sangs
416b7(mdo sde): rgyas sbyin gnas myur du mthong 'gyur te/ /mthong nas mchod cing mtshungs med bsti stang byed/ /sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub mos skyed cing / /rdul bral rnams la phyir zhing
417a1(mdo sde): bsti stang byed/ /ye shes mtha' yas ldan dang mthu chen 'gyur/ /khyad par sa gnas 'phags pa'i sems can 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das la
417a2(mdo sde): dad pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /'di 'dra'i dpal 'di phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur/ /nga yi bya ba 'di ni brjod par bya/ /ngas brjod 'di la the tshom ma skyed cig /sangs rgyas bka'
417a3(mdo sde): spangs mnar med 'gror 'gyur zhing / /phyin chad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re/ /'jig rten sgron ma mtshungs med bsod nams zhing / /de yi mchod rten ba rgya su sel
417a4(mdo sde): ba| |bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud rgya 'dral/ /dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong / /rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral bsti stang byed/ /rtag tu stobs ldan 'khor los
417a5(mdo sde): bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes nas bsod nams ldan/ /rgyal po kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /lha nang lha yi dbang po mchod gnas 'gyur/ /
417a6(mdo sde): der ni myur du lha yi tshe yang 'thob/ /dpal ldan gser gyi gzhal med khang pa rnyed/ /lha yi bde ba mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro mchog dang //
417a7(mdo sde): reg bya dpal ldan lha yi 'jig rten 'thob/ /mthu chen ldan zhing blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ /lha mo rnams la 'dod pa'i sred mi skyed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal
417b1(mdo sde): byas na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten 'gro /yan lag legs gnas khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /nam yang bstan bcos mi nyung mang po 'thob/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
417b2(mdo sde): ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing / /de ni dal 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'phags/ /de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs med mchod pa byed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
417b3(mdo sde): ba rgya bsal byas na/ /bag yod blo gros brtan la dpa' bor 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skyed/ /mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom
417b4(mdo sde): ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de ni nam yang byang chub sems mi 'dor/ /tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur/ /rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos
417b5(mdo sde): kyang 'thob/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de yi mdog ngan lus rnams kun tu spong / /'chal pa'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong / /shes rab rgya chen gyur
417b6(mdo sde): nas spyod la gnas/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur la/ /khyad 'phags kha dog ldan zhing blta sdug la/ /reg dang ldan zhing
417b7(mdo sde): rab mdzes gos rnams 'thob/ /dad pa'i shugs skyes bcom ldan mchod rten la/ /me tog skam po nyal nyil phyags byas na/ /'dod pa smad pa sdug bsngal byed pa spong / /stobs
418a1(mdo sde): bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par byed/ /mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/ /de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur/ /skye bo mang
418a2(mdo sde): pos mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur/ /de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis/ /me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas
418a3(mdo sde): na| |ngan song sa yi lam ngan thams cad gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /bag yod mya ngan
418a4(mdo sde): rnams dang skyon rnams spong / /nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong / /bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag
418a5(mdo sde): pa| |sbyin gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong / /mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur/ /rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur/ /
418a6(mdo sde): lha yi me tog rab mdzes man+dA ra/ /mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul dang / /mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa/ /de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur/ /
418a7(mdo sde): mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /de lus dug gis mi tshugs mtshon mi tshugs/ /me 'bar 'od 'phro phung po ches mi tshugs/ /nor gyi phung po rkun pos
418b1(mdo sde): brku mi 'gyur/ /mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i shugs bskyed de/ /bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam 'phyag na/ /de yi bsod nams bzung bar gang gyur pa/ /grangs sam cha
418b2(mdo sde): yang brjod par sla ma yin/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten na ni rtag tu dga'/ /mthu dang ldan zhing
418b3(mdo sde): yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung / /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /chos mchog rab mdzes yang dag sbyong byed cing / /de lus rnam par dag la chen por 'ong / /ring por mi
418b4(mdo sde): thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byas mos bskyed de/ /ston pa'i mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /'jig rten dag na bla mar
418b5(mdo sde): bkur stir bya/ /de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /de 'dir rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi/ /lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud/ /stong gi 'jig rten khams
418b6(mdo sde): kun rgyas par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug nyid du dbang thob rgyal srid ston/ /de yi yul na sems can gang gnas pa/ /de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god/ /de ni
418b7(mdo sde): ngan song sa yang rnam par spong / /de dag rnams kyi don mchog dam pa byed/ /bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mchod 'os 'gyur/ /dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun
419a1(mdo sde): tu rgyu/ /de yi g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan/ /bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dga' ba skyed/ /sems can rnams la mi lhong zhi tshig ston//
419a2(mdo sde): de la su yang dbang phyug med mi byed/ /skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur/ /de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs yan lag dag /sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag
419a3(mdo sde): 'tshal ba/ /sbyin dang snyan par smra dang don spyod dang / /don mthun pa dag skye bo mang la byed/ /spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi skyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar
419a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba/ /mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur/ /mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal por 'ong / /de ni gzhar yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
419a5(mdo sde): mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /de ni gzhar yang ngan song phyis mi ltung / /'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong / /nor can nang na phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur/ /
419a6(mdo sde): yon tan ldan la tshig gcig su smra ba/ /de ni mi rigs sngags la gzhar mi spyod/ /mi yi 'jig rten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur/ /de la sems can mi
419a7(mdo sde): ngoms dga' bar 'gyur/ /yid 'ong dbyangs ldan pho brang 'khor gshegs shing / /'jig rten mgon po sgo gtan bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /su zhig shugs
419b1(mdo sde): bskyed me tog blangs te gtor/ /de ni brgyan nas rgyal ba dam pa mthong / /rang gis khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed/ /de yis bshos gsol chos bzang ston pa
419b2(mdo sde): mdzad/ /dad pa skyes nas mi mchog bsnyen bkur byed/ /gos kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren la 'bul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med mchog thob nas/ /stobs
419b3(mdo sde): bcu ldan zhing g.yo ba med gyur la/ /byang chub sangs rgyas sdug bsngal skye bo 'gro la/ /'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med sangs rgyas shog /de yi smon lam 'di 'dra
419b4(mdo sde): 'di dang ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyen nas/ /stobs bcu 'dzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du/ /mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to/ /skyes
419b5(mdo sde): bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas/ /bde gshegs mchog gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ /bdag ni rgyal ba mchog 'gyur dogs med ces/ /dga' zhing mgu nas
419b6(mdo sde): bar snang kun tu rgyu/ /'jig rten lha yi lhar gyur sangs rgyas su/ /khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas 'gyur ba dang / /de sems spyod dang 'gal bar gnas mkhyen
419b7(mdo sde): nas/ /de la stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchog gis gos ni bzhes rig nas/ /de ni shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste/ /mtshungs med
420a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon la bltas nas ni/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa bskyed/ /skye shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya/ /grol
420a2(mdo sde): nas skye bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol/ /'jig rten kun na long ba'i mig bdag gyur/ /snang ba thob nas mun pa rab rib bsal/ /de ltas phan yon dam pa 'di thos nas/ /me
420a3(mdo sde): tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang / /rol mo sgra dang gdugs dang byug bdug gis/ /mgon po mchod la sangs rgyas 'gyur bar gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
420a4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / blo gros rnam par dag pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
420a5(mdo sde): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
420a6(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang
420a7(mdo sde): bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya many+dzu shrI bi ha ra na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes
420b1(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab
420b2(mdo sde): na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas
420b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas 'jam
420b4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'chag cing dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin
420b5(mdo sde): nas| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas bsam gtan byed par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gnas
420b6(mdo sde): brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod bsam gtan byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa shA
420b7(mdo sde): ri'i bu/ khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'das pa
421a1(mdo sde): la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba la gnas te bsam gtan
421a2(mdo sde): byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas te
421a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod mig la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas te bsam gtan
421a4(mdo sde): byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/
421a5(mdo sde): ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan
421a6(mdo sde): byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi rol la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi nang la gnas te bsam gtan
421a7(mdo sde): byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod lus la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sems la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
421b1(mdo sde): 'di ltar tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba dang / brjed pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
421b2(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu/ chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'am/ brjed pa med pa'i chos de dag dmigs sam/ shA ri'i bus
421b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing
421b4(mdo sde): mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag brten cing gnas so//
421b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang
421b6(mdo sde): la rten cing gnas/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la dge slong ni 'das pa la rten cing gnas so/ /ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so/ /da ltar byung ba la rten cing
421b7(mdo sde): gnas so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas par khong du chud par bya ste/ 'jam dpal/ chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben
422a1(mdo sde): par gsungs pa yin te/ bdag chos de dag la rten cing gnas so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir/ 'di skad ces/
422a2(mdo sde): 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing rab tu dben pa la gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar la rten cing rab tu
422a3(mdo sde): dben pa la gnas shing smra/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang yod pa ma yin/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang yod pa ma yin/
422a4(mdo sde): gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de'ang yod ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dag ni yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar/ gnas brten shA ri'i bu/ de 'di skad ces/ 'das pa la rten cing gnas
422a5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas zhes smra/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa med do/ /yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid
422a6(mdo sde): dang | ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni tsa'ang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi 'ang ma yin/ gang la'ang mi gnas te/ gang mi
422a7(mdo sde): gnas pa de'i gnas dmigs su med do/ /yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas
422b1(mdo sde): nas smra ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'o/ /de ci phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa rlom sems med pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni nyams
422b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'o/ /yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang dmigs su med/ gang
422b3(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang dmigs su med/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de'ang dmigs su med pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi rang bzhin nyid de'ang
422b4(mdo sde): dmigs su med do/ /'on kyang / btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang bstan pa'am/ rab tu bshad par nus pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i
422b5(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid yod pa
422b6(mdo sde): ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ chos kyang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la
422b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te chos ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yin te
423a1(mdo sde): dmigs su med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/ /de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa'am/ mi
423a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa'am mi brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar de
423a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa yang dag par chad pa/ btags pa med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu
423a4(mdo sde): 'di'i snod du 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par
423a5(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur ba de ni chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /gang 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing 'das pa'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang
423a6(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos
423a7(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi mthong zhing de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu
423b1(mdo sde): 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /gang bdag dang / bdag med par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang len pa dang / 'dor bar yang spyod par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu
423b2(mdo sde): 'di'i snod du 'gyur te/ de ni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis
423b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bshad pa 'di'i don shes par 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur zhes de skad 'dri/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
423b4(mdo sde): dpal/ chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung / 'di ni yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dgra bcom pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob
423b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang phyogs 'di la sgyid lug par 'gyur na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ dgra bcom pa rnams
423b6(mdo sde): la ni sa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'ang med na sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu phye
423b7(mdo sde): pa'o| |dgra bcom pa dag ni dmigs su med pas rab tu phye ba'o/ /dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na /
424a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa yang dag par chad pa ste btags pa med pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dang
424a2(mdo sde): bral ba/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba/ 'jug pa med pa/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ dgra bcom pa dag ni 'dus ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na ci
424a3(mdo sde): zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang / gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ming dang / gzugs la rnam par
424a4(mdo sde): rtog go/ ming dang / gzugs de'ang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang / gzugs kyis
424a5(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ byis pa'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so/ /nam mi
424a6(mdo sde): dmigs pa de'i tshe na mi rtog go / kun tu mi spyod do/ /de spyod pa med/ spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste/ yod do zhes khas mi len/ med do zhes khas mi len/ yod
424a7(mdo sde): kyang yod la med kyang med do zhes khas mi len/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to/ /nam khas mi len pa de na dmigs
424b1(mdo sde): pa med do/ /de dmigs pa thams cad dang bral bas sems med cing sems dang bral te gnas med pa'i tshul gyis dge sbyong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'jam
424b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan las langs nas/ 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi blta'o/ /'jam
424b3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de'ang spang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam
424b4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas chos ma yin pa smra'o zhes
424b5(mdo sde): brjod nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa spyad snyam nas dong
424b6(mdo sde): ngo| |de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyis chos kun shes
424b7(mdo sde): par gyur par bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag stan
425a1(mdo sde): las langs nas 'phya smod/ mi snyan par zer zhing dong ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po de
425a2(mdo sde): dag 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi blta'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i
425a3(mdo sde): phyogs de'ang spang bar bya'o zhes zer ba de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
425a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/ /gang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pa de la blta ba dang / mnyan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal

425b1(mdo sde): bdag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar mi shes so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis

425b3(mdo sde): gyis gnas pa nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de dbyings ma yin no/ /de ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med cing g.yo ba med la 'chi 'pho med do/ /gang g.yo ba med
425b4(mdo sde): cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /gang kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med pa

425b7(mdo sde): du lhung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i chos mi ston
426a1(mdo sde): pas dge slong brgya po de dag chud zos te ngo mtshar byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
426a2(mdo sde): to| |shA ri'i bu/ khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ dge slong brgya po de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod du reg pa thang cig reg nas dga'
426a3(mdo sde): ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skya bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal te dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na de dag gdon mi za bar
426a4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba
426a5(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de'ang cung zad cig myong bar byas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i phyir dge slong brgya po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par
426a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas thos na ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms
426a7(mdo sde): par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad med pa bzhis ni de lta ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms pas ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
426b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ma thos pas 'khor ba las yongs su ma grol/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na dang / 'che ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /

426b4(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ni 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyang 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba 'ang ma yin no/ /sems can gyi khams kyang 'bri ba ma yin/

426b6(mdo sde): pas ci'ang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi'ang ma yin/ gang la'ang mi gnas te gnas pa med do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'di lta bu'i mi 'gag pa de
426b7(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo/ /byang chub gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o/ /thar pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni mi byed cing 'gyur ba med do/ /gang mi byed
427a1(mdo sde): cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'

427a4(mdo sde): no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci'ang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi yang ma yin/

427a7(mdo sde): nyid 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med la rtog pa med/ /rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid min/ /'dus ma byas la gang rtog dang / /mya ngan 'das la gang rtog pa/ /gnyis ga
427b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi las yin zhes/ /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/ /phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams/ /de dag ming gis brjod pa ste/ /ming dang skye med gang yin pa/ /de gnyis
427b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig pa yin/ /tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa/ /de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no/ /mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste/ /stong pa ji bzhin spyod yul lo/ /gang dag

428b1(mdo sde): ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya a mr-i ta byA ha ran nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi

429b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /lnga po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par chos sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems

430b6(mdo sde): grangs bstan pa 'di ni a la la sman pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bu lags so/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'ang rung ste/ gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs

431a1(mdo sde): lta ba dang ldan pa lags/ skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa lags so/ /de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs
