431b6(mdo sde): nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
431b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab cing
432a1(mdo sde): s angs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba 'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i dus la bab pa na bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de
432a2(mdo sde): dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de dag la gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o/ /yul gang na mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der bdag gis dus ma lags
432a3(mdo sde): pa'i bser ma dang / dgung char dang / mu ge dang / bro nad yang ba dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa
432a4(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi par bgyi'o/ /yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / glegs bam du bgyis pa'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa
432a5(mdo sde): la mchod pa bgyid pa'i yul der bdag gis byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang / chom rkun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i
432a6(mdo sde): ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag na chos smra ba 'di lta bu dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul der bdag gis lo tog dang / nor dang /
432a7(mdo sde): 'bru dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
432b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin
432b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so/ /legs so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su
432b3(mdo sde): gtad kyi phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus la bab cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur la/ 'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i
432b4(mdo sde): dus la bab pa'i tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad la bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu bsgrag par bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag gis mos pa bskyed
432b5(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /don dam pa'i chos nyid tshad mar byas la mngon par brtson pas las gzhan mi bya bar rab tu bsgrag par bya'o/ /don dam pa'i chos nyid kho na las brtsams
432b6(mdo sde): te dbang du byas la bstan par bya'o/ /ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par don rtogs par 'gyur ba de
432b7(mdo sde): ltar bstan par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
433a1(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mjug tu phyin pa'i dus la bab par shes nas/
433a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
433a3(mdo sde): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod nas/ 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyi ba
433a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi brjod pa lags so zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
433a5(mdo sde): bo| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos par dka' yi/ /khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig / yi ger bris shig/ chongs shig / lhogs shig / kun chub
433a6(mdo sde): par gyis shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
433a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
433b1(mdo sde): 'di bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zungs shig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
433b2(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
433b3(mdo sde): de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bdud
433b4(mdo sde): rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA wa rma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
433b5(mdo sde): la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mai trI ya pra s+thA na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam
433b6(mdo sde): po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu
433b7(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i
434a1(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa yin zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang phyir
434a2(mdo sde): mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs
434a3(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob
434a4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod
434a5(mdo sde): do| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
434a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan
434a7(mdo sde): pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag
434b1(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal
434b2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byams pa/ 'di ltar byas pa dang / zhus nas zhu ba lung
434b3(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/
434b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi phyed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes
434b5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/ pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/
434b6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed na/ de ltar na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par
434b7(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /gal te khyod 'du byed rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod bden
435a1(mdo sde): pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ lam dang / lam bsgom par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod 'bras bu thob par bya ba dang /
435a2(mdo sde): mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed dam/ yi ge rnams mi brjod par zhu bar byed
435a3(mdo sde): na| de lta na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa ji tsam du sgro 'dogs
435a4(mdo sde): pa de tsam du chags pa yod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'jam
435a5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ sgro btags pa/ sgro btags pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal/ ji tsam gyis na sgro btags par
435a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid
435a7(mdo sde): kyis mnyam pa yin/ smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ ji lta ba bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis
435b1(mdo sde): mnyam pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/
435b2(mdo sde): ma skyes ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin na/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang dag 'di ltar chos
435b3(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam par brtags nas med bzhin du sgro 'dogs pas sgro 'dogs par byed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni chos so/ /'di ni dge 'dun
435b4(mdo sde): no| |'di ni bdag go/ 'di ni sems can no/ /'di ni gang zag go/ 'di ni shed las skyes pa'o/ /'di ni shed bu'o/ /'di ni byed pa po'o/ /'di ni tshor ba po'o/ /'di ni chad pa'o/ /
435b5(mdo sde): 'di ni rtag pa'o/ /'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni nyan thos so/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ /'di ni
435b6(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'di ni zag pa med pa'o/ /'di ni 'dus byas so/ /'di ni 'dus ma byas so/ /'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o//
435b7(mdo sde): 'di ni rnam par byang ba'o/ /'di ni dge ba'o/ /'di ni mi dge ba'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor ba'o/ /'di ni
436a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'di ni dngos po'o/ /'di ni dngos po ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni yod pa'o/ /'di ni med pa'o/ /'di ni thob pa'o/ /
436a2(mdo sde): 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'o/ /'di ni lam mo/ /'di ni lam gyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni sgro btags pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i
436a3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med cing gang dag 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yin
436a4(mdo sde): te/ mi mnyam par sgro 'dogs pa ni ma yin la/ gang dag mthong ba med par mnyam pa nyid mthong ba de dag ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin / sgro 'dogs pa
436a5(mdo sde): la spyod pa ni mi mnyam par mthong ba yin zhing / gang dag mnyam pa nyid la sgro mi 'dogs pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du mthong pa yin la/ sgro 'dogs pa la
436a6(mdo sde): spyod pa ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol
436a7(mdo sde): te/ dge slong de dag 'dul ba la dbang mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
436b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu
436b2(mdo sde): bar mi byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed pa nas/ kho bo ni mi
436b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed do/ /'jam dpal/ kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ci nas de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ltar zhu bar byed do/ /'jam
436b4(mdo sde): dpal/ kho bo ni gang dag de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / gang dag chos thams cad dben pa nyid kyi phyir chos ci'ang mi dmigs pa dang / gang dag chos kyi dbyings
436b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / gang dag 'khor ba mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba las 'da' bar mi byed
436b6(mdo sde): pa dang / gang dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa nyid dang / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mi byed pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs
436b7(mdo sde): pa la zhu bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ kho po ni ci nas yi ge rnams kyang mi brjod/ tshig gi lam la'ang mi dpyod la/ shes rab kyis kyang bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba
437a1(mdo sde): dang / shes pa'ang gang yang med la/ 'di la rnam par grol ba'ang gang yang med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do/ /de
437a2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag
437a3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de kho na ltar ldem po ngag snel zhir 'dug pa'i tshig 'di dag kyang ston la
437a4(mdo sde): brjod pa thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mthun par sbyor ba las na zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
437a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de tsam du zab mo'i bzod pa
437a6(mdo sde): la nges shing shes rab dang / spobs pa ston pa la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yun ji
437a7(mdo sde): srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de/ bcom ldan 'das/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
437b1(mdo sde): lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/
437b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis gnas de dag kyang thos la/ 'jug pa de'ang thos nas slar zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson par 'gyur lags so/ /
437b3(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu /
437b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
437b5(mdo sde): po byams pas ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bya ba byas so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems
437b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs te/ bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong lon nas de'i 'og tu gdong ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
437b7(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
438a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi tha dad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438a2(mdo sde): chen po byams pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan ci lags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
438a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la
438a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal
438a5(mdo sde): lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
438a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rnam par rtse ba/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yun
438a7(mdo sde): ring zhing tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
438b1(mdo sde): rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
438b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gser bzang 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
438b3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag kyang gser gyi 'od ltar bzang la 'od zer re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
438b4(mdo sde): re re'i 'od kyis snang bar byed do/ /'od zer re res kyang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis shar phyogs 'gengs par byed do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
438b5(mdo sde): dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa re re sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
438b6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma 'gengs par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re res kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma sangs rgyas dang / chos rnams la 'dul bar
438b7(mdo sde): mdzad de/ phyir mi ldog pa la 'god do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i gser gyi 'od
439a1(mdo sde): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis kyi ming med do/ /rgyu skar dang / gza'
439a2(mdo sde): dang / skar ma dang / me'i 'od kyi ming yang mi grag go /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse
439a3(mdo sde): bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji ltar gdugs mtshan rnam par bzhag par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces
439a4(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
439a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sa gzhi chen po de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin te/ lag
439a6(mdo sde): mthil ltar mnyam par gyur la rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi chen po de las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam la mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang / dri zhim po'i ngad ldang la yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'phags te/
439a7(mdo sde): pad+ma re re las dri bsung gi ngad ldang ba'i dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
439b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams khyab ste/ sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges so/ /pad+ma de dag kyang snga dro'i dus
439b2(mdo sde): kyi tshe ni me tog rgyas la/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe na rnyis par gyur te/ des na sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ phye ma red kyi dus la bab bo snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu
439b3(mdo sde): d e ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan rnam
439b4(mdo sde): par bzhag par mngon pa yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ni tha na ming tsam yang med do/ /sdug bsngal ba'i ming tsam dang / nyan thos dang /
439b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ming tsam yang med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa'i chos dang bral ba/ dri nga ba med pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs
439b6(mdo sde): su gang bar gyur to/ /'dus pa re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/ de'i mjug tu bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa'
439b7(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med par 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'ang chos gzhan mi ston te/
440a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'ba' zhig ston par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i
440a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
440a3(mdo sde): chos gang yang yang dag pa'i mtha' las phyir mi ldog pa dang / 'dod chags 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / zhe sdang zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi
440a4(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / gti mug gti mug gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzugs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
440a5(mdo sde): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mig mig gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa
440a6(mdo sde): dang | rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med la/ dngos po
440a7(mdo sde): med pa gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ gang du'ang mi 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
440b1(mdo sde): p a'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
440b2(mdo sde): yang dag par ston to/ /de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog bya ba zhig byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/
440b3(mdo sde): rgyal po gser mdog des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
440b4(mdo sde): chen po dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
440b5(mdo sde): pa byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi med kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pas kyang rgyal po gser
440b6(mdo sde): mdog gi bsam pa rig gnas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la bsnyen bkur bya bar spro bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po gser mdog
440b7(mdo sde): gi 'khor gyi khams dpag tshad brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po zhig byas te/ 'khor gyi khyams der dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/ me tog gis ni bus mo nub pa tsam du khyab par byas/ steng
441a1(mdo sde): gi bar snang la ni mu tig dmar po'i dra ba bres/ snying po'i spos kyi mchog gis ni bdugs te/ 'khor gyi khyams der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
441a2(mdo sde): gdan bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bting ba khri'i rkang pa rin po che du mas spras pa zhig bshams so/ /byang chub
441a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' re re'i stan yang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba dag bshams so/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dpag tshad nyis stong na bzhugs te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar
441a4(mdo sde): rgyal po gser mdog gis gshegs shul dpag tshad nyis stong legs par brgyan nas/ 'di lta ste/ lam de'i ngos g.yas g.yon du stegs bu rin po che sna tshogs
441a5(mdo sde): kyis spras pa dag byas so/ /lam de'ang pus mo nub pa tsam du me tog gis khebs par byas so/ /steng gi bar snang la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla bre bres
441a6(mdo sde): so| / stegs bu de dag la'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'phang du mda' rgyang gang tsam yod pa dag btsugs so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig nas rin po
441a7(mdo sde): che'i shing ljon pa gcig tu rin po che'i thag gu bres so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba gser gyi bye
441b1(mdo sde): ma brdal ba/ bai DUR+ya'i the ma skas kyi rim pa dang bcas pa/ me tog ut+pal la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ dur pa skad 'byin pa dang / ldan pa dag
441b2(mdo sde): byas so/ /de bzhin du rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i bar thams cad du'ang rdzing dag byas te bkod pa de kho na dang 'dri bar bkod do/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi
441b3(mdo sde): drung du me tog sil ma thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /rin po che'i spos kyi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / mkhar
441b4(mdo sde): rnga dang / kim pa la dang / pi wang dang / khar dkrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /gdugs dang /
441b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /de ltar rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung thams cad du mi brgya phrag de snyed de snyed bkod nas/
441b6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis me tog sil ma 'di dag gis gtor cig /tsan+dan gyi phye ma
441b7(mdo sde): 'di dag gis gtor cig / pog phor 'di dag gis bdugs par gyis shig /sil snyan 'di dag kyang dkrol cig /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'di
442a1(mdo sde): dag kyang sgrengs shig ces bsgo'o/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du rin po che'i me tog gi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga
442a2(mdo sde): brgya'ang bkod do/ /lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de lam 'di nas phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis rin po che'i me
442a3(mdo sde): tog 'di dag gis gtor cig ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de gtsug lag khang de nas byung ma thag
442a4(mdo sde): tu 'khor gyi khyams su gshegs te de'i bar du gtsug lag khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar lam dpag tshad
442a5(mdo sde): nyis stong po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re phan tshun du 'dom re re tsam na 'greng
442a6(mdo sde): ngo| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phan tshun du gshegs pa na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' re re'i mgo bo'i drang
442a7(mdo sde): thad kyi steng na dngul gyi gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bas bskor ba/ ma bzung bar
442b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la phan tshun du 'gro'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs de dag la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba btags pa gang
442b2(mdo sde): yin pa de dag rlung gi bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra ji lta bu 'byung ba de 'dra ba ni sil snyan
442b3(mdo sde): yan lag 'bum dang ldan pa las kyang mi 'byung ngo / /rin po che'i gdugs dang / dril bu g.yer ka de dag dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i lo ma de dag dang / rin po che'i
442b4(mdo sde): thag gu de dag dang / rin po che'i stegs bu de dag dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byung ste/
442b5(mdo sde): de na sems can gang dag sbyin pa la mos pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i sgra thos so/ /gang dag tshul khrims la mos pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi sgra thos so/ /de bzhin
442b6(mdo sde): du gang dag bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan la mos pa dang / gang dag shes rab la mos pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi sgra thos so/ /de bzhin du
442b7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sga dang / de bzhin du dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang
443a1(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi sgra dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par
443a2(mdo sde): rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ste/ sems can rnams ji lta bur mos pa de lta bu'i sgra 'byung zhing thos so/ /chos kyi sgra de thos nas kyang
443a3(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
443a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de lam de nas phan tshun du gshegs pa na/ dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che 'bum phrag du
443a5(mdo sde): mas spras pa'i lha'i rin po che'i gdugs ma bzung bar 'phags te phan tshun du 'gro'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs de dang / dril bu g.yer ka de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las
443a6(mdo sde): kyang sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa byung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
443a7(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de'i rin
443b1(mdo sde): po che'i gdugs de las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par
443b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka'
443b3(mdo sde): stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i brtsams pa tsam ngas bshad par bya'o//
443b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang / smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
443b5(mdo sde): dang | gnas pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang / dngos po med pa'i phyag rgya dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag
443b6(mdo sde): rgya dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang / dben pa'i phyag rgya dang / rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag
443b7(mdo sde): rgya dang / byed pa med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i phyag rgya dang / gzung du med pa dang / gnas med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i
444a1(mdo sde): phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni phyag rgya brko bar sla ba'ang ma yin la phyag rgyar yang 'dug pa dang / phyag
444a2(mdo sde): rgya'i 'bur yang gdab tu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas kyang med/ rkyen kyang med/ rgyu'ang med/ bskyed pa'ang med/ rten yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
444a3(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / nam mkha'i rnam pa can dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang / nam
444a4(mdo sde): mkha'i ston par yang dag par shes pa dang / nam mkha' la ni chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad do/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i chos thams
444a5(mdo sde): cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang gdags su med par gnas te/ gdags pa tsam du zad par yang dag
444a6(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / gang chos rnams gdags pa tsam du shes pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang 'gal par mi byed pa'o/ /gang de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de
444a7(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ des na de bzhin nyid la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad
444b1(mdo sde): pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par
444b2(mdo sde): brtse ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i
444b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas par 'khor gyi khyams der gshegs te/ der byon pa na lha 'bum dag mchod pa'i las bya ba la spro bar gyur to/ /me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang /
444b4(mdo sde): ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do/ /lha'i me tog mnad ra ba'i char yang 'bebs so/ /sil snyan bye ba phrag 'bum dag kyang dkrol bar byed do/ /rigs
444b5(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de 'khor gyi khyams der bzhugs pa na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
444b6(mdo sde): po tshangs pa mchod pa'i las bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par gyur to/ /mchod pa ji lta bu dag gi phyir spro bar gyur ce na/ 'di
444b7(mdo sde): lta ste| de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i rgyab na glang po che dkar po rgyan
445a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar gnas la/ glang po che'i rgyal po de'i sna la'ang 'di lta ste/ rlung dang / nyi ma bskyab pa'i phyir rin po che'i
445a2(mdo sde): gdugs gsal zhing blta na sdug pa thogs pa dang / glang po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sna la'ang mu tig sngon po gsal ba'i mu tig gi do shal 'phyang ba dang / mu tig
445a3(mdo sde): gi do shal de las kyang chu bsil zhing bai DUR+ya sngon po 'dra la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod
445a4(mdo sde): ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mthus lag pa g.yas pa la rin po che'i lhung bzed byung bar gyur to/ /lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lhung bzed 'dzin
445a5(mdo sde): par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la ni tshangs pa nyid rin po che'i gdugs thogs te snam logs na 'dug go /rin po che'i gdugs de las
445a6(mdo sde): kyang mu tig gi do shal dag 'phyang ngo / /mu tig gi do shal de dag las kyang chu bsil zhing bai DUR+ya sngon po 'dra la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/ chu des de
445a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de'i chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni bcom ldan 'das de'i lhung bzed 'dzin to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de
445b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag la lha mo re re'i mdun na 'dug ste/ lha'i spos dri zhim po sna du ma mchig la
445b2(mdo sde): 'thag par byed do/ /spos de 'thag pa na'ang rdzi phyogs dang / rdzi phyogs ma yin par ser bu ldang ste/ ser bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la spos kyis phog par byed
445b3(mdo sde): do| |skyes bu dam pa de dag ni dring ba med pa ste/ de dag ni lha mo'i 'du shes kyang 'jug par mi byed la de dag ni spos kyi mtshan ma'ang mi skyed na chags par lta ga la 'gyur te
445b4(mdo sde): de ni gnas med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od bzhugs par rig nas bu stong dang / bud med brgyad khri bzhi
445b5(mdo sde): stong dang / rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / blon po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / bu mo brgyad khri
445b6(mdo sde): bzhi stong dang / gzhan yang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag dang lhan cig tu rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba bsod pa mang po mchog tu gtsang bas tshim par byas te ci
445b7(mdo sde): bzhed pa bstabs so/ /tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te bshos gsol nas gtsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs par rig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bye ba 'bum
446a1(mdo sde): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu phrugs gcig phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re la'ang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba'i ras
446a2(mdo sde): bcos bu phrugs re re phul lo/ /phul nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / yul mi gtso bo rnams dang lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos mnyan
446a3(mdo sde): pa la gus pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des skye bo'i tshogs chen po gus
446a4(mdo sde): par 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod par thugs su chud nas sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
446a5(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang bcom ldan 'das de
446a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
446a7(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs de legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang
446b1(mdo sde): sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la slob par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba la
446b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de las brtsams pa tsam
446b3(mdo sde): zhig bshad par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba ni gzhan ma yin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho nar zad de/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
446b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
446b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba ni de yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid la sngon gyi de bzhin
446b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor/ sems
446b7(mdo sde): can rnams kyang yongs su smin par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sgo so so ba 'di nyid la bslabs
447a1(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi de bzhin
447a2(mdo sde): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa'i de
447a3(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa de dag kyang sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
447a4(mdo sde): rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
447a5(mdo sde): 'di dag nyid yang dag par smra bas smra'o/ /de la sgo so so pa de'i bye brag ni gang yin/ nyes pa ni gang yin/ rnam par gnon pa ni gang yin/ nges par 'byung ba ni gang
447a6(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ ser sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems
447a7(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /nor kun tu bsrung la bgo bsha' mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' gang
447b1(mdo sde): ser sna'i sems rnam par gnon cing bcom nas sbyin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa de ni de'i rnam par gnon pa yin no/ /de longs spyod ji ltar chung yang rung / longs spyod
447b2(mdo sde): rgya chen po dag yod kyang rung ste/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / slong ba rnams la bgo bsha' byed la de dga' ba'i sems dang / kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang /
447b3(mdo sde): mgu ba'i sems dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sems can thams cad la snying rje bas phan pa'i dngos po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pas lag pa brkyang
447b4(mdo sde): ste| sbyin pa byin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sgo so so ba la slob pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges par 'byung ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'chal
447b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang / zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang / ral pa'i tshul khrims
447b6(mdo sde): dang / nag nog gi tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dres
447b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims dang / zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang / ral pa'i tshul khrims dang / nag nog gi tshul khrims gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi
448a1(mdo sde): sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
448a2(mdo sde): pa'am/ dmigs pa'i lta ba 'dod pa dang / nyan thos kyi gtam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam mam/ dmigs pa can gyi gtam la dga' bar 'dzin pa 'di ni byang chub sems
448a3(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / tshul khrims 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa dang / tshul khrims ral ba dang / tshul khrims nag nog can
448a4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la mi spyod pa dang / mi slob pa ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rab yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
448a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de
448a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal ba bgyi na ni tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur la/ gang gi tshe na nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
448a7(mdo sde): sam| dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rab tu 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
448b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas
448b2(mdo sde): sam/ ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa byas sam/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug gam/ mtshams med pa
448b3(mdo sde): lnga byas su zin kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi sems kyang ma btang ma spangs te/ byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral la/ dmigs pa can gyi sems dang / mngon par zhen
448b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyang mi skyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa kho na yin pa dang / tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims ma zhig
448b5(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims ma ral ba dang / tshul khrims nag nog can ma yin par gzung bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa'ang yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
448b6(mdo sde): na| de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i las byas pas srid par 'gro ba bskyed du zin
448b7(mdo sde): kyang 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni ji tsam du srid par 'gro ba bskyed pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
449a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang de nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ dmigs par lta
449a2(mdo sde): ba dang lhan cig bsten par byed na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
449a3(mdo sde): gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong la/ dmigs par lta ba'i sems kyang mi bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa
449a4(mdo sde): yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems can rnams la mi snyoms pa'i yid la byed pa ni
449a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems can rnams dang / chos rnams la tha dad par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems can la dmigs pa la
449a6(mdo sde): brten pa'i byams pa phyogs gcig pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /stong pa nyid la mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni sbyin no/ /'di la ni
449a7(mdo sde): mi sbyin no snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni yon dbul lo/ /'di la ni mi dbul lo snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni chos bshad par bya'o/ /
449b1(mdo sde): 'di la ni chos bshad par mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'di la ni bsnyen bkur mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub
449b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ji tsam du so sor 'gyed par byed de/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o snyam du so sor phye nas tshul khrims 'chal pa la brnyas par
449b3(mdo sde): byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad la sems mnyam
449b4(mdo sde): par bya dgos shing / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lta bur snyoms pa'i sems dang / stong pa nyid la bzod pa dang /
449b5(mdo sde): ldan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can gang yang yongs su mi gtong la/ mi gnas pa'i sems dang / tshad nges par mi byed pas sems can thams cad
449b6(mdo sde): kyi phyir snying rje bskyed cing byams pas mos par byas te/ khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/ chos rnams la'ang stong ngo snyam du bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub
449b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa yin no/ /gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor ba la tshad nges par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ste/ bskal pa
450a1(mdo sde): 'di tsam gyi bar du ni bdag 'khor bar bya'o/ /bskal pa 'di tsam gyi bar du ni 'khor bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems
450a2(mdo sde): can 'di snyed cig ni bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di nyid cig ni bdag gis dgrol bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di ni brtson 'grus
450a3(mdo sde): so| |bdag ni brtson 'grus can no/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes
450a4(mdo sde): pa'o| |de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/ 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
450a5(mdo sde): mi mngon no zhes ji skad du 'byung ba de srid du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor 'khor te/ gal te bdag sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa de kho na snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya
450a6(mdo sde): dgos par gyur na'ang bdag gis spro bar bya'o/ /rnam grangs 'di bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de ji srid pa de srid du 'khor ba na 'khor
450a7(mdo sde): dgos na'ang bdag gis spro ste/ de'ang brtson 'grus dang / nga rgyal dang / byang chub la mngon par zhen pa spangs la mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go chas spro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de
450b1(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha bgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gang grong dang / grong
450b2(mdo sde): khyer dang / gros rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song na sems can rnams kyi don nus shing lcogs la/ 'os yin bzhin du de dgon pa'i phyogs dben pa zhig tu
450b3(mdo sde): 'dug nas dben pa na spyod cing bsam gtan gyi ro'i dga' ba dang / bde ba la brten cing gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa'ang byin
450b4(mdo sde): par byed la skyo ba'ang med/ sems kyi dmigs pa la'ang mi brten/ nang du yang dag 'jog kyang 'phel bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong ba'ang med/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan
450b5(mdo sde): pa'ang yin na byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
450b6(mdo sde): phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do snyam du de ltar shes nas
450b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang / zhi gnas la rnal 'byor du brtson par gnas la/ sems can gzhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'khris zin pa de dag la stong pa nyid
451a1(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i tshul de mi brjod mi ston/ brda sprod par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i thabs la mi mkhas pa yin par rig
451a2(mdo sde): par bya ste/ nyes par byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par shes
451a3(mdo sde): shing chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do snyam ste 'di de ltar
451a4(mdo sde): n go bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di dag lus kyis mngon sum du byas te thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan la sems can phyin ci log tu sems shing
451a5(mdo sde): dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang phyin ci log gis zin cing dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa de las rab tu grol bar byas nas/ de dag la'ang chos thams
451a6(mdo sde): c ad ngo bo nyid med do zhes ston cing de dag kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs
451a7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa'ang yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na bcom ldan 'das
451b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od bshos gsol nas/ 'khor gyi khyams der 'khor de'i nang du byang chub
451b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can tshad med pa dag bla na
451b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam
451b4(mdo sde): grangs las brtsams te/ chos bstan du zin kyang spobs pa'am/ chos kyi sgo rnams zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de'i brtsams pa tsam bstan pa yin no/ /rigs kyi
451b5(mdo sde): b u| de ltar na rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi tham
451b6(mdo sde): par bkod pa de lta bu dang / bsnyen bkur dang / phu dud du bya ba de lta bus bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas so// //bam po
451b7(mdo sde): gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal
452a1(mdo sde): po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gtsug lag khang ma bgyis lags sam/ de bzhin
452a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na bzhugs bzhugs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
452a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang rang gi sprul
452a4(mdo sde): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnas gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la bka' stsal pa/
452a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das pa'i tha ma'i nyin par rgyal po gser mdog gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bshos gsol /
452a6(mdo sde): yon phul te/ slar gshegs par rig nas bsam pa 'di lta bu zhig bsams te/ ci bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/
452a7(mdo sde): 'on te tshangs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/ 'on te 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas de'i sems bskyed
452b1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des thugs su chud do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis
452b2(mdo sde): mkhyen nas rgyal po dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gi mdun du steng gi bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de kho na bzhin du rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
452b3(mdo sde): pa'i lus shig sprul te/ de steng gi bar snang de la 'dug nas rgyal po gser mdog la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /dper na mi ni shes rab 'chal/ /byis
452b4(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin gyur pa zhig / rgyal po bsnyen bkur byas nas ni/ /bya dga' chung ngu gsol bar byed/ /de bzhin la las sangs rgyas la/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
452b5(mdo sde): mchod byas nas/ /tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po'i srid/ /dma' ba'i gnas la 'dod par byed/ /rgyal por gyur dang brgya byin dang / /de bzhin tshangs par 'gyur ba
452b6(mdo sde): rnams/ /'di dag mi rtag brtan ma yin/ /brnyan ma yin te 'jig tshul can/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /sangs
452b7(mdo sde): rgyas 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis/ /de 'dra'i sems ni bsngags pa yin/ /rgyal po khyod ni yul 'khor bcas/ /mchod pa rgya chen byas zin gyi/ /byang chub sems
453a1(mdo sde): ni bla na med/ /rgya chen sems ni khyod kyis bskyed/ /dma' ba'i smon lam ma 'debs shig /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin/ /shes rab bzang
453a2(mdo sde): po mkhas par gyis/ /byang chub mchog la 'jug par gyis/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la/ /gang gis stong gsum
453a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang / /rin chen bkang ste phul ba pas/ /gang gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /sems kyis byang chub bsngo byas la/ /tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang / /de ni de
453a4(mdo sde): bas shin tu che/ /gang gis sems can thams cad la/ /bskal pa bye ba brjod med du/ /sems can kun la bsnyen byas kyang / /de yi bcu drug char mi phod/ /gang
453a5(mdo sde): zhig thal sbyar byang chub sems bskyed dang / /phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten don mdzad pa/ /rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs rnams la/ /bsod nams
453a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i mi 'gas sngon chad kyi/ /'khor bar bskal pa bye bar mchod pa bas/ /mi gang mkhas shing mdzangs pa'i rang bzhin can/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan
453a7(mdo sde): la yid ches shing / /byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed nas kyang / /bde gshegs mchod rten la ni me tog 'bul/ /'di ni de bas bsod nams khyad par
453b1(mdo sde): brjod/ /byang chub sems kyis me tog 'bul byed la/ /bsod nams snga ma de ni dper mi rung / /rgya mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems
453b2(mdo sde): can ji snyed pa/ /bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bskal pa mang por las gzhan mi byed par/ /bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug pa med/ /de dag byang
453b3(mdo sde): chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan/ /bskal pa mtha' yas bar du bshad na yang / /cung zad tsam yang yongs su brjod mi 'gyur/ /sa gzhi dag las rdul ni blangs pa bzhin/ /
453b4(mdo sde): de ltar rgyal po skyes mchog khyod kyis kyang / /byang chub sems kyi phan yon 'di thos nas/ /myur du blo gros dma' ba kun spongs la/ /byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems skyed cig/
453b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'dren pa gser gyi mchod sdong 'od/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun ldan pa/ /de yis byang chub sems kyi rnam par smin/ /'di 'dra zhes ni phan yon 'di dag
453b6(mdo sde): bstan/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan pa yi/ /bsod nams de la gal te gzugs yod na/ /zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye snyed gang byas kyang / /de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa
453b7(mdo sde): med| |rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra thos nas kyang / /rgyal po'i gtso bo sems ni dga' gyur te/ /sor mo bcu yis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes ni
454a1(mdo sde): tshigs su smras/ /byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed do/ /bdag ni chos rje sangs rgyas grub par shog /byang chub rdul bral 'dus
454a2(mdo sde): ma byas rtogs nas/ /sems can gang+gA'i bye snyed dgrol bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas sku des tshigs bcad 'di brjod nas/ /de tshe rgyal po'i gtso bo dga' gyur pa/ /shes nas
454a3(mdo sde): stong gsum thams cad rab g.yos te/ /ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin du mkha' las song / /rgyal po gser mdog sems ni dad gyur nas/ /bu dang bu mo de bzhin chung ma
454a4(mdo sde): dang / /rgyal po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag rnams/ /sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dod zhes pos/ /bye ba brgya phrag drug cus yongs bskor zhing / /me tog rnams dang
454a5(mdo sde): phreng dang bdug pa thogs/ /sangs rgyas ga la bar ni gnyi rgyud song / /zhabs la phyag btsal nas ni phyogs gcig 'dug /de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /blon po
454a6(mdo sde): dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag dang / /rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyi rnams/ /de dag kyang ni phyag btsal gus par 'khod/ /lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin bar
454a7(mdo sde): snang thams cad khyab/ /sil snyan dkrol zhing me tog char pa phab/ /gser gyi mdog de yul gyi mis bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhu bar byed/ /
454b1(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan pa dpag med lha yi lha/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba khyod la zhu/ /gang gis byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed/ /de yi bsod nams ji tsam bskyed 'gyur
454b2(mdo sde): lags/ /bcom ldan ji ltar spyod pa spyad bgyis na/ /bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal mi mthong par/ /nges par bde dang bde blag tshim gyur pas/ /byang chub bdud rtsi mya
454b3(mdo sde): ngan med pa rtogs/ /bdag gzhar rkang lag btang yang mi 'tshal zhing / /mgo dang rang sha stsal yang mi 'tshal bar/ /bdag ni nges par bder gnas spyod pa yi/ /
454b4(mdo sde): thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rtag tu bde dang bde blag ldan par shog /nam yang bdag lus sdug bsngal ma gyur cig /byams dang bzod dang
454b5(mdo sde): dul dang sdom pa la/ /gnas nas bdag gis byang chub mchog reg shog /le lo ma mchis rtag tu bslab la slob/ /bdag gis bslab pa nam yang gzhig mi bgyi/ /'dren
454b6(mdo sde): pa bdag ni dam bcas brtan par bgyi/ /nam yang tshig tsam lhur len yong mi bgyid/ /rang byung bsod nams 'bras bu bdag la gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa
454b7(mdo sde): bde ba gsungs/ /ji ltar spyad pa'i bslab pa bka' stsal pa/ /thos nas ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par bgyi/ /gser 'od gser bkod 'od bzang des gsungs pa/ /kye
455a1(mdo sde): kye sa yi bdag po mnyan par gyis/ /bde ba'i rgyu yi bsod nams khyod la bshad/ /bslab pa'ang bshad kyi de phyir nga las nyon/ /gang gis
455a2(mdo sde): stong gsum rin chen gang byas la/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
455a3(mdo sde): gang gis zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /rin chen gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur//
455a4(mdo sde): gang gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /sems can thams cad la ni mchod pa byed/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur//
455a5(mdo sde): gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur/ /ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la/ /bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag la la zhig/ /bskal pa khrag khrig bar du
455a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byed/ /gang gis snying rje bskyed nas byang chub tu/ /rgya chen sems ni skyed par byed gyur te/ /sems can la la gang gis byang chub tu/ /sems kyi gtso bo bskyed
455a7(mdo sde): pa byas nas kyang / /gom pa bdun ni bor ba'i bsod nams 'di/ /de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te sems can mtha' dag sangs rgyas te/ /
455b1(mdo sde): spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid gyur pa/ /ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i bar/ /sems can gcig pus mchod pa byas pa dang / /mkhas pa'i mi ni gang yang rung
455b2(mdo sde): ba yis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /me tog gcig bu phul ba'i bsod nams 'di/ /de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /bskal pa bye ba
455b3(mdo sde): khrag khrig mang por ni/ /bsod nams de yi bshad pa brtsams byas kyang / /bsod nams 'bras bu de yi bshad pa ni/ /nam yang zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
455b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des rgyal po gser mdog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang
455b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du theg pa bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la/ /sdug bsngal ba
455b6(mdo sde): dang | yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni myur du bla
455b7(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yongs su mi gtong
456a1(mdo sde): ba dang / dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs

456a3(mdo sde): chos la gus pa dang / thos pa mang pos chog mi shes pa dang / gzhan dag la chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang / zang zing med par chos ston pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan

456b7(mdo sde): cad yongs su gtong ba'ang yongs su btang mi dgos par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar yang 'gyur la/ theg pa bde bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
457a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos

457b2(mdo sde): gang zag gam/ yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'am/ yongs su btang ba gang yin pa'am/ len pa gang yin pa'am/ bzod par byed pa gang yin pa'am/ gang la bzod

458b1(mdo sde): pa mang por sbyin pa byin par bgyi/ /zas skom gos dang shing rta bzhon pa dang / /gser dngul rin chen du ma'i sbyin pa bgyi/ /'dren pa bdag ni bslab la gus par bgyid/ /

458b6(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi/ /bdag ni stong pa nyid la nges par bgyi/ /lta ba la ni brten par yong mi bgyid/ /dma' ba'i spyod pa rtag tu rnam par spang / /mchog gi spyod pa dri med spyad

459a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma de dag dang / gzhan
459a3(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams rgyal po gser mdog de'i rjes su slob cing thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

460a4(mdo sde): d ang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi nang na tha na sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

460a7(mdo sde): byung nas thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
460b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang nga dang / khyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'khor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
