460b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin
461a1(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni yun ring du thogs so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
461a2(mdo sde): pa'ang dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i
461a3(mdo sde): sngon rol dang / de'i 'og tu 'ang sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag la ngas ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas mod kyi/ de srid du ngas bla
461a4(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed de gzhan du na nga 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag de tsam du mdzes shing de tsam
461a5(mdo sde): du blta na sdug la/ de tsam du snying du sdug pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam ste/ /de dag la nga'i sdug pa'i sems dang / dga' ba dang / gus pa bskyed par zad de/ ngas bla na med pa
461a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems ma bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bas na rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
461a7(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang / rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig
461b1(mdo sde): ' bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mchod pa byas su zin kyang de srid du'ang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
461b2(mdo sde): chub tu sems mi bskyed de/ gzhan du na phyis gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dus par gyur pa de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
461b3(mdo sde): zad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /dang po nga ni don dam gzigs pa dang / /grags pa chen po shes rab pha rol son/ /mi
461b4(mdo sde): mchog sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / /bsam yas rnams la gus pas mchod pa byed/ /dang por yon tan 'byung gnas rnams mchod kyang / /bdag ni mkhas pa chos kun
461b5(mdo sde): shes pa'i mchog / 'jig rten mchod rten sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/ /de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed/ /de dag rang rgyal bye ba snyed la yang / /gus pa bskyed nas mchod
461b6(mdo sde): pa byed mod kyi/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed/ /gus pa rgya chen yang dag bskyed nas kyang / /dbang du gyur pa bye snyed
461b7(mdo sde): mchod mod kyi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mi mchog 'dra bar ni/ /de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed/ /don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas/ /dga' ba'i shugs
462a1(mdo sde): ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ /mkhas pa mi 'dul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/ /gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed/ /gang tshe de dag bsod nams
462a2(mdo sde): rgya chen bsags/ /lus dang yid kyis bden pa bsgoms pa na/ /'dren pa mi rnams mchog tu gyur cig ces/ /byang chub don du sems ni skyed par byed/ /de dag gis
462a3(mdo sde): ni bskal pa bye ba snyed/ /bsnyen bkur byas pas bsod nams tshogs bsags nas/ /sems dge ba dang 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis/ /de tshe byang chub tu yang sems
462a4(mdo sde): bskyed de/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa/ /des ni bdag kyang thams cad gzigs gyur cig /nam yang bdag gi smon lam nyams ma gyur/ /de dag
462a5(mdo sde): de skad smon lam 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa/ /des ni srog chags thams cad brgal gyur cig /mi dge'i las ni bdag
462a6(mdo sde): gis gang byas pa/ /de yi 'bras bu mi zad bdag gis spangs/ /mthu dang brtson 'grus brtan po bskyed nas ni/ /phyi nas byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /sems
462a7(mdo sde): ni nam yang zhum par ma gyur cig / dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas thob gyur cig /mkhas pa sems la dmigs par mi byed de/ /byang chub mi dmigs bdag nyid
462b1(mdo sde): kun mi dmigs/ /chos 'di mtha' dag stong par shes na ni/ /des na byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
462b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
462b3(mdo sde): byams pa la/ byams pa zhes bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'dis ming 'di ga las rnyed lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
462b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa
462b5(mdo sde): grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig
462b6(mdo sde): pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
462b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun por ba na gnas
463a1(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bzung ngo / /rin po che'i gdugs des kyang stong gsum gyi stong
463a2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ /der lha rnams kyis kye ma 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags
463a3(mdo sde): te| des na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan rin chen gdugs rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
463a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs de'i gsung rab la dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya ba tshong dpon gyi rigs las rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi bu/
463a5(mdo sde): dge slong blo gros brtan po de bsod snyoms par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de'i bstan pa la bab pa na dzam+bu'i gling de na grong brgyad
463a6(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong yod do/ /grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /yul 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /tshong 'dus brgyad khri bzhi
463a7(mdo sde): stong yod do/ /dge slong blo gros brtan po de'ang grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus de dag thams cad du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu
463b1(mdo sde): bar gyur la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du bdag gis zan mi bza'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar
463b2(mdo sde): dge slong blo gros brtan po des de lta bu'i yi dam de bcas nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ tshong 'dus gang dang / gang du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba
463b3(mdo sde): de dang / der nam srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar zan mi za'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge slong blo gros brtan po des gang gi tshe nyi ma gcig gis srog
463b4(mdo sde): chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma gnyis kyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i
463b5(mdo sde): skabs kyang yod de/ des zan bcad nas nyi ma gsum pa'i tshe zan za'o/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma gsum gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs
463b6(mdo sde): kyang yod do/ /nyi ma bzhis srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe nyi ma lnga dang / drug dang /
463b7(mdo sde): bdun gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs kyang yod de/ de zhag bdun gyi bar du zan chad kyang sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i
464a1(mdo sde): phyir sems yongs su mi skyo ste zhag brgyad pa'i tshe zan za'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs de lta bus dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi
464a2(mdo sde): stong gi bar du yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems kyis grong khyer chen po de dag tu song zhing grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus de dag tu song
464a3(mdo sde): nas sems can de dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das nas srog chags skyes pa
464a4(mdo sde): dang | bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di
464a5(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can mang po 'di dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod zin gyi/ bdag gis 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
464a6(mdo sde): la gzud gor ma chag go snyam ste/ de de dag gi thad du song nas lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /dge
464a7(mdo sde): 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod do/ /sems can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag gi nang nas lo
464b1(mdo sde): b rgyad khri bzhi stong po gzhan 'das nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu tshang ba gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa de dag bla na med
464b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud do/ /lhag ma dman pa la mas pa rkyen gyi mthu dang ldan pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems
464b3(mdo sde): bskyed du bcug go / rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag theg pa gsum po la mos par byas zin gyi /
464b4(mdo sde): bdag gis sems can 'di dag bag yod par gnas par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzud pa bstan to snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des yang
464b5(mdo sde): lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i lung phog go / rigs kyi bu/ dge slong blo gros
464b6(mdo sde): b rtan po des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po'i sems can de dag thams cad ci nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur gdams
464b7(mdo sde): ngag bstan cing / de lta de lta bur rjes su ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
465a1(mdo sde): zhugs te 'gro'o/ /de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ tshong
465a2(mdo sde): 'dus su bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ste/ de 'gro ba na sems can byams pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i rkang pa sgo'i them
465a3(mdo sde): pa la bzhag pa'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la yid ches pa dang / stong pa
465a4(mdo sde): nyid la mos pa'i khyad par la ltos/ de'i phyir dge slong blo gros brtan po'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
465a5(mdo sde): ji ltar btsud pa bzhin du byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul
465a6(mdo sde): pa de lta bu mthong nas sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyis/ a la la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang /
465a7(mdo sde): grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus su 'gro ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra sgrogs shing skad 'byin
465b1(mdo sde): par byed do/ /sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo / /de dag gis sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
465b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi bar
465b3(mdo sde): du gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos nas/ a la la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
465b4(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus su song ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo / /de'i ming de la'ang
465b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs des rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/ 'di skad du/ byang chub sems
465b6(mdo sde): dpa' dge slong blo gros brtan po 'di ni srid par 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te mngon
465b7(mdo sde): par grags par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub thob pa'i tshe'ang 'di'i ming de nyid du 'gyur te 'jig rten du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang / rin po che bkod pa'i sangs
466a1(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing gi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dus pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
466a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
466a3(mdo sde): khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar srid de/ de tshun chad tshe rabs thams cad du ming / 'di lta ste/ byams pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig tu gyur to/ /byang chub
466a4(mdo sde): thob pa'i tshe'ang 'di'i ming / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba de kho nar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ rgyu
466a5(mdo sde): ni de yin no/ /rkyen ni de yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la byams pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
466a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sngon byung ba 'di bshad ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /steng gi bar
466a7(mdo sde): snang la'ang lha'i glu dbyangs grag go / me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal bo chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
466b1(mdo sde): dang | gzhan yang / lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag khyer nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ga la ba der gtor to/ /tshig
466b2(mdo sde): 'di skad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
466b3(mdo sde): lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang sems can bye ba khrag
466b4(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyi don byas pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa'i mchog
466b5(mdo sde): legs par rnyed pa yin/ sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong nas dga' ba thob pa de dag lta ci smos/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
466b6(mdo sde): po byams pa la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag pa de'i mod la skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas/ lha dang / mi
466b7(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshig mthun par/ tshigs 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
467a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis
467a2(mdo sde): stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srog
467a3(mdo sde): chags stong phrag du ma ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'khor
467a4(mdo sde): 'dus pa gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las
467a5(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
467a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
467a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming byams pa'i dang po sems
467b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs
467b2(mdo sde): shig| de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs
467b3(mdo sde): 'di gzung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir khyod la gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
467b4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas ni gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
467b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i dang po 'jug pa 'di thos nas sems kyi rgyud byang chub tu gzhol ba dang / byang chub tu smon pas mos par byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ kun chub
467b6(mdo sde): par byed dam/ sgom mam/ gzhan dag la rgyas par yang dag par ston par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
467b7(mdo sde): kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mi lus 'thob pa rnyed par dka'/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka'/ /sangs rgyas dad pa rnyed par dka'/ /byang chub sems
468a1(mdo sde): kyang rnyed par dka'/ /gnas skabs bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ste/ /de phyir thob nas ma spangs shig /mthu rtsal dag kyang chud ma
468a2(mdo sde): gzan/ /mi lus thob pa rnyed pa dang / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / /sangs rgyas dad pa'ang rnyed pa dang / /byang chub sems ni bskyed gyur na/ /de phyir brtson 'grus bskyed
468a3(mdo sde): nas kyang / /rtag tu bag ni yod par gyis/ /drang srong chen po de dag gis/ /bag yod pas ni byang chub brnyes/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rtsa ba'i sgo dang tshul gyi
468a4(mdo sde): lam| |bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus yin/ /mkhas pa rnams kyang 'di la slobs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
468a5(mdo sde): rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
468a6(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
468a7(mdo sde): mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang / dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
468b1(mdo sde): rgya'i skad du/ kwan ji li'u phus zhang sh+yan te'u shis th+yan kyin/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
468b2(mdo sde): dang | byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi yul/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon
468b3(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom

468b6(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i nang nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa brgya stong snang ba thams cad kyis gsung mthun par bskal pa 'di nyid du/ byang chub sems dpa'

475a4(mdo sde): las 'das nas de'i 'khor nye gnas las gang la la zhig brtson 'grus su bsod nams bsags pa/ sdom pa ma zhig cing mchod rten la phyag ba dar dang / maN+Dal byed pa
475a5(mdo sde): dang | spos dri zhim pa dang / me tog gi mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum la spyod cing / zab cing drang ba'i chos la spyod pa dang / mdo sde klog cing / sems rtse gcig tu rgyun
475a6(mdo sde): mi 'chad par yid la zlos pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang / byams pa'i mtshan brjod pa de lta bu la
475a7(mdo sde): sogs pa'i mi de dag ni 'di skad cig tsam du khrims brgyad mnos nas sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed cing / smon lam btab nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ dper na/
475b1(mdo sde): skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brgyang ba tsam du dga' ldan du skyes nas pad+ma'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas/ brgya phrag stong gi lha'i bus lha'i rol mo byed cing me
475b2(mdo sde): tog man+dAr ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni 'dzam bu'i gling du bsod nams rgya chen po bsags
475b3(mdo sde): nas| 'chi 'pho ba'i 'og tu 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dir lha'i rgyal po byams pa zhes bya ba la/ khyod skyabs su gsol/ phyag 'tshol cig dang / phyag
475b4(mdo sde): 'tshal na smin mtshams kyi mdzod sku nas 'od zer dkar pos reg par byas nas/ bskal pa dgu bcu'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub
475b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan gyis ngo mtshar chos bshad nas/ brtson pa mi 'dor ba phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / bla na med pa'i lam yid la sems pa de lta bu la
475b6(mdo sde): sogs pa'i sems can sdig pa thams cad byang zhing chos drug la spyod na the tshom med par nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes nas/ 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong / byams
475b7(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs 'bring nas 'dzam bu'i gling du dang por chos thos nas ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas dang / bskal pa skar ma lta bu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'ang
476a1(mdo sde): zhal mthong nas sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi drung du byang chub tu lung ston pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /u pA li/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las
476a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
476a3(mdo sde): la sogs pa 'khor thams cad las gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang / gus par phyag 'tshal ba'i
476a4(mdo sde): mi de dag tshe'i dus byas nas se gol gtogs pa tsam du gong ma ci lta ba bzhin du/ byams pa'i mtshan thos nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu mun pa'i khams su mi ltung /
476a5(mdo sde): mtha' 'khob kyi yul dang / log par lta ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad spyod par mi skye/ skye ba thams cad du drang por lta ba dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dkon
476a6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la mi smod par skye'o/ /u pA li/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ sdom pa bshig pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pas byang
476a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan thos pas mtshan nas brjod cing / yan lag lnga gtugs te/ sems rtse gcig tu bshags na sdig pa thams cad myur du
476b1(mdo sde): byang nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan brjod pa dang / sku gzugs bris nas spos dang / me tog dang / gos
476b2(mdo sde): dang | gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phyag btsal zhing yid la zlos na mi de dag tshe'i dus byas pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ mi chen po'i
476b3(mdo sde): mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyis man+dA ra ba'i char phab nas mi de dag bsdus nas skad cig yud tsam gyis lha'i gnas su skyes/ /'phags
476b4(mdo sde): pa byams pa'i zhal mthong nas gdong dang / spyi bos phyag btsal nas de ma thag tu chos thos pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi la mthob pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / /
476b5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /u pA li/ khyod rtse gcig tu nyon la yid la gyis shig /
476b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad skyabs su 'gro ba na gang la la zhig skyabs su 'gro ba'i mi de dag ni bla na med pa'i lam
476b7(mdo sde): dang | phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'thob nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mthong nas lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/
477a1(mdo sde): /u pA li/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og
477a2(mdo sde): tu 'khor bzhi po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang la la zhig dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'di ltar blta bar bya ste/ dga' ldan yid
477a3(mdo sde): la byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa blangs nas/ nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du/ dge ba bcu yid la byed pa dang / dge ba bcu'i lam la spyod pa'i bsod
477a4(mdo sde): nams de dag byams pa'i mdun du bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa de dag ni lta ba de dag gi lha'i bu mthong ba dang / pad+ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig skad cig tsam
477a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i ming nas brjod pa'i mi de dag ni/ bskal pa stong nyis brgya'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa'i mtshan thos pas thal mo sbyar
477a6(mdo sde): ba'i mi de dag ni/ bskal pa lnga bcu'i skye shi las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig byams pa la gus par phyag btsal bas bskal pa bye ba brgya'i skye shi las grol /
477a7(mdo sde): thar zhing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas la mi chags shing ma 'ongs pa'i dus su klu'i sdong po byang chub kyi shing drung du bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems
477b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor mang po dpag tu med pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas
477b2(mdo sde): byams pa'i zhabs la'ang phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byams pa la la na brgya stong du bskor nas lam mthob par dag rang rang gi smon lam btab pa/ bdag
477b3(mdo sde): cag la sogs pas lha dang / mi dang / sde brgyad po 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mos pas smon lam btab pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lus spangs nas/ 'phags pa
477b4(mdo sde): byams pa'i zhal mthong ba dang / thams cad dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba thob par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la sogs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su
477b5(mdo sde): bsod nams byed pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i drung du skye ba blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas phyin gyis
477b6(mdo sde): rlob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/ u pA li/ de lta bur lta ba ni yang dag par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan du lta ba ni log par lta ba zhes
477b7(mdo sde): bya'o| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan la 'dug pa las langs te pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /legs
478a1(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa'i yon tan legs par bshad do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe bsod nams byed pa'i sems can 'bras
478a2(mdo sde): bu thob pa bdag cag gis thob par 'tshal bas/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mtshan ci lags/ bdag cag gis ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
478a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma brjed par gzung la ma 'ongs pa'i don du lha'i gnas su skye
478a4(mdo sde): pa'i lam 'byed pa dang / byang chub kyi mtshan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi gcod pas mdo sde'i ming / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mya ngan las 'das pa
478a5(mdo sde): zhes kyang bya/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba blangs nas byang chub kyi snying po la bskul ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
478a6(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ zhing khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu bzhi'i le'u brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu 'bum
478a7(mdo sde): phrag brgyad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas thams cad kyis byams pa'i rjes su 'brang nas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan
478b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor bzhi po dang / lha dang / klu la sogs pa sde brgyad po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ thams cad mngon par dga' ste/
478b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas phyir dong ngo / /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu ba'i
478b3(mdo sde): lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ba btong dang / ban+de shes rab seng+ges rgya'i dpe las bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya lo kA nu sa mA nA a ba tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
478b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
478b5(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ thub pa'i rgyal po ril bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de nas mkhas pa
478b6(mdo sde): 'jam dbyangs kyis/ /btud de rgyal la 'di skad gsol/ /slad ma'i skye bo rnams slad du/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'byung / /
478b7(mdo sde): zab cing rgya che phun sum tshogs/ /mdo sde dam pa blo rab kyi/ /smra ba'i mchog gis bshad du gsol/ /'jig rten mgon po'i thugs skyes sras/ /gces 'dzin mchog la
479a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ /rtse gcig sems su yid byos la/ /nyon cig ngas ni bshad par bya/ /blo dang ldan pas yon tan zhus/ /de bzhin gshegs
479a2(mdo sde): pas bka' stsal pa/ /chos smra sems can mchog rnams kyis/ /chos nyid de ni mnyan par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag med las/ /rang sangs rgyas ni thams
479a3(mdo sde): cad dang / /nyan thos dag gis rnam kun tu/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsags pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros med la/ /byis pa spros pa spyod pa yi/ /sems can
479a4(mdo sde): kun gyis rgyal ba rnams/ /rig par mi nus smos ci dgos/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas dang / /sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang / /rang byung sku thugs ci 'dra dang / /
479a5(mdo sde): shes rab ci 'dra rab tu mkhyen/ /'jig rten du ni 'jig rten sgron/ /rnam par 'dren pa rnams byung yang / /'jig rten dang ni 'dres med la/ /'jig rten du yang snang ba
479a6(mdo sde): ston| |sku dang sku yi phrin las dang / /gsung gis gang dag brjod pa dang / /yid dang yid kyi rnam rtog rnams/ /rgyal ba'i thams cad 'jig rten 'das/ /'jig rten na ni
479a7(mdo sde): thugs brtse bas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /'jig rten ji ltar rtog pa bzhin/ /sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod rnams
479b1(mdo sde): kyis| |sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags/ /de dag phrin las 'jig rten 'das/ /rnam par smin pa bla na med/ /gal te 'jig rten rnam 'dren rnams/ /'jig rten
479b2(mdo sde): mthun par mi 'jug na/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang / /sangs rgyas sus kyang shes mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun la phan bzhed pa/ /skyob pa rdzu 'phrul ldan pa po/ /rang
479b3(mdo sde): byung sdig pa mi mnga' ba/ /de dag g.yo ba bsam mi khyab/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku/ /'khrig pa las ni byung min la/ /yab dang yum yang ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig
479b4(mdo sde): rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med nas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /'on kyang byis pa nyid ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs
479b5(mdo sde): rgyas 'od ni dpag med de/ /phyogs bcu dag tu snang mdzad kyang / /'dom gang 'od du ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mi yi dam pa nam du yang / /zhabs
479b6(mdo sde): gnyis sa la mi reg ste/ /'on kyang lam srang de ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'dod pa de dag rnams smad de/ /'dod pa'i rdzab las yang dag 'phags/ /'on
479b7(mdo sde): kyang sras la sogs ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags bral/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la sras
480a1(mdo sde): zhes gsungs/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa yi/ /nga ni mchog ces bka' stsal pa/ /phyin nas chos ni
480a2(mdo sde): tshol mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /thub chen 'dzam shing grib ma la/ /bzhugs te bsam gtan mdzad bstan dang / /lo drug par du dka' spyod pa/ /'di

480a4(mdo sde): 'jug yin/ /byang chub mtshungs med sangs rgyas te/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten ston yin yang // thugs las chung ngu nyid ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin//

480b1(mdo sde): kyang | |ldang ba ltar yang snang ba ni/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /zhabs ni pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra ste/ /de dag rdul gyis mi gos la/ /zhabs kyang 'khru ba mdzad pa ni/ /

480b5(mdo sde): bshang ba'i sar ni gshegs mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag snyun ni mi mnga' yang / /dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sman kyang bsten par

481a1(mdo sde): yid kyi sku dang rab ldan pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku yang / /rang can sku ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /

481a6(mdo sde): kyang | |dbu 'dreg par ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab bsgoms te/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul nam ston la/ /bsam
481a7(mdo sde): gtan mdzad pa snang ba yang / /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa kun/ /ro bro mchog rnams brnyes gyur kyang // ngan ngon dag ni

481b6(mdo sde): rnams bye ba dpag med pa/ /thugs bskyed tsam gyis 'dul mdzad kyang / /bdud kyi bgegs rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /nga dang nga zhes lta

482a1(mdo sde): mnga' yang / /gzhan la yongs su 'dri mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rnam par
482a2(mdo sde): 'dren pa 'byung mdzad kyang / /rab tu dben par snang ba ste/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag sna tshogs sku med kyang / /sems can mos pa ji bzhin
482a3(mdo sde): du| |sku lus sprul pa mdzad pa ni/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'jig rten kun gyi sgra skad kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo la/ /'on kyang sgra chung
482a4(mdo sde): bsten mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros mi mnga'/ /chos rnams kun la gsal gyur kyang / /spros dang bcas par
482a5(mdo sde): gsung mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /ming med pa yi chos kyi rnams/ /bsam du med pa'i ming dag gis/ /sems can rnams la yongs brjod
482a6(mdo sde): pa| |'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /chos rnams sems can med pa dang / /shin tu dngos po med mkhyen la/ /sems can mang po 'dul mdzad pa/ /'di
482a7(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /gang gis las byas 'di nyid kyis/ /myong bar gyur pa ma yin yang / /gang gis byas pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten
482b1(mdo sde): mthun 'jug yin/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /skyes bu mchog rnams mngon sum yang / /'chi 'pho skye ba ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
482b2(mdo sde): yin| |'jig rten 'di nas srid gzhan du/ /su yang 'khor bar yong min la/ /'khor ba yang ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /phung po dang /
482b3(mdo sde): dang khams rnams dang / /skye mched rang bzhin gcig bzhed la/ /khams gsum po dag ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /dus gsum dag
482b4(mdo sde): tu sems can gyi/ /rang bzhin dmigs pa ma yin la/ /sems can khams kyang ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /kun la mi mkhyen rnam bral te/ /
482b5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /'on kyang sngon mtha' mi gsung ba/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /yang dag ji bzhin gzhan min par/ /chos
482b6(mdo sde): rnams rtogs par thugs chud la/ /'on kyang gzhag pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /dam pa'i don du chos rnams kun/ /zab par rab tu
482b7(mdo sde): mkhyen gyur la/ /sna tshogs su ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /'phags pa'i bden pa ston
483a1(mdo sde): mdzad cing / /rdzun par yang ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bdud ni bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /dge 'dun dbye
483a2(mdo sde): bar mi nus kyang / /dge 'dun dbyen ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /chos gang yang ni mi bslabs la/ /ma bslabs pa yang gang yang
483a3(mdo sde): med| |slob dang mi slob ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'dus byas rnams ni ngo bo nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyis grol bcings med/ /'on kyang
483a4(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba ston/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mya ngan 'das la 'gro med kyang / /dgra bcom de ni 'gro 'ong zhes/ /sems can rnams la de
483a5(mdo sde): bstan pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /don dang don min mi gzigs la/ 'gog pa dang ni dam pa'i don/ /smra ba rnams kyis mchog gsung pa/ /
483a6(mdo sde): 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /dngos po med pa gsal ba'i dngos/ /rnyog ma med pa rab ston kyang / /chos rnams chud za med ces pa/ /'di ni 'jig
483a7(mdo sde): rten mthun 'jug yin/ /chos rnams thams cad brjod med par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab mkhyen kyang / /brjod pa dag ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig
483b1(mdo sde): rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa chags mi mnga'/ /dus rnams kun tu mnyam gzhag kyang / /dbang po rnams ni sbed mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten
483b2(mdo sde): mthun 'jug yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sku/ /sangs rgyas cung zad mi bsnyun yang / /dge slong byang chub yan lag smros/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun
483b3(mdo sde): 'jug yin/ /sdig pa thams cad yongs zad de/ /bsod nams kun gyis mngon 'phags kyang / /las kyi rgyud ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
483b4(mdo sde): yin| |skyob pa sangs rgyas dus gsum la/ /mthar thug 'gyur ba yod min yang / /mtshams gcod pa yang ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /
483b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku ste/ /gcig ci 'dra bar de bzhin kun/ /'on kyang tha dad ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs rgyas rang
483b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang / /nyan thos so so'i skye bo dang / /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /tshig gi lam gyis rab tu phye/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te/ /
483b7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings las byung yin yang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin
484a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa bsam mi khyab/ /sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi phyir/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /zag med yod pa ma
484a2(mdo sde): yin yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos la/ /zag pa med pa nyid gsung ba/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mkhyen pas de dag gnyis min
484a3(mdo sde): yang | |dus gsum dag ni rnams gzigs shing / /gnyis kyi 'du shes ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid gang
484a4(mdo sde): yin dang / /sangs rgyas rig par su 'dod pa/ /de ni chos dbyings zhugs shig pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /skye ba med pa bzod ston pa/ /rtag
484a5(mdo sde): tu yang dag rab tu mkhyen/ /mkhyen nas rab tu ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rtag tu chos kyi dbyings mtshungs te/ /'jug pa med
484a6(mdo sde): cing 'byung med kyang / /'gro ba gnas pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mi skye ba la gcig pa'am/ /mang po yod pa ma yin yang / /sna
484a7(mdo sde): tshogs rim pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag tha dad sku med kyang / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams dpag med de/ /sku lus dag ni
484b1(mdo sde): sprul mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /stong gsum bye ba brgya bgrangs pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing du brjod bya ba/ /der ni skye ba ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni
484b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dus kun tu/ /chos ni gnas par rab mkhyen kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /'di ni 'jig
484b3(mdo sde): rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag med cing / /sku lus dpag tu med min yang / /dpag tu yod pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
484b4(mdo sde): yin| |chos kyi dbyings la mchog med de/ /dus gsum dag tu stong nyid kyang / /mchog gis chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /zhig
484b5(mdo sde): pa med cing skye med la/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gyur kyang / /sreg pa'i bskal pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /chos kyi dbyings ni grub
484b6(mdo sde): med de/ /de la ngo bo nyid med kyang / /'on kyang nges par 'byung ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /gzigs pa ci yang mi mnga' yang / /lhag mthong gis
484b7(mdo sde): ni gzigs gyur cing / /lta ba thams cad ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /chos rnams kun la byed pa po/ /shin tu yod pa ma yin yang / /byas
485a1(mdo sde): dang ma byas ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mya ngan 'das dang nam mkha' ni/ /rgyal ba grangs su ma chud kyang / /khams
485a2(mdo sde): kyi grangs rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /grangs med stobs rnams brnyes gyur la/ /mthu las nyams pa mi mnga' yang / /zhabs 'bring
485a3(mdo sde): pa dag tshol mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /nam yang byis pa'i blo ldan dang / /sangs rgyas 'dren pa mi mnga' yang / /byis pa de dag 'dul mdzad
485a4(mdo sde): pa| |'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /yon tan ldan pa thams cad kyi/ /pha rol de bzhin gshegs byon kyang / /de la nga ni gzhan zhes pa/ /'di ni 'jig
485a5(mdo sde): rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mi skye ba ni rtag tu skyes/ /de dag rgyu las byung min yang / /ma rig rkyen gyis 'byung zhes pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rgyal
485a6(mdo sde): po rnyed dang bkur sti las/ /sgrib pa med pa nyid brnyes la/ /chog shes pa ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /gang na sems can 'dul yod
485a7(mdo sde): par| |snang ba der ni 'dren pa rnams/ /de dag spyod pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rig pa gsum gyis tshogs bsags pa/ /rig pa bskyed
485b1(mdo sde): par nges par ston/ /'di la mthong ba ci yang med/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'jig rten sgron mas thams cad du/ /skye bo dpag tu med pa 'dul/ /gling bzhi
485b2(mdo sde): dag kyang ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'jig rten gsum po gang na yang / /chos gang phung po gnas pa med/ /'on kyang chos grub bka' stsal pa/ /
485b3(mdo sde): 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mtha' gsum gyi ni mthar skyes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams ston mdzad cing / /sems can rnams la rab ston pa/ /'di ni
485b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi rgyud mkhyen nas/ /'chi 'pho skye ba rnam spangs la/ /de dag thams cad ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun
485b5(mdo sde): 'jug yin/ /mi skye ba ni gang mthong ba/ /ma rig de ni ye shes bgegs/ /rig pa bskyed par ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
485b6(mdo sde): rgyas gcig yin yang / /sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /'byung ba dag ni bsam mi khyab/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dra
485b7(mdo sde): 'di| |phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur zhing / /the tshom med la shes 'gyur ba/ /de dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong / /'jig rten mgon gyis de gsungs nas/ /sras po 'jam pa'i
486a1(mdo sde): dbyangs la sogs/ /rab tu dga' zhing yi rang te/ /ston pa'i bka' la mngon bar bstod/ /'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug
486a2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
486a3(mdo sde): te| skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / //
